summary: Start a career as a manager who is completely unknown and hired and fired by clubs depending on their results. Raise your reputation, earn experience, discover new abilities and move to stronger and stronger clubs.

name: Forest Mystery
summary: Forest Mystery is a casual walking simulator where you do some quest on the way to find who did it.

name: Fossilfuel VR: Raptor Isolation
summary: Go up against nature's greatest predator in VR! No guns, just you and a Utah Raptor, trapped underground in this intense horror companion to the dino shooter, Fossilfuel.

name: Forget Westbury Falls: Disc One
summary: In the year 2040, the town of Westbury Falls becomes the site of a multitude of unexplained events. When a petty conflict distracts its residents, it falls to a handful of unlikely people to fight against the greater evil in the shadows. Featuring Jake!

name: FourPlay Chess
summary: Chess like you have never seen it before. FourPlay Chess is a 4 player party evolution of chess, form a coalition with 2v2 co-op Team Battle mode or go solo in a 4 player free-for-all massacre. Win games, earn higher ranks and display your dominance. Will you become the true King?

name: Forget the Golden Witch
summary: This is an Umineko no Naku Koro Ni fangame, made using the PS3 game assets and the original Umineko soundtrack. It presumes that the reader has fully read through all eight Umineko episodes.

name: Forest Golf Planner
summary: Create and customize your own golf course in this charming management sim.

name: For Rest
summary: A low-poly walking simulator that puts you into a desolate, fully-greyscale forest that is devoid of life. While moving through this world, you must destroy blinking, disruptive roots that are burdening your path and the space around you. Sometimes these roots spawn new life, and sometimes a human, Charlie, appears. As you play through, the world will gradually saturate and life will begin to populate around you.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 3 - Season 2: Resistance
summary: The IO has lined up guards and sky stations, but the Resistance is equipped with new tactics like sprinting, mantling, and more. Board an Armored Battle Bus to be a powerful force or attach a Cow Catcher to your truck for extra ramming power. Take on your opponents in the ultimate battle for the Zero Point in Chapter 3 Season 2: Resistance!

name: Food Truck Empire
summary: Food Truck Empire is an economic strategy/tycoon game where you manage your own fast-growing Food Truck enterprise. Compose your dishes, automatize their production, customize your trucks and research new tech - all to serve even the pickiest customers. The world of flavor is yours to conquer!

name: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends: Wilt's Wash N' Swoosh
summary: Help Wilt do his laundry,

name: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends: Simply Smashing
summary: Help Frankie stack plates, cups, bowls, vases and more and don't let them fall!

name: Foretales
summary: Decide the fate of the world in this ingenious story-driven card game. Foretales offers a unique take on the adventure genre, with a multitude of playstyles and story paths through which you can save the world… or bring about its end.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Rally Adventure
summary: Your Forza Horizon 5 Rally Adventure is here! Drive purpose-built rally monsters and conquer the rugged Sierra Nueva. Join three rally teams and attack Horizon’s most thrilling routes ever in Timed Rally and Multi-Car Races. Feel the intensity of massive dust trails and deformable roads in 10 new cars and experience the bursting flames of anti-lag. Explore dramatic craters, an abandoned quarry and an entirely smashable palm forest.

name: Forgotten Fables: Wolves on the Westwind
summary: Forgotten Fables: Wolves on the Westwind is a visual novel set in the German pen-and-paper universe of The Dark Eye.

name: Folding Maze
summary: This game's target is folding paper to explore the maze,you need use WASD to move,and use the left mouse button to fold the map, right mouse button unfold the map,Press the space to flip.

name: For Runner Night
summary: For Runner Night is a single player endless runner game in which the player will be able to run between obstacles and jump, where he will have to dodge as many obstacles as possible, where the player can always try to beat his own record for the longest distance covered.

name: Forest Adventure
summary: Forest Adventure is a side scrolling action game. In this game you play as Freddy the frog. The frog's home was taken over by green monsters and they want to stay there forever. Save the forest from green scoundrels!

name: Forgotten Realms: Hillsfar
summary: Every visit to Hillsfar is a different, exhilarating experience. Explore the city, meet its colorful denizens on the streets or in pubs and discover a quest.

name: Forts: High Seas
summary: With a brand new water system, new campaign, weapons, ammo system, HUD and soundtrack, Forts - High Seas takes the classic Forts physics-based fun to the next level of building, battling and causing bubbles!

name: Foreigner Teacher
summary: You got fired recently, No money, no girlfriend, no prospects. You then see a woman looking for people to teach in Japan. The only problem? You don't know a single thing about Japan. Still, you find yourself taking the job. What's worse, you're stuck with two eccentric spirits for the next year.

name: Forbidden
summary: "Forbidden" is a top-down action horror game that can be play with 4 players. When you step into the forbidden land, nobody can escape from the fear.

name: Forsaken
summary: Explore and annihilate in your journey to wield the legendary Firearm that can finally bring down the mythical beast, in this Action-RPG adventure.

name: Foonda
summary: The World's First AI Logic Puzzle Game.Generated in Real Time So It's Always New.

name: Foreign Galaxies
summary: After a galactic portal failure you find yourself lost in a galaxy 500 light years away from home... With your main propulsion systems disabled you are unable to traverse space, so you try to collect resources you find near you in order to create a galactic portal to return back.

name: For Your Information
summary: First person team multiplayer game. On closed map, battle between Guards and Spies. Spies team need to find locked filling cabinet and documents with parts of the password. Guards team need to find Spies, judging on the basis of spy movement or behavior.

name: Forget-me-not
summary: A girl on girl visual novel centered on drama and love. Dive into Iris's life as she re-discovers romance, at the cost of getting into a little bit of trouble.

name: Fortress Building Puzzle
summary: Fortress Building Puzzle is a puzzle game where you need to remove all the cubes to bring your castle to the ground, which is quite high.

name: Force of Warships: Battleship
summary: Direct your battleship to glorious victory! Online battle under your leadership!

name: Four Second Frenzy
summary: There are fifty mini games in this game. You have four seconds to complete each one use the arrow keys and the space bar.

name: Forklore
summary: You set out to begin a new life in Clementine. Reopen your grandmother's run-down place and transform it into a thriving business. Meet the locals and build meaningful relationships, explore everything the village has to offer for you!

name: Football Manager 2020 Mobile
summary:
Manage your football club, your way this season in Football Manager 2020 Mobile – the fast-track to footballing greatness.
Effortlessly build your dream squad, win titles and feel the rush as you battle your way to the very top of the game, wherever and whenever you want. Featuring more than 60 leagues from 21 of the top footballing nations, will you challenge for domestic glory or opt for an adventure abroad?

name: Football Management RPG
summary:
FMRPG is not about comparing statistics for players to see who is 'better', or playing an unrealistic and flawed transfer system.
It is about dealing with the personalities of your players, your staff and the media effectively in order to motivate them and deliver success on the pitch. Your decisions will affect your clubs harmony, attitude and tactics, which in turn will affect the outcome of your matches and results.

name: Football Manager
summary: The first football management simulator, many of the hallmarks of the incredibly complex games which exist in this genre today are found in embryonic form here. Club finances, player transfers, basic tactics, and perhaps most importantly of all, excellent white noise crowd sounds when your team scored.

name: For Honor: Season 20 - Frozen Shores
summary:
The rise of the waters during the Tempest and the subsequent winter allowed seafaring pirates passage to the frozen shores of Heathmoor. These pirates had no allegiance to any faction – they only cared about treasure. In their pursuit of wealth, they began trading with the people, offering warriors access to new weapons from across the sea.

Take your character through a journey of 100 Tiers of rewards for all heroes! Available during For Honor: Frozen Shores only.

name: For Honor: Season 21 - Golden Age
summary:
New visitors from far away have unveiled the lost reliquary of Wyverndale. Now, treasures long forgotten have been made available to warriors once more. From the ancient past of Heathmoor comes old weapons that once again glisten in the light of day. Arm yourself with the blades of Heathmoor’s original warriors, and fight like the forebears of old.

Take your character on a quest back to the Golden Age with 100 Tiers of rewards for all heroes! Available during For Honor: Golden Age only.

name: Football
summary:
The LCD game of Football is a Sega Sports-branded American football game created by Tiger Electronics. It was released as part of the Pocket Arcade series in 1994.

Tiger Electronics has released many American football games, including Electronic Football, Bo Jackson's Football, Electronic John Elway's Quarterback and Electronic Madden NFL 95. This Sega-branded version is currently thought to be a unique LCD game.

name: Forlorn
summary:
Anyone can survive for a day. But can you survive the nights?

Forlorn is a single-player survival horror game. Lost on a deserted island, you will have to forage, craft, build, hunt and explore your way through the wilderness. The clock is ticking, as every night could be your last.

name: Football
summary: A soccer/football game for the Tiger R-Zone.

name: Focus Find
summary: Immerse yourself in Focus Find, a gripping narrative thriller game. Solve environmental puzzles through 5 stages of grief, where reality blurs with unexpected revelations. Guide Adam through his lost past, navigating a gripping tale of loss and grief.

name: Fort Boyard 2022
summary: Cross the threshold of Fort Boyard and complete the challenges! Take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets for collecting boyard coins.

name: Forest Grump
summary: The cheesy space schnitzel, monsters and guns, old smackdonald, freaky forest, killing friends, or the first day in forestry. Name it whatever you want, the ultimate action-packed FPS/CTF/RPG is here. Plus, this game is funny as hell. Start playing today!

name: Formula Top
summary: Fun top-down 3D formula racing game with tense side-by-side battles against competitive AI or other people in online multiplayer. The perfect blend of tight arcade controls and immersive world of formula.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Expansion Pack 2
summary:
45 new levels to explore + 7 new Achievements to complete.
Go ahead, test your skill!

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Complete Edition
summary: Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck! Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible. Be careful not to burn the food!

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine Expansion Pack 2
summary:
45 new levels to explore + 7 new Achievements to complete.
Go ahead, test your skill!

name: Football Director 2017
summary:
Welcome to Football Director 2017, your decisions will either lead your team to glory or relegation! This is football management at it's casual best, no complex screens, just full control over your top eleven, team lineups, your club staff and facilities. From footy novice to managerial guru, you’ve got the job, Can you lead your team to the top of the championship? Start managing your dream team and be the best football (soccer) manager in the world!
Premier, league, play-off and cup glory awaits!

name: Football Agent
summary:
Be the person behind the biggest deals in football.
You don't care about trophies and winners medals. You only care about money and your clients happiness.

name: Fort Sumter: Secession Crisis
summary: Can you drive the Secessionist into the Fort Sumter trap that gave Lincoln his historic victory? Can you successfully use the issue of States Rights to divide Northern opinion? Fort Sumter let’s you explore this seminal moment in American history in a fast-playing, easy-to-learn game.

name: Fortune Panda 2
summary: Collect coins and dodge obstacles in this insanely addicting game. Get notifications when your friends beat your high score to make sure you can win it back right away.

name: Food Tycoon
summary:
Run your very own fast food restaurant! Plan your menu, set your prices, manage your employees, and climb the food chain to become a true food tycoon!
Manage your restaurants finances, supplies and public image and you could end up with hundreds of customers to serve! Are you up to the task, or will the industry dash your hopes and dreams?

name: Fort Defenders 7 Seas
summary:
All hands on deck! Pirate armada dead ahead!
Take part in an uncompromising struggle repelling freebooters' assaults. Watch out, the enemy may catch the tide for ruining your fortress. Build towers, collect crystals, upgrade spells and believe in your victory!

name: Food Battle: The Game
summary: Food Battle: The Game is an independent game associated with Smosh funded by the Indiegogo, based on the popular Food Battle series.

name: Four Footed Friends
summary:
Four Footed Friends is an adaptation of the classic 1914 children's book of the same name. It contains rhymes and illustrations about animals with 40 pages in total. The bookworms Albert, Wendy and Pablo guide the player through the story. Albert has interesting facts about animals, while Wendy shows the player how to learn new words, and Pablo allows the player to colour a picture from the story. Activities involve reading, spelling, vocabulary, animal facts, painting, and discovering hidden surprises in the backgrounds such as videos.

With the Inter-activator, the player can go forwards, backwards, go to a page, change the language, and visit the card catalogue for other information. The game was fully localized in English, Spanish, French and Japanese. The game also included a parent guide which showed parents how to use the CD ROM.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Expansions Bundle
summary: The Forza Horizon 5 Expansions Bundle includes two expansions. Each expansion will introduce a new location, vehicles, and gameplay.

name: Four Course Dungeon
summary: It’s the 100th year anniversary of the ultimate cooking competition show, Four Course Dungeon! Every year, chefs from across the land gather to compete in a hunting, gathering, and cooking battle royale. Four chefs will enter, but only ONE can claim the title of the Legendary Dragon Chef!

name: Forza Horizon 3: Platinum plus Expansions Bundle
summary: In this bundle, Forza Horizon 3 with both Expansions and all Car Packs are included.

name: Forsaken Barn
summary: Psychological horror game focused on finding items and solving puzzles while you are being haunted by a demon.

name: Fowl Scourge
summary: In this Dark Fantasy Action-RPG you are part of a plague doctor guild where every encounter with your patients is a boss fight.

name: Forward Defense
summary: Forward Defense is a top-down 3D singleplayer tower defense game. Join the United Coalition Force and defeat incoming waves of insurgent forces.

name: For Another Day
summary: Start to play in the open world to master the game! For another day is a new world that need to be discovered from scratch by you.

name: Foreclosure Simulator
summary: Manage a bailiff in Foreclosure Simulator. Do business, earn money, buy new houses and vehicles. Decorate your home and garden according to your imagination. Enjoy the open world.

name: Forsaken Champions
summary: Forsaken Champions is a one-of-a-kind blend of ARPG and CRPG. Freedom is yours, build, adapt and complete your campaigns then play them to your liking ! Embark in your heroic adventures to live with your friends, however beware of the mood of the adventure master !

name: Food Diary
summary: Food Diary is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as the famous restaurateur Guy Fieri and it plays like a traditional fangame, where you explore the dream world and collect effects.

name: Fog
summary:
Fog is a Yume Nikki fangame.
From the Nexus, the dreamer can explore several different dream worlds. Within the dream world, they can collect various effects and perks, which can be equipped to raise certain stats which may affect their dreams. FOG includes various puzzles throughout the dream world. Those puzzles are generally based on various visual and audio cues; solving them may reveal Effects and Perks.

The game takes place in November 1998, following the lucid dreaming exploits of Leon, Tegan, and Emory as they explore their shared but corrupted dream world after their friendship fell apart. They may find ghosts of each other, as well as recurring antagonists such as Fedoras and Shadow Creatures. Although FOG has no dialogue, Leon, Tegan, and Emory may find messages visually encoded as numbers, colors, or shapes or audial encoding such as Morse code.

name: For Symphony: With All One's Heart
summary: For Symphony: With All One's Heart is a visual novel for PlayStation 2, Dreamcast, and PC.

name: Formula Bwoah
summary: Formula Bwoah is a strategic arcade top down motorsport racing game where you not only drive the car, but also plan and react to dynamic racing events like changing weather, track conditions, tire degradation, etc.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 3 - Season 3: Vibin'
summary: In Chapter 3 Season 3: Vibin’, the Island is one giant party. Bounce around in Reality Falls, ride atop creatures, brave the Screwballer coaster, and revel with a new arsenal. Drop into Season 3 and spread the good vibes!

name: Fountains
summary: Master high-skilled combat to uncover the secrets of an ancient, interconnected world.

name: Football Simulator
summary: Moddable physics football game where you can struggle through and break tackles for first downs, juggle tipped passes and make diving interceptions. You can also be the cinematographer and create your own videos using the replay system or go on quests with players as the coach in RPG Mode.

name: Forest of Tails: Arena
summary: Forest of Tails: Arena is a real-time action arena game that pits you against bugs, animals, and even other mice. Fight your way through waves, gain new skills, and loot powerful equipment to fight your way to the top.

name: Forever Alone
summary: Travel through a handcrafted world as a young kitten looking for comfort after a tragedy occurs by looking into another reality, revealing various paths to get past obstacles!

name: Formula One 2000
summary: Formula One 2000 is an officially licensed Formula One racing game.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Time to explore Asian Food and become the best gourmet cooking master at your brand new food truck! Take orders, make delicious dishes and be fast to serve the hordes of hungry customers who will queue in front of your counter!

In this Deluxe Edition you will get both:
- Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine
- Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine - Expansion Pack #2

name: Fort Solis
summary: Fort Solis is a single player third person thriller set on the far side of Mars. Engineer Jack Leary responds to a routine alarm. Upon arriving at a dormant Fort Solis he becomes unnerved by the lack of any staff at the base. As the night grows longer events begin to unravel and spiral out of control. The mystery of what Fort Solis was created for starts to appear along with its crew. Can Jack escape with what he has discovered and more importantly, his life?

name: Fox and Frog Travelers: The Demon of Adashino Island
summary: Fox and Frog Travelers: The Demon of Adashino Island is a 3D action adventure game mixed with some Japanese culture elements.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Hot Wheels
summary: Forza Horizon 5: Hot Wheels introduces players to the visually stunning, exhilarating new Horizon Hot Wheels Park in the clouds high above Mexico, the ultimate playground of creative fun for all players.

name: Folklorist Diary: The Forgotten Treasure
summary:
This is a game made with Tomb Raider Level Editor. It uses the mechanics of the 1996 version of Tomb Raider while recreating its entire story.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2023.

name: Fortune Star Panic!
summary: A doujin game by Desunoya based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Fog
summary: Your new indie rouge-lite addiction. Battle through the nine levels of hell in a psychedelic watercolor painted world. Unleash your creativity to create a character build that will take you all the way to the gates of heaven.

name: Forward Winds
summary:
Go on an adventure to vanquish the encroaching darkness.
Defeat monsters to get stronger and advance further.

name: Football Manager 2022: Xbox Edition
summary: Football Manager 2022 is a 2021 football-management simulation video game developed by Sports Interactive and published by Sega.

name: Formula Bit Racing DX
summary: Formula Bit Racing DX is a fun arcade racing game, where each curve and lap recreate classic gameplay and offers you unbound speed limits of fun. Full throttle and enjoy!

name: Fort Flow
summary: Navigate this flying castle, fight a variety of enemies, unlock rich cards and stories, and lead the way out of the siege!

name: Food Factory
summary: Food Factory is game where players can produce food using various machines starting from gathering base products.

name: Forgotten Legends
summary: Forgotten Legends is a virtual trading card game, based off of MMO/MOBA style combat. You will need to build a team that can win together and take Victory from your enemies!

name: Forever Lost
summary: Who are you...and what happened at Hawthorne Asylum? Find the answers in Forever Lost, a puzzle-based, psychological horror adventure through a dark, forgotten landscape.

name: Forgotten Memories: Definitive Edition
summary: Take a deep breath and get ready for the horror of Forgotten Memories.

name: Forklift Extreme

name: Forza Horizon 5: 2019 Nissan 370Z Nismo
summary: Forza Horizon 5 2019 Nissan 370Z Nismo

name: Football History Football Simulator
summary: The Football History Simulator provides play creation for football coaches. It can be customized to accommodate the user's branding form team uniforms to stadium field markings.

name: Forklift Man
summary: You are Forklift Man! He can rapidly grow his limbs at his will. His amazing superpower must be put to good use among various challenges and puzzles.

name: Forget-Me-Not R
summary: This sequel to the 2011 iOS game Forget-Me-Not is an arcade-like maze game about, according to the creator, "picking flowers in randomly generated caves of monsters".

name: Four in One
summary:
A game released for the Mega Duck/Cougar Boy in 1993.

It contains:

Virus Attack
Electron World
Trouble Zone
Dice Block

name: Forrader Hero

name: Four Seasons Around the World: Spring in Japan
summary: Discover Japanese culture in Spring by following the story of a young American journalist in search for love and adventure. After receiving a mysterious letter, the young woman goes to Japan to follow more clues. In hope of finding her lost love, she is enriched by the culture of the Far East. Choose your own level of challenge. Play 80 mosaic puzzles and enjoy various Minigames. Follow instructions for the tea ceremony, ikebana and sushi rolls. Enjoy Japanese landscape as you progress in the game.

name: Foster: Ghost Child
summary: Foster: Ghost Child provides an atmospheric horror that incorporates East Asian elements rarely used in games. The game makes use of Chinese traditional elements to convey a distinct and frightful storyline that incorporates Taoism, Buddhism, and Chinese mythology.

name: Fossil Finder
summary: You are a young promising scientist who went to the excavations of ancient lands. Find all the artifacts of antiquity, precious stones and remains of past civilizations!

name: Forlorn: The mysteries of Highshadowland
summary: It is a first-person atmospheric horror game with riddles and puzzles, haunting ghosts and dreadful monsters to fight with. You’ll be playing as a detective Edward Forlorn who is investigating mysterious events that happened in the orphanage in Highshadowland.

name: Fogel and Porki Evil Arcade
summary: This is a game in the genre of "Match 3" with elements of a visual novel, drawn in the aesthetics of retrofuturism of the 80s. Immerse yourself in the neon atmosphere of the arcade arcade and help the students defeat the Demon that broke into reality from the video game!

name: Forbidden Ninja Scroll: Kunoichi Training
summary: Forbidden Ninja Scroll is a Kunoichi (Female Ninja) adventure & simulation game in development. Compatible in VR and non-VR. This is an early prototype of the game.

name: Forebears
summary: A coming of age visual novel adventure about forest spirits, family heritage and a story of undying love.

name: Foklor
summary: Build, farm, tame, fight and explore as you and your friends survive in the world of Foklor. Discover treasures, items and magic of great power as you defend against evil creatures. Your legend awaits!

name: Fortnite: Anime Legends Pack
summary: Create, play, and battle with friends for free in Fortnite. Explore concerts, live events, games, and more or be the last player standing in a battle royale and zero builds.

name: Formula 2D: Steer To Persevere
summary: Formula 2D - Steer To Perseveer is a top of the line Formula Racing game where mild similiraties to F1 are entirely coincidental - Create and customize your team - Upgrade your facilities to upgrade the car ️ - Become the world champion and climb the rankings

name: For What Will Come
summary: Return to your childhood home in hopes to see your family, uncover the secrets behind your family's disappearance. What will you uncover? Will the family mystery end with you, or never be thought of again..

name: Forbidden myths
summary: Role-playing game with action elements in the world of Slavic mythology. Go from a simple ordinary fighter to one of the most famous people in the principality, fighting hard and unusual monsters and solving the problems of fabulous creatures.

name: Football Club Management 2023
summary: Take control of a Real Football Club or create your own club, in Football Club Manager 2023!

name: Fog & Silver
summary: Fog & Silver is set in a fantastic, mystical, and dark reimagined Europe of the late 19th century; with a focus on atmosphere-driven story, powerful items, and in-depth character customization.​

name: Forest Terror 2
summary: Forest Terror 2 is a cooperative first person adventure game with horror elements in which you will have to survive and complete quests with your friends in the mysterious forest of Eastern Hare.

name: ForeVR Cornhole
summary: VR Cornhole is here! Known also as Bags or Bean bags.... Toss a bean bag across the yard into a hole through a wood platform in Virtual Reality!

name: Food Stylist: Design Game
summary:
Welcome to Food Stylist - a relaxing, fun game, where you can plate up amazing virtual food dishes and tablescapes.
Play the role of a Food Stylist as you discover new dishes, rise to the challenge of plating up an amazing scene and capturing incredible food photos.

name: Forlorn Memories
summary:
Forlorn Memories is a love letter to the JRPG genre and an upcoming story-driven 3D steampunk fantasy retro inspired RPG with life-sim elements, contemporary storytelling and QoL improvements to create an RPG experience that feels both nostalgic and modern at the same time. The story revolves around a group of heroes who have little in common except their shared quest to recover their lost memories.

“Memories are fleeting - what are you willing to sacrifice to remember?”

name: Folktale
summary: Folktale is a 3rd person fantasy game full of adventure, action and combat.

name: Fog and Sea
summary:
A remake of a Mini Jam 81 game of the same name.
You're from a place where the dead move to places built on or around giant creatures. speed date these creatures to find out where you'll wind up in the afterlife!

name: Foxy Land 2
summary: Foxy Land 2 is a continuation of the adventures of the plucky Foxy fox. This time his children have been kidnapped. This was done by the nefarious brothers Fulfy, when Foxy went in search of food. But he won't be looking for his children alone, but with his wife Jenny. So now the game supports a game for two. To fight with enemies, you can now throw cherries at them. Jump to deftly and accurately to prevent the villains in their plans to kidnap young foxes. Explore the island, avoid the traps and get acquainted with the inhabitants of the island. Go forth to adventure and victory over evil!

name: Fold Stories
summary: An inner journey mixing exploration and puzzles in a dreamlike origami world.

name: Forests, Fields and Fortresses
summary:
Forests, Fields and Fortresses - is a mix of a puzzle and a board game in which you have to build your kingdom.

In the Puzzle Mode, play handcrafted levels with a small number of pieces of territory. Your goal is to place them in such a way as to earn the required amount of gold.

In the Adventure Mode, start the game with a random map and an endless supply of pieces of territory.

name: Forest Tower Defense
summary: Wrrrrrr….The evil spirits are approaching the town again. The locals can no longer feel safe like before. Welcome in this new tower defense game.

name: Forward Team
summary: A team of four sets out on a journey to find the magic mirror. Change the position of the adventurers to determine whether they will be greeted by： monsters，traps,or treasure！ Your wisdom will lead the brave team through this wonderful adventure!

name: Football Manager 2023
summary: New tools thrust you closer to every aspect of the beautiful game in FM23. Get ready for your journey towards footballing glory.

name: For Honor: Starter Edition
summary: For Honor: Starter Edition gives you access to the story mode, all multiplayer modes, all maps and 6 playable heroes with 3 fully unlocked.

name: For I, the Moon
summary: A short conversation with the moon.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Premium Edition
summary: Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck! Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

name: FootPool
summary: FootPool is an original pool game that mixes with the rules of soccer

name: Follow My Steps
summary: Lead and protect a mother wolf and her pup seeking a new shelter. Use your magic to explore a dreamlike open world through numerous environments. Make the right choices to take care and educate your cub. Survive together and try to escape from the Midnight Pack…

name: Food Empire

Buy properties, design the look of your restaurant, hire staff and finally feed all those hungry customers!

Eccentric characters and exciting puzzles populate the mysterious island of Devil’s Rock in this classic style point & click adventure.

Lead your team to premiership glory with fun but tactical game play innovations never before seen in an Australian Football video game to date!

name: Forbidden Memories
summary: Mystical audio quest in find objects style, accessable for the blind. By the fading sound of the metronome, Christina woke up in an abandoned house. Now her task is to get out of there.

name: Forklift Flowerpot: Botanical Investigator
summary: Change between three seasons on a strange archipelago to solve puzzles, quiet-quit your forklift job, and dismantle the potato-dominated shipping industry. When you're done exploring, kick back and play a deckbuilding card game in a wild attempt to dethrone your local Gods.

name: For the King II
summary: Battle against Fahrul's tyrannical Queen alone or as a party of 4 players in the sequel to For The King, the massively popular turn-based roguelike tabletop RPG. Level up and explore as you unravel the once beloved Queen's terrible secret.

name: Forfeit
summary: Forfeit is inspired by real events that are tried to be hidden; It is a game of thrill, adventure and mystery. In this game, you may find yourself in Nevada's mysterious Area 51 or jump to another dimension. Come on, start the game! This story is yours.

name: For Honor: Season 22 - Curse of the Scarab

name: For Honor: Season 23 - The Demon Dagger

summary: In Fortnite Chapter 3 Season 4: Paradise, a mysterious substance has appeared on the Island. Chrome will consume all, Chrome will be all. Embrace the Chrome by turning structures Chrome, making yourself Chrome, and proving the power of Chrome weapons.

name: Follow You

name: Fortuna
summary: You are Fortuna, a young Moira, also known as the Fate Weaver. Your role is to weave the threads of destiny to grant happiness to your allotted Mortals in life, so you will be able to collect their Aethers, or souls, in death. The Aethers will allow you to improve your abilities to ensure better lives for future generations of Mortals… The problem is, you are under a curse, and the destinies you weave are subjugated to chance… Weave the threads of fate, assist the Mortals allotted to you, and find a way to break the curse.

name: Footage 1985
summary:
In February 1986, a tape was found in the former home of the killer known as the "Butcher of the Forest".

After the disappearance of some people at the scene, an investigation was launched.

Mark Henry, the dreaded murderer, has already been executed by electrocution, so there is no possibility that he is the perpetrator of further crimes.

The images you will see are from the tape found at the site and may be disturbing images...

name: For Rest: Healing in Forest

name: Forêt de Nuages
summary:
A walking simulator in a hand-drawn environment. Meet plants with strong characters and respond to their incongruous requests.

Please be careful where you step, your actions are not without consequences.

name: Form of Being

name: Folds of a Separation

name: Foretales: Deluxe Edition

name: Forest Pop

name: Football Coach: College Dynasty

name: Forbidden zone
summary: Be a survivor in a massive open world with the radioactive mutant. Explore the new ultra-realistic world, find your community, crafter your best weapons, and survive the regions.

name: Forest Dongmul

name: Forest Spring
summary: With the arrival of spring, it is necessary to clear the forests, but you will get blood, not dust, on your hands. Do you have the courage for this ?

name: Forge Industry
summary: Forge your destiny as a blacksmith! Automate your workshops, optimize your supply chain, research new materials, craft legendary weapons, and cast your place in the world.

name: Forklift Extreme: Deluxe Edition
summary: An exceptional physical experience with unique visuals and super smooth, yet demanding gameplay

name: For Mother Matron
summary:
Lizzy is a girl living in The Boarding, a walled city surrounded by fog. All who live here serve the mysterious Mother Matron, its revered leader who hasn’t been seen in person in many years. Periodically, the Mother Matron selects residents to become Surveyors, tasked with exploring the dark unknown tunnels that lie underground to find the key to a better future for the collective. The odds of survival are slim to none. It is an honor and a death sentence. One day, Lizzy finds herself on the draft.

Using your wits and quick thinking, you must guide Lizzy through the dangers beneath. Will you survive? Will you find Paradise? Or will you be lost to the dark forever?

name: Formula Retro Racing: World Tour
summary: A retro racer updated for the modern age, rediscover nostalgic racing as you drive through iconic locations in Formula Retro Racing: World Tour. Fusing 90s-style arcade racing with realistic physics, split-screen multiplayer, and 60fps performance. With new tracks and car types!

name: Fortune: Rewritten
summary: Fortune: Rewritten is a PvP, or PvE experience! Battle in head-to-head combat where only one can be the winner!

name: Forbidden World
summary: Penetrate deeper into the Forbidden World. Fulfill your fantasies in your own private dungeon. From the creators of SinVR, Forbidden World is the destination for provocative and amusing adult entertainment, for your PC or in VR.

name: For Amerta
summary: Again and again, just to save her.

name: Forgiven
summary:
FORGIVEN is an upcoming RPG game detailing the adventures of four kids
and the powers that arise with spiritual unity and focus

name: Focalpoint
summary:
A few hours after Adrian Shephard and his squad got scattered allover the Black Mesa Complex, headquarter sent a rescue team to search the lost crew.

Finding himself in the misery a soldier tries to do the best out of his lonely situation. Searching for allies he quickly becomes a major part in an issue he's never been training for.

summary: Play 10 brand new levels and get special operator skin. Unique environment and challenges awaits!

Formula Drag Manager Game !

This Game is for you.

Choose your car, win drag races!

Power up your car and challenge the best!

Save your money and buy more powerful cars!

summary: Keep it fresh and fierce with the Minty Legends Pack including three outfits, three back blings, three pickaxes, a wrap, and 1,000 V-Bucks!

name: Fox Den Remake
summary:
You play as a night guard, hired to do some dirty job in a pizzeria. As you progress trough nights, you encounter more complicated tasks, as well as more danger and secrets.
Fox Den Remake is a freeroam smut horror game about completing objectives. It's a complete remake of our previous project, Fox Den.

name: Foxy
summary:
Foxy is a pure strategy game, without any RPG elements. The player is taken from one battle to another; there is no gameplay outside of battles. The battles take place in various city districts. The player navigates his/her units in turn-based fashion. In the beginning, the battles are relatively small-scale, with infantry and tank units; as the game progresses, more unit types are introduced, including massive rocket-launching tanks, jet planes, catapults, etc.

Each unit has distinct advantages and disadvantages, different mobility, attack range, etc. For example, infantry units that carry rocket launchers can only attack diagonally, but cannot be hurt when they attack tanks from that position; being attacked frontally, however, makes them very vulnerable. Terrain also plays a role; certain terrain types may slow down certain unit types, or be completely impassable to others. Each next battle features more complex layouts and larger amounts of units.

Between the battles there are cut-scenes, most of which are dedicated to rescuing the girls, and feature nudity and mild sexual situations.

name: Foxy 2
summary: Foxy 2 is a turn-based strategy game. The gameplay is similar to its predecessor; it is confined to large-scale strategic battles, in which the player commands different types of units, in an attempt to reach the enemy base, protect his own, and exterminate all enemy units. Like in the first game, the units have distinct strengths and weaknesses, as well as attack range. The game includes even more various types of units, including the traditional infantry, rocket launchers (mobile and stationary), different kinds of tanks, planes, helicopters, etc. The plot is more elaborate than in the first game, and the cut-scenes between the battles typically include more plot-related information. Scenes with nudity and mild sexual content are kept intact.

name: Forgive My Sins & Desires, Father
summary: Samael suffers from delusions. He feels lost until he encounters a priest one day. The priest is the only person in the world who makes him feel at peace. This, however, slowly turns into an obsession. Will Samael learn how to love properly or will he fall into a path of darkness? You decide.

name: Forbidden Escape
summary: Escape the Exodus, a ship attacked by an encroaching corruption, and embark on a supernatural adventure to explore the various levels of the vessel. Try to survive against dangers and find the solution to challenging puzzles.

name: Forgotten but Unbroken
summary: Forgotten but Unbroken is a tactical turn-based strategy game inspired by XCOM but offers its own unique take on the genre. Meet real life WW2 heroes and choose whether to fight with or against them! It’s time to lead the resistance against the Axis forces and help to liberate Europe!

name: Fortune the Fated
summary: To unlock ancient spells needed to defend the galaxy, can you navigate fantasy quests, noir cases, heroic competitions, dystopian worlds & space heists?

name: Fourspell Survivors Online
summary: Join friends online to survive endless hordes of monsters in this online coop "survivors" game! Evolve your spells, defeat bosses and develop the best character builds and party formations. Cooperation is key to survive in this action roguelike with unique characters.

name: Forever Someday
summary: Forever Someday is a short narrative experience about dealing with depression and the end of a relationship, with a surreal and dream-like aesthetic.

name: Follow the Crown
summary: Join a thrilling adventure with an Ambassador of the United States & a Hungarian Crown Guard to keep the Hungarian Holy Crown from Nazis and return it to Hungary during the Cold War. You can't trust anyone on this journey; only your wits.

name: Fortnite: Graveyard Drift Quest Pack
summary:
After falling into darkness, only the Driftwalker remains. Corruption is taking over and the Graveyard Drift begins! Complete Quests to earn V-Bucks with the Graveyard Drift Quest Pack.

- Driftwalker Outfit w/ Styles
- Broken Fractal Wings Back Bling
- Corrupted Rift Edges Pickaxe

summary:

- Dark Wild Card Outfit

- Dark Axe Pickaxe

summary:

- Corrupted Arachne Outfit

- Corrupted Insight Outfit
- Corrupted Sight Sling Back Bling

- Corrupted Bladed Wings Back Bling

name: Football
summary:
Football was released in 1977. It was labelled either Football or Football I (after the release of Football II). Early models of Football had an AC Adapter jack which was removed on later models (which would only run on batteries).

First released in June of 1977 as the second game released by Mattel (Auto Race was the first) and sold through Sears. After less than 100,000 were made, Sears (using a computer model based on initial sales figures) determined that the games would not be big sellers, and most of the production for Football and Auto Race was stopped. Within 6 months, it became obvious to Sears that their prediction was wrong, and production was started up again and reached previously unknown levels! (Reaching as many as 500,000 units a week by mid-February, 1978).

name: Football 2
summary: Football 2 (or II) was released in 1978. It is the Sequel to the popular Football I game. It adds the functionality of running forward and backward, passing, etc (and actually has a 10 yard playing field, not 9 like Football I). This game also has an 'Easter Egg' of sorts, if you hold down the 'Pass' button while turning on the game, you effectively get Pro 3 or Pro 4 difficulty settings for the game play (i.e., if you have the switch on Pro 1, holding down the pass will give you Pro 3, etc. Pro 4 is VERY fast and difficult to play.)

name: ForeVR Pool
summary:
ForeVR Pool brings the coolest pool halls from around the globe straight to your living room! Challenge friends, family, and in-game pros to a game of 8-ball pool – no table required.

Battle 12 bots to level up and take on Legendary challengers. Join a Quick Match or jump into a private multiplayer party! Friend in town? Share your headset with Pass & Play. Up the ante and stake in-game coins in matches against other players.

name: Football Life 2023
summary: Football Life 2023 game is an attempt to continue the offline modes of the retired PES series, football life is a standalone football game based on pes21, built for offline career modes only. SP Football Life is how we like to play a football game.

name: Foodfight!
summary:
Foodfight! is a cancelled tie-in game for the movie of the same name that was in development in 2006 for the Nintendo GameCube, Game Boy Advance and PlayStation 2. The game was shown off at E3 2006, however despite that, it's what the game was meant to be about due to the lack of gameplay footage, but is assumed to be a 3D platformer.

The game was cancelled after the movie was delayed until 2012.

name: For the Crown
summary: For the crown is a Puzzle/Supply-chain game where the player obeys the crown's orders to build and develop a production chain to create items and charakters. The demands of the crown will increase according to the level, making the game and the tasks more and more complex.

name: Football Manager 2023 Touch

name: Forge of Destiny

Create your character, travel through the Node-capital and venture into the ruins of the forgotten world. Live a unique experience of classic style in which discerning the truth will be a challenge.

name: Footgun: Underground

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4
summary:
A new beginning awaits.

In the fourth Chapter of Fortnite’s Battle Royale, go forth in a new realm and get around in new ways — ride a dirt bike, roll in a snowball, launch yourself with the Shockwave Hammer, and hurdle over obstacles. Power yourself up with Reality Augments and claim territory for your squad, leaving behind Banners to declare what’s yours. And of course, venture with newly-forged weapons.

name: For Your Tranquility
summary: It's a mystery game that reveals the truth through an autopsy. Be a forensic doctor and find out why the dead died.

name: For Goodness Sake
summary: In a final attempt to guarantee your place on the nice list, you decide to try and do some chores before midnight. Will Krampus take you? Take the test and find out.

name: Forgotten School
summary:
Forgotten School / 忘れられた学校 is a short atmospheric Japanese VHS aesthetic horror game with a deeper meaning.

Japanese school girl Akiyo shows up at her school in the morning, but it would seem that everyone is gone. Through her video camera she always keeps on her, she discovers a hidden dimension unseen to the naked eye.

name: Forge of Freedom: The American Civil War 1861-1865
summary:
Forge of Freedom: The American Civil War 1861-1865 provides something for every strategy gamer. Control economic development, political development with governors and foreign nations, and use your military to win the bloodiest war in US history.
Forge of Freedom: The American Civil War 1861-1865 combines grand strategy with battlefield tactics in one game, putting you in command at every level of the Civil War, from the mobilization of your nation’s resources to the control of individual brigades during the fury of battle.

name: Formula Challenge
