name: Forest Fire
summary: Be the Forest Fire and burn everything in sight! Dodge bullet-hell rain clouds, rivers, and firefighters in this roguelite destruction fest. Each pixel is physically simulated to spread your flame far and wide. Only YOU can start Forest Fires.

name: Forkscythe
summary: Are you ready to test your skills and bravery in the ultimate horror action game? Introducing Forkscythe, a retro FPS unlike any other. Set in a nightmarish world overrun by attacking skulls, you'll need quick reflexes and strategic thinking to survive!

name: Food Truck Tycoons: 2 in 1 Bundle
summary: Jump into your food truck and business will bump up!

name: Football Kicks
summary: Score as many penalty kicks as you can!

name: Fortnite
summary: Fortnite China was a Chinese exclusive version of Fortnite, published by Tencent Games, that was available between January 10, 2018 and November 15th 2021. The game was only playable in China and contained many differences from the regular version, including different gameplay mechanics, art assets, and censored content.

name: Forest of Relics
summary: Use the Run / Jump / Hanging / Paragliding to pass through various obstacles and obtain treasures. Spinel, the guardian of the ruins, is testing you.

name: Four Color Puzzle
summary: A chill puzzle experience. Set the colors of the pieces so that no two adjacent pieces have the same color. Complete 30 handmade levels, or explore infinite randomly generated 3D puzzles.

name: Four Horsemen
summary:
Four Horsemen, a battle strategy game, provides you with an outlet to multiple gameplay based strategies. It is available for everyone who desires to play a survival adventure game with revolutionary war game layouts. You can jump into this adventure anytime, anywhere to defend your troops in battle and protect your shelter, offering MMO strategy challenge missions for players to play in their free time in an online multiplayer style format.
Stay alive in this post-apocalyptic battleground by battling unexpected enemies and outwitting top strategic alliances. Hone in your strategic skills by upgrading your troops, developing captain enhancements, and joining up with others to fight for survival.

name: Football Players Quiz
summary: Test Your Football knowledge with our Football Players quiz!  Guess the names of the top 275 football players by correctly identifying their face. To help you along the way you can earn hints and tips as well as stars that will reveal the less obvious ones! If you still get stuck you can also ask a friend on Facebook and Twitter to help you with the answer.  So you think you know football? Lets see how far you get....    More Tips for your success:  Type the full name of the player for maximum points or alternatively type just the first name, surname or nickname for a pass.

name: Font Quiz
summary:
Can you recognise these famous fonts from movies, brands, video games, tv shows and bands?
Font Quiz is a free app with more than 200 different fonts to identify. Simply tap on a font and type in the name..

name: Foolball
summary: Foolball is a medieval sports game where two gladiators battle until the king is pleased. Those two gladiators battle by playing a game where the fool is a ball and burning loops are the goals.

name: Four Squares
summary: Four Squares is a game of memory, skill, and concentration. Watch what happens each turn and repeat what you see. Each time you successfully repeat the sequence it is lengthened, the speed increases, and your thinking time is shortened. Keep practising, work your way up the leaderboards, and challenge your friends.

name: Forest of Frequencies
summary:
Step into a world where music, magic and nature collide.

Forest of Frequencies is a single player music adventure strategy game where you can explore a world filled with dangerous creatures, breath taking flora and spirits looking for their bodies. Music, visual art & gameplay comes together to form a unique experience made for those who love the interplay and combination of art forms.

name: Ford Racing: Full Blown
summary: Ford Racing: Full Blown is a racing game released by Sega in 2006. The game is an arcade port of the 2005 console and PC title Ford Racing 3 (also developed by Razorworks but published by Empire Interactive) but with some adjustments made for arcade play.

name: Forgotten Seas
summary: You are lost in the Bermuda Void, where the ocean is endless and dry land precious. Craft your Ship-in-a-Bottle, then experience survival on the high seas. Sail for new land, build camps, hunt for treasures, trade for goods - then defend your ship from dreaded pirates stalking this strange realm!

name: FoamFix
summary: FoamFix is a mod designed to optimize certain aspects of a modded Minecraft experience using simple, targeted optimizations.

name: Forest Life
summary: Players will play as five different characters and experience five environmental theme scenes relating to sustainable palm oil, orangutan conservation, rainforest protection, etc. Players need to make a variety of choices through their own understanding, and reach different story endings.

name: Forsaken AR: Factory Reset
summary:
Forsaken AR is a modded client of Five Nights at Freddy's AR, that continues from where Illumix left off. Forsaken AR adds a ton of new features and content to the game, while keeping the best parts of FNaF AR, including:

- Brand new skins, with more to be released over time!
- Brand new characters with custom CPUs, with even more to come in the future!
- Brand new exclusive profile icons to collect!
- Tons of quality of life improvements, tweaks to mechanics, and lots of bug fixes!
- Live service adding new content each and every month, active support, and much, much more!

If you're a fan of FNaF AR, why not try out Forsaken AR? There's so much fun, fun, fun, to be had, with all of the same content that made you love the original!

name: Football Penalty
summary:
In the entertaining "Football Penalty" app, you, in turn represent itself as direct and the goalkeeper.
In the app simple and intuitively clear management.
In the menu choose quantity of shots on goal and tap "Play". When you the forward, concern a gate corner to which send a ball. When you the goalkeeper, concern a gate corner in which catch a ball.
Check the intuition. Foresee the direction of a jump of the goalkeeper or kick of the forward.
In the menu you can choose quantity of shots on goal from 5 to 50.
In each series of shots on goal the best and last results remain.
Score the maximum quantity of the goals at the minimum quantity of missed goals.
Good luck!

name: For Honor: Afeera Hero
summary: Embody the Afeera, tactical geniuses of the battlefield. They can deftly dispatch an enemy with their mace and shield.

name: Food Maze
summary: Play as a cooking frog and bring ingredients in cauldrons in this cute and colorful sokoban.

name: Foxy's Coin Hunt
summary: Foxy's Coin Hunt is an exciting platformer game where players take on the role of Foxy, a cute fox who travels through different worlds to collect as many coins as possible. Along the way, Foxy must face a variety of enemies.

name: Food For Pigs
summary:
It tells you, "A good farmer always feeds his pigs."
Feed the pigs.
Entry 1 in the Food For Pigs Cinematic Universe.

name: For the Motherland
summary: For The Motherland is a horror game set in a Soviet space station on the brink of collapse. Experience multiple game modes as you uncover the terrifying stories of the station's demise. Can you survive the horrors and uncover the truth? The fate of the Motherland rests in your hands.

name: Fox of the moon
summary: Fox of the moon is a virtual reality game that will take you on an epic adventure with Akami, a white fox with supernatural powers.

name: Fortune Handlers
summary: Fortune Handlers is a mix of a classic RPG and CCG. In the game, instead of cards with different abilities, you define the actions of the characters by rolling dice. Each dice has various effects on its faces.

name: Fool's Gold: Dice, Death & Dating
summary: Fool's Gold: Dice, Death & Dating is a TTRPG-inspired dating adventure game in which you, a daring adventurer, dive into the world's deadliest jungle to get a hot date for the annual Bundariko Ball.

name: Foxventures
summary: Welcome to the classic 2D platform game where you play as a brave fox. Help the fox go through various obstacles, destroy all the monsters and reach the end of the lands.

name: Forge Horizon
summary: Forge Horizon is an arcade style shooter with fast-paced gameplay. Customize your weapons and armor by selecting, upgrading, or crafting them.

name: Fog Horror
summary: Fog Horror - psychological horror game. You'll fall into oppressive atmosphere here. Watch out hostile entities entire the viscose void!

name: Fortune Familia
summary: Sebastian Kittorio joins the Meowfia in order to figure out what happened to his father. However, a simple mystery and a life-changing decision turns to madness as Sebastian faces danger he never would have expected.

name: Foreign Body
summary: Get in, get out. Borough 563 of the Keld district has a Departed problem. Freaks, augmented beyond human recognition. This place… something’s wrong here.

name: For Evelyn II: Shards of Creation
summary: For Evelyn II is a captivating adventure RPG in the magical world of Aura. Rich story, handcrafted 2D/3D environments, classic adventuring, choices, and retro pixel art. Explore, level up, and immerse yourself in an unforgettable journey where your decisions shape your destiny.

name: Folia: The King's Revelry
summary: Restore Folia to a world shrouded in darkness as you explore the wonders of the Brazilian landscape to find Talia's sister.

name: Forgotten Mines
summary: Wreak vengeance and retake lost mines from goblins, orcs, skeletons, and demons in this small-scale tactical roguelite RPG. Build the perfect expedition team and turn the underworld red with each challenging, fast-paced run.

name: Forest towers
summary: Forest towers is a tower defense strategy in which you will have an exciting adventure.

name: For Honor: Black Prior Hero Skin
summary:
Commander Ravier has been sent to Arabia to retrieve the sultana’s most guarded treasure. Steal the secrets of the Celestial Sphere and become the master of fate with the Commander Ravier Black Prior Hero Skin, a full body customization that transforms you into Heathmoor’s most merciless Black Prior.

The Commander Ravier Black Prior Hero Skin offer includes:

One Black Prior Hero Skin
Seven-Day Champion Status
Three Scavenger Crates

name: Formula 2707: All Stars Kombat
summary: Formula 2707 - All Stars Kombat is a combat driving simulator inspired by the great hits of the 2000s. It recreates the classic arcade game action and offers fun without speed limits. Formula 2707 offers a split-screen multiplayer mode for those who miss long couch nights with friends.

name: Four Hundred Catapults
summary: City builder & Survival. When the dead get close enough, they can use the deadly fog to take control of your settlements. Build a strong economy to supply your warriors with long-range weapons and massive fortifications. This is the only chance to survive.

name: Forza Street: Tap to Race
summary: Race through the ultimate street racing scene at dizzying speed with the tap of your finger! Have fun winning the racing car collection of your dreams. Pick an event, choose a lineup of cars from your collection, and start racing for infamy in the first Forza game for mobile.

name: Fox Runner Adventures
summary:
Monsters appeared in the mysterious forest, which captured the crystals and prevent the inhabitants of the forest from living in peace.
You have to take on the task of cleaning the forest and preserve the crystals. This will help you to different characters with unique abilities.
Do not forget to improve the abilities of the characters, and you will win!
Good luck, the forest is on your side!

name: Football 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
summary: A game in the "Breakthrough Gaming Arcade" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine - Gold Edition
Foosball Cup World
summary:
Foosball Cup World: The ultimate table soccer game experience for you!
A brand new experience for the millions of fans, building on the success of the original Foosball Cup game.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine - Complete Edition
Forklift Extreme: Impound Lot
summary: Play 10 brand new levels and get special operator skin. Unique environment and challenges awaits!

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine - Expansion Pack
Folf
summary:
Welcome to Folf!
This is where Football meets Golf.
The par 3 courses have been designed to challenge your putting skills. Shoot through portals and tight spaces to avoid the explosions and make the put.
Be sure to pay attention to messages displayed on the levels, otherwise you may find yourself falling off the edge into the water!

name: Football Heroes 2015
summary: Football Heroes 2015 is here with an all new season of over-the-top arcade football action! Fight your way to the end zone using skill, strategy, and special moves to smash the competition and bring home the win. Power up your players and customize your roster to build the ultimate football team in the universe. You have never seen a football game quite like this!

name: Forbidden Trip
summary: A Total Conversion for Amnesia: TDD. A parallel space & time, your story. No memories of last night. Strange. Being a little paranoid, you junkie? Reconsider your bad habits someday… for now, recover crucial documents before leaving the country tomorrow. Be quick, don't think. Easy.

name: Fool's Curse
summary: Fight your way through 13 retro inspired stages. Utilize the powers of your enemies to create over 70 magic spells and explore multiple routes on your way to the mysterious castle!

name: Fort Valen
summary: A desert fantasy murder-mystery following young involuntary shut-in Vishara Vakricustos as she attempts to solve a murder plot to prove herself to her overprotective mother.

name: Focus
summary: In this photography horror game, the player takes on the role of a budding photographer who is hired to document an abandoned, haunted mansion. The player's goal is to capture as many ghostly images as possible while exploring the creepy, creaky old mansion.

name: Foad
summary: Foad is a competitive party game featuring explosive devices with a thirst for chaos and destruction.

name: Forget Me Not, My Love
summary: “We’re your fiances.” Three of your fiances show up after you wake up in the hospital! However, you can’t remember a single thing since you’ve lost all of your memories… Everything is a haze now due to you getting in an accident, and all you want to know is: who is your real fiance?

name: Fortnite: Fallen Love Ranger Quest Pack
summary: Take on the quests issued by the Fallen Love Ranger and earn up to 2,000 V-Bucks! Includes an Outfit, Back Bling and Quests to earn up to 2,000 V-Bucks.

name: Football Seasons
summary:
Football Seasons is a fast paced deck building game about football world.
The thrill of an entire championship in an exciting board game.

name: Folded Flyer
summary: Paper planes have never soared like this before! Guide your paper glider through a colorful world full of danger and secrets to uncover. Innocent kitchen counters and coffee tables become challenging obstacles for your paper flyer. With lots to explore and hidden collectibles to find, you're set for a fun airborne adventure!

name: Forklift Extreme Simulator
summary: Forklift Extreme simulator 2022 gives you the complete physics challenge and handling feeling adventure that you ever wanted. Ride in the warehouses and pick up the pallets to place them in required locations on different shelves and heights. Sometimes you will need to do multiple drop-off and pickups in this incredible forklift challenge 3D simulator.

name: Fox Girl Taming
summary: What kind of changes will happen to the cute little fox after you bring it home? Domestication Project - Transformation of Foxes!

name: FoxTrotte
summary:
FoxTrotte makes you play Mr. Fox chasing Mr. Crow, the stealer of his beloved cheese!
He sees his soulmate fly away in the evil talons of his nemesis!
Be quick, help him get his precious wheel of cheese back!

name: Fortress VR
summary: FORTRESS IS BACK WITH VR! is multiplayer artillery shooting VR game. Choose unique tank characters and face other players in thrilling PvP strategy and action! The realistic battle scene in front of you awaits!

name: Forbidden Dojo
summary: Embark on an erotic journey where the line between fantasy and reality is blurred. In this sensual visual novel, you are caught between two beautiful and deadly warriors, each with their own unique allure. With each choice you make, the story will unfold, revealing a tale of passion and intrigue.

name: Folklands
summary: Folklands is a grid-based, relaxing settlement builder with simulated citizens. Grow your settlement from humble beginnings to a bustling town. Harvest resources, manage food supply and make sure your folks are happy, employed and safe.

name: Forsake The Rake
summary: You and Your friend are on a quest to find the truth about The Rake. Investigation took you to the forest where is a secret underground lab. Search the abandoned underground lab and find the truth about the Rake!

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
summary: Jump into your food truck and business will bump up! Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck! Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible. Be careful not to burn the food! Fulfill your dream of becoming the tycoon of the best food trucks in the city!

name: For The Freedom!
summary: Become a medieval gladiator in roguelike deckbuilder game! Build your own deck and tactics to beat dangerous enemies! Get, upgrade and discover new cards. Explore next arenas and climb the hierarchy. Fight for freedom!

name: Forbidden City Journey
summary: This is a VR tour game based on the real picture, which can not only allows players to immerse themselves in the majesty of the Forbidden City, but also to understand the culture and history of the Forbidden City through a mini-game.

name: Football Showdown 2
summary:
Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone in the world in a head-to-head Football Showdown!
Join a division and battle for supremacy in online tournaments, or compete in single player seasons as your favorite team.
Timing, intuition, reflexes, and pure skill. Control every aspect of your game with the revolutionary PhysKick engine.
All new Boosts! Use 'em wisely to refine your next play, or steal them from your opponent to get a leg up!
Hyper-realistic graphics and heart pounding multiplayer action drop you right on the gridiron.

name: Forest Defenders
summary:
Forest Defenders is a 3D Tower Defense game base on an untold story...
Once upon a time, on a barren planet, a huge asteroid fell from the sky, exploded and then pieces of magic crystal covered the ground. After that, at the place where the asteroid exploded, a strange giant tree appeared and grew up, became the Mother Tree. That tree used the energy of the crystal, spread life to whole the planet. Not only that, the tree also brought magical power to species, and transformed them into magical Elves. The land around the Mother Tree, where the most energy was concentrated, grew up a lively forest, the Lucy Forest, with the most powerful Elves lived there.
After a long time, human appeared, they created kingdoms, they used crystals to serve their life, they made wars to each other to scramble these powers.
Next to Lucy Forest is the kingdom of Apotan, ruled by the Greedy King. By the inciting of the evil wizard, the King of Apotan ordered his soldiers to come to Lucy Forest, forced to rob the ancient tree, in order to control the great power of the crystal.
Now, the Forest Elves must unite to protect the Mother Tree, against the legion of greedy humans who want to plunder the forest's life force and the green of the land.

name: Fortnite: Marvel - Royalty & Warriors
summary: Warriors can be formed for any reason, whether it be a king's responsibility, a soldier's duty or a hired gun's price.

name: Forspoken: In Tanta We Trust
summary: Continuing her search for a way to eradicate the Break from Athia once and for all, Frey finds herself following a mysterious voice that leads her to a place that somehow transports her to the Purge of the Rheddig, the legendary battle that devastated Athia and eventually drove the Tantas to madness.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 2: Mega
summary: Become Mega in Fortnite Battle Royale: Chapter 4 Season 2! Ride the grind rails of Mega City and swerve on it's streets on a sports bike. Go beyond the neon towers to the rest of the new biome: Cause havoc at Steamy Springs, drive a Nitro Drifter to the Drift Ridge car track, sharpen your Kinetic Blade skills at Kenjutsu Crossing and more!

name: Four Color
summary:
Are you right-brained or left-brained? Do you see color or text first?
You may be comfortable about this game, or thrown into disorder. Test yourself!

name: Football Owner
summary:
Take your team to the very top!
Take ownership of a club of your choice and develop the club how you want.
Make life easy and select an established club with superior finances, excellent facilities and a squad of talented players or really challenge yourself select a lower league club with limited funds, poor facilities and limited squad depth and ability! Can you develop a small local club into one of the world’s biggest clubs?
As owner it’s up to you how you run the club. Perhaps sell your best players and invest in youth development to ensure the long-term future of the club? Or simply buy the best players you can afford and make a charge for promotion? Or play it safe and slowly develop the club stadium and fan base to generate more cash before pushing for promotion?
It’s up to you but remember to balance the books otherwise it’s all over! Can you manage the club finances whilst delivering a successful team? Prove it…

name: Football Heroes Online
summary: The first real-time online multiplayer football game is finally here! Fight your way to the end zone using skill, strategy and super moves to smash the competition. Collect and upgrade hundreds of unique players to build the ultimate football team. Get online and experience the most action-packed football game in the universe!

name: Foggy Street
summary: It’s a full 3D flying adventure game. Cute bird characters fly through a dangerous, narrow, and foggy street while avoiding colorful clothing and undergarments, thus creating a nerve wrecking, accelerating app. The obstacles are coming towards you since you are in the perspective of the adorable bird. It gets faster and faster!

name: Fox4Elite
summary: Fox4Elite is a dynamic female FPS and TPS strategic shooter - fast paced and challenging. Lead a team of highly skilled Agents in order to defeat a murderous female clone army. Deploy your Agent fire teams for strategic advantage against the enemy and survive to complete the mission objectives

name: For Honor: Pirate Hero Skin
summary: Become a rogue warrior with the Hero Skin of Inquisitor Yinchen, a full-body customization of the Pirate.

name: Four: The Space Fight
summary: Face-to-face multi-player fun or the challenge of a single-player career mode. A carefully crafted space shooter, that stands out of others in the genre with a different approach, fast paced gameplay, and unique design.

name: Forge of the Fae
summary: Explore a story-rich, mysterious world inspired by Celtic folklore, use crystals to channel powerful magic, and make impactful choices that change the story's outcome. A unique Crystal System and battles with dangerous Fae await in this charming, pixel-style, retro modern RPG.

name: Food Dude
summary: Food Dude is a cancelled game for the CD-i.

name: Focus
summary:
Focus is a platformer with a teleporting twist. The main character escapes
from a cage and soon finds a glowing gem that gives him the power to move
quickly through space and even pass through solid objects.

name: Fobia ...Worse Than Fear.
summary: An adventure of exploration, intrigue and psychological terror of great originality.

name: Four-Knight
summary: Four-Knight is a simple four-in-a-row. Act strategically on the simple rules and aim for your victory.

name: ForbiddenWord
summary: Let the other person say the forbidden word! A psychological chat game that takes care of your own forbidden word and draws out the other player's forbidden words!

name: Fortnite: Cross Comms Pack
summary: When Tegan is on comms, she never misses a callout. Clear, concise and to the point with the Cross Comms pack. Includes 1 Outfit, 1 Back Bling, 1 Pickaxe and 600 V-Bucks.

name: Fortune Follow: The Mansion
summary: An exciting game that will take you through an atmosphere of terror and suspense as you solve challenging puzzles to advance through different rooms.

name: Form Fitting
summary: Form Fitting is a casual puzzle game where players must pick up different shaped blocks and drag them into the corresponding empty slots.

name: Forgotten Warrior
summary: Forgotten Warrior is an action game which came pre-installed on certain models of Samsung mobile phones. The premise of the game is simple: a boy loves a girl; when the boy is asleep an evil gang kidnaps the girl. The boy is awakened by his brother who tells him what has happened and instructs him along the way. The game is played on static screens with platforms, enemies, hazards, etc. In the beginning the boy has no weapons, so he must avoid all enemies or attack them stealthy with a punch. Later on he acquires a weapon and magical spells. Along the way the boy can collect coins which allow him to buy spells and potions.

name: Food Truck Tycoon + Flowlines VS
summary:
Enjoy the two in one gaming bundle with Flowlines VS and Food Truck Tycoon:

In Food Truck Tycoon, test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck, where your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve as many customers as possible. With 150 levels to explore and over 50 dishes to serve, players can upgrade their ingredients and bar decorations, and complete achievements to become the tycoon of the best food trucks in the city.

In Flowlines VS, a classic puzzle video game for 1 or 2 players, players will compete to solve puzzles by pairing up all the matching sockets on the board with continuous lines, without crossing over other lines or branching off. With time-limited stages or a limit on moves per stage, it's a game that's easy to play, but hard to master.

Try out this bundle today and become the ultimate chef and puzzle solver!

name: Fourteen Fiends
summary: Fourteen Fiends is a single player fantasy action adventure card game!

name: Forever Quester
summary: Forever Quester is your quest companion, playing the rpg that you just don't have the time to play while you're living your own life. When you turn your phone on and check the game, your hero will update you on what you've missed. Help him choose weapons, armors, mounts and professions, and check back often to see how he is progressing! Guide him as he seeks out the evil Xaxoor on a quest that could very well go on forever!

name: Football Fan: Run Team Run!
summary: Looking for extremely addictive soccer/football game? Try Football Fun! Choose your team and ball type (football, tennis, golf, basketball, baseball, pool, rugby etc.) and start the rush!

name: Folk Hero
summary: Folk Hero is an action-slasher with rogue-lite elements set in the world of Slavic fantasy. Explore the ever-changing island, find treasures, combine weapons and artifacts to defeat mythical enemies. Challenge your skills! One life, one attempt.

name: Forgebeast
summary: Brawl your way to the center of the Earth as Mosh, a Chosen Blacksmith. Your Forgebeasts will transform into your weapons as you gather items from slain foes and interact with a unique hand-drawn world. Choose how to bond with your Forgebeast to unlock different stats, skills, and abilities.

name: Food Boy
summary: Food Boy is a wholesome pizza delivery arcade game that everyone can play! Ride your bike through different streets, try to keep balance, and avoid obstacles to make more deliveries and get the highest scores.

name: Forgotten House
summary: Try to escape from the old grandfather from his decrepit house by solving riddles. The game is inspired by Gnarled hag

name: Forging Ahead
summary: Craft weapons and armor using fun physics, run your own shop, hire adventurers, level up your reputation, and more. With multiplayer options and endless possibilities, this game is perfect for you whether you are a casual gamer or want to grind out all the possibilities!

name: Folk Emerging
summary: Lead nomadic families through the Stone Age in this turn-based 4X strategy game with in-depth characters, cultures, and ecosystems. Explore the wilderness, hunt megafauna, outsmart competitors in trade & autobattler combat. Discover fire, agriculture, politics... and survive to tell the tale.

name: Forgive Me Father 2
summary: Embark on a journey into the darkest nightmares to restore your sanity. Blast your way through hordes of possessed enemies, unlock an arsenal of deadly weapons and get ready to face even more Lovecraftian madness in this action-packed FPS sequel.

name: Football Saga Fantasista
summary:
Build your professional football career in Fantasista, a social football simulation game where you can be the godlike footballer in the field. Create your character, train hard, join the professional club with your friends and bring your club to be the champion.

In Fantasista you will feel the social competitive spirit at online simulation league. Join a team based on your favorite city with other players to build the best and most united team to conquer the world’s top football league & cup.

name: Foxblade
summary: Enter a war-torn land full of dangers, find powerful weapons and artifacts, make friends and complete their quests, make enemies and hack and slash your way through them, discover the mysteries of the land and earn your place in the world.

name: Fool's Gold
summary: Fool’s Gold is a chaotic, couch co-op adventure-themed heist! Two bumbling explorers will work together to traverse ancient tombs and temples, grabbing as much treasure as they can, while contending with deadly traps, perilous enemies, and environmental puzzles.

name: Follow Me
summary: A great pixel adventure in a vast, coluorful world. Aren't you curious what's behind the door? You wouldn't know until you look there. Follow the white rabbit. Exploration, interaction, friends, enemies and even some bosses to defeat. All this in a beautiful pixel art 2D platformer.

name: Football Basketball Soccer: 3 Games in One
Forklift Extreme: Furniture Direct
summary: Play 10 brand new levels and get special operator skin. Unique environment and challenges awaits!

name: Footy Ball: Pass Pass Soccer
summary:
The new lean, mean game of soccer. Fast, high-tempo games of football designed for pick-up and play.
Quick matches where the players auto-run and you use one finger to pass and score wonderful goals. Its easy to learn but hard to master in this semi-retro game.
Take your fictitious team from the lower leagues at the start of the 2017 - 2018 season to the top tier of your chosen country.

name: Fossick Underground
summary: Guide the machine to collect all of the coins while escaping to the other side.

name: Forces of Mobius
summary: Forces of Mobius the third game in the series of Magnus Andersson RPGs.

name: Forever In The Backrooms
summary: Explore and survive levels based on the popular creepypasta lore. Each level offers various escape routes but also introduces perilous obstacles. Players can immerse themselves in the seemingly boundless and unsettling levels of the backrooms, experiencing the game's eerie and intricate mazes.

name: Forbidden Sparks of Passion
summary: Forbidden Sparks of Passion is an adult-only visual for adults! This fascinating story tells about a young man who fell in love with his neighbor and fucked her more than once! However, she had a husband who was extremely unhappy with what was happening.

name: Forever Drive
summary:
From the makers of MiniSquadron and EpicWin we present Forever Drive!
Forever Drive is a racing game set in a beautiful 3D futuristic city made, in part, by You! Using the built-in Track Editor, tracks created by different players are joined together into a never-ending road to drive! Customise your car from a huge selection of paintwork and license plates and prepare to drive as far as you can before the clock runs out! Accumulate miles driven to level up and unlock even more cars, each with their own unique handling.

name: Forest Adventure
summary: A generic 2D platformer where Nature Clan must reach the end goal.

name: Football Rivals
summary: Football Rivals is a free multiplayer mobile football game. With daily matches, and various competitions. this game mainly focuses on working together as a team and competing against other teams with real players. In this game the users are the players as it doesn't have neither real life professional teams or professional players.

name: Fossil Sweeper
summary: Fossil Sweeper is a game about excavating fossils and building skeletons of prehistoric animals.

name: Fortress S
summary: The lastest installment in the beloved Fortress series, a fresh take on the artillery shooter genre.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Co-op Edition
summary:
Jump into your food truck and business will bump up!
Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck!

Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

Be careful not to burn the food!

name: Forced Sacrifice: Hejled
summary: This game provides a fun and challenging experience for gamers who enjoy fast, skill-based arcade-style games with immersive audiovisuals and a focus on high scores.

name: Foresia: The Cursed Oath
summary: Foresia is a rare High Elf living in the Spirit Tree Forest. Suddenly, monsters set fire to her village and Foresia is captured and enslaved. With the help of the spirit, she manages to escape but is plagued by a curse she cannot resist.

name: Foxnox
summary: Explore the world as a little fox. Be careful, this adventure will not be easy!

name: Fortress of the Undead
summary: "Fortress of the Undead" is an intense zombie survival game. Scavenge for weapons and ammo, fight off hundreds or thousands of zombies with up to 4 players, and try to survive as long as possible.

name: Forest of Deceit
summary: Forest of Deceit is a 4-8 player social deduction game where you use your phones to play!

name: Forastero
summary: A town without a sheriff is the least of your problems when you have a bounty on your head. Forastero is a third-person beat 'em up game.

name: Fossilfuel 2
summary: Navigate the open-world underground base of the Sierra Research Facility, now flooded, while being relentlessly pursued by towering dinosaurs. With 12 hours of heart-pounding FPS survival horror gameplay and a full cast of prehistoric enemies, can you outwit the dangers and make your escape?

name: Forbidden
summary: Forbidden is a mystery and romance visual novel where the player has the opportunity to choose their own adventure. The player will have to choose a subject for their thesis: History, Mathematics or Literature. You'll unlock different scenes and illustrations with each characters, in addition to have the opportunity to create a bond, learn more about them and their own secrets. Maybe even fall for one of them? Or have a platonic and friendly relationship? The choice is yours!

name: Food Street: Restaurant Game
summary:
Welcome to Food Street, a free restaurant and cafe management world!
You are the Master Chef of your own cafe, bakery, diner or restaurant!
Build and decorate the kitchen and restaurant of your dreams in a stunning 3D world and start cooking with a huge selection of fresh ingredients. Build a bakery to bake tasty dishes from all around the world, make street food, or create a 5-star restaurant that meets everyone’s appetite!
Visit friends, trade items with other my restaurant owners around cafe world and play together in friendly online competitions!
Keep all the customers in food town happy as you bake, cook and do even more in Food Street, your restaurant story in cafe land!

name: Forty Foes
summary: Pugilists prepare, The battle is about to begin...Forty Foes is a side-scrolling action adventure Beat 'em up in the style of classics like Double Dragon Battle Toads and Turtles in Time.

name: Football Boss: Be The Manager
summary:
Build and run your own football empire!
Have you always wanted to run your own football club and lead it to huge success?
In Football Boss, your dream can come true! It’s your team, your staff, your own football empire.
Create a football club from scratch and lead it to new heights…
Start as a small non-league team, take it sky high through 10 divisions to conquer the top.

name: Formula One
summary: A formula One management game.

name: Foodie Avenue
summary: Build a town filled with restaurants from all over the world in Foodie Avenue. You’ll cook food from all cultures using ingredients produced by your own town. Create a world famous food destination and earn money by completing food orders from visiting foodies.

name: Four Chambers of the Human Heart
summary:
A professional cosplayer leads an ordinary life.

He takes on a job in pest control, where his boss insists he works in full cosplay to differentiate the business from the competition.

The story follows the indignation and humiliation of the protagonist, as he aims to become independently wealthy.

name: Foamstars
summary:
A 4v4 online party shooter from Square Enix that has you battling to foam as much of the city as you can while avoiding your opponents traps and weapons.

Use foam to build terrain, creating slippery surfaces to surf around the arena at high speed, help defend from enemy attacks, or create vantage points to take out opponents.

And most importantly, to foam up the opposition!
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Fortune Miles Away
summary: Fortunes Miles Away is your ultimate cars racing competition blending unique missions, extensive choice of cars and actions-packed adventures. Wait no more, pick up your car, accept the first mission and off you go! Opportunities are everywhere and the more risky, the more rewarding they will be.

name: Forum Mortuorum
summary: Your gladiator school awaits you. You decide whom to hire, which matches to fight, and how to equip and train your gladiators. Set tactics for your gladiators, then throw them into the arena for fame and profit. Advance through the leagues, conquer great foes, and emblazon your name upon history.

name: Forklift 2024: The Simulation
summary: Get ready to take on the ultimate forklift simulation experience with Forklift 2024 - The Simulation! Operate your very own forklift and complete randomly generated orders to earn money and expand your warehouse. With a variety of goods to handle and increasing complexity as you progress, this game will keep you on your toes!

name: Food Truck Tycoon + Knights & Guns
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure filled with culinary delights and medieval action with the Food Truck Tycoon + Knights and Guns Bundle!

name: Forgotten War
summary: A "historical" strategy on the theme of wars of different times and peoples with funny characters and nice graphics. The game has a campaign with 16 levels and a sandbox.A "historical" strategy on the theme of wars of different times and peoples with funny characters and physics.

name: Forgotlings
summary: Forgotlings is a breathtaking cinematic action-adventure set in a magical land of sentient forgotten objects.

name: Forklift Extreme: Ultra Edition
summary:
Get ready to rev your engines and stack your way to glory in Forklift Extreme simulator!
This hyper-realistic forklift game puts you in the driver's seat, with highly-detailed physics that mimic the movement and handling of real forklifts. Master a variety of forklifts with unique handling characteristics, and tackle a wide range of tasks and challenges.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 3: Wilds
summary: Find out what Fortnite Wilds is all about when a squad uncovers what's beneath the crumbling terrain. Danger is afoot, but so is adventure! Be on the lookout for mud, raptors, and vines as these will all play a key part in navigating WILDS. Plus, an Autobot bestows his likeness upon the Island.

name: Forest Horror
summary: You have to explore the mysterious forest and complete many tasks to get out of there alive.

name: Football Keepy Uppy Champion
summary:
Can you keepy uppy a football or soccer ball? Are you Football Keepy Uppy Champion material?
Football Keepy Uppy Champion will tests your reflexes to the max! Try and bounce as many footballs/soccer balls as you can. if any of them drop then it's GAME OVER!

name: Food Magician
summary: Food Magician is an fantasy action-adventure/RPG game that filled with hidden treasures, dangerous creatures, and ancient ruins. With stunning graphics and beautiful music, Food Magician features various gameplay mechanics, including real-time combat, traps, and puzzle-solving.

name: Four Lights
summary: "Four Light" by Visual Novel, urban fantasy RomanceA world where humans use superpowers all over the world.The stage is a story that takes place in the fictional city of Gaon City in modern times (about 2020).

name: Fox Adventure: Homeward Journey
summary: A challenging 2D platform game.

name: Forsaken Quartet
summary: Humanity has gone nearly extinct. Only four humans remain—two men and two women, desperate to survive on a floating island. As they spend more time together, arguments on how to move forward threaten to drive the four of them apart.

name: Folly Of The Wizards
summary: Folly Of The Wizards is a comedic 2D roguelike action game that puts you in the shoes of a clumsy wizard apprentice. Join a wacky wizard cult and use unique spells to defeat enemies, explore procedurally generated dungeons, and save the world from chaos.

name: Forbidden Magic
summary: You’re a new paranormal agent with a tricky case. With your hellhound partner and devil boss, can you catch a magical arsonist before you lose your heart?

name: Forklift Racer
summary: Forklift Racer is a brand new arcade forklift experience. With realistic handling, and online multiplayer, Forklift Racer offers an experience like no other. Customize your Forklift, play with friends, and race to the finish line!

name: Fortnite: Sapphire Hagiri Quest Pack
summary: The Sapphire Serpent will help Charlotte unlock her true potential. Includes an Outfit w/ style, a Back Bling, 2 Pickaxes, a Wrap and Quests to earn up to 1,500 V-Bucks.

name: Fortnite: Voidlander Pack
summary: Leave only destruction as you pass through the void. In Absenz you will find the path of the Voidlander.

name: Fortnite: Diamond Diva Pack
summary: Shine like a diamond with the Diamond Diva pack.

name: Forest of Lesbians
summary: A fantasy comedy hybrid visual novel. Simple fast paced action/puzzle gameplay between story elements. Anime/pixelart/jrpg style.

name: Fortnite: Coldest Circle Quest Pack
summary:
When fiends freeze over you get the Coldest Circles Quest Pack. Complete Quests to unlock:
- Underworld Desdemona Outfit
- Frozen Oculara Back Bling
- Cold Furia Pickaxe
- Frozen Over Wrap

name: Forza Motorsport: Premium Edition
summary: Forza Motorsport Premium Edition includes the full game with up to 5 days early access, Race Day Car Pack, Car Pass (30 cars delivered to your game weekly, one per week), VIP Membership and Welcome Pack.

name: Formula Evolution 2024
summary: The first ever true MMO formula racing game is here! Play with up to 39 friends!

name: Fortune Lover Trial Version: Geordo Edition
summary:
Included as a bonus disc in the Japanese My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! Blu-ray Package Vol 1.

A original Mini PC Game included in the Blu-ray releases of the My Next life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! as a bonus disc. Each disc contains a 15-30 minute trial game, showing a preview of the events within the world of the original game.

name: Fortune Lover Trial Version: Keith Edition
summary:
Included as a bonus disc in the Japanese My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! Blu-ray Package Vol 2.

A original Mini PC Game included in the Blu-ray releases of the My Next life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! as a bonus disc. Each disc contains a 15-30 minute trial game, showing a preview of the events within the world of the original game.

name: Fortune Lover Trial Version: Alan Edition
summary:
Included as a bonus disc in the Japanese My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! Blu-ray Package Vol 3.

A original Mini PC Game included in the Blu-ray releases of the My Next life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! as a bonus disc. Each disc contains a 15-30 minute trial game, showing a preview of the events within the world of the original game.

name: Fortune Lover Trial Version: Nicol Edition
summary:
Included as a bonus disc in the Japanese My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! Blu-ray Package Vol 4.

A original Mini PC Game included in the Blu-ray releases of the My Next life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! as a bonus disc. Each disc contains a 15-30 minute trial game, showing a preview of the events within the world of the original game.

name: Fortnite: Triarch Nox Crew Pack
summary:
The cosmetics included in April's pack have now been sent to the lockers of all Fortnite Crew members, with the option to purchase it available through the in-game Battle Pass tab to those who are not currently subscribed.

The latest Crew Pack includes:

Triarch Nox Outfit
Midnight Aegis Back Bling
Starlit Sai Pickaxe
Noxious Wrap
Photonic Legacy Pickaxe
Chapter 4, Season 2 Battle Pass (or 950 V-Bucks)
1,000 V-Bucks

name: For Double
summary: For Double is a side-view game where the player controls rectangular figures, dodging dangerous figures, jumping on platforms that randomly change and move, the game has the possibility of a competitive game for two.

name: Forklift Simulator 2023
summary: Start your job in this realistic forklift simulator. Experience realistic controls, intricate maneuvering, and precise cargo handling. Complete missions, master different forklift models, and prove your skills in this immersive simulation game.

name: Fortnite: Transformers Pack
summary:
Roll out, Rise up, or Beep Beep with the Fortnite Transformers Pack! Physical copies of this Pack will roll out at retail starting October 13, and digital copies will be available in digital stores starting October 21.

This new Pack includes:
- 3 New Outfits
- 3 New Back Blings
- 3 New Pickaxes
- 2 New Emotes
- 1,000 V-Bucks

name: Forest Phantoms
summary: Forest Phantoms is an addictive horror-survival game in which players beat back the spirits of the forest to keep their fires burning and survive as long as possible.

name: Fortnite: Intrepid Engines Pack
summary: She's the engineer you want for all your mechanical needs. Time to fix things on the fly with the Intrepid Engines pack. Includes an Outfit, Back Bling, Pickaxe and 600 V-Bucks.

name: Fortnite: True Colors Pack
summary:
This pack includes:

- Vivi Chroma Outfit
- Scribbles Back Bling

name: Football Cup 2023
summary: Unleash your football skills like never before and show other countries who's the best team in the world! Lace up your boots and prepare for an unparalleled soccer experience!

name: Fortnite: Full Clip STW Pack
summary: Homebase's surefire munitions maker finally gets to use her wares. Restock, reload and get ready with the Full Clip Pack.

name: F.O.O.D.S.
summary: Decode alien recipes and cook peculiar dishes while solving puzzles and work as a team to become the greatest fast-food service in the universe!

name: Four Nights at Omori
summary: Four Nights at Omori is a mod that turns the game into a FNaF-styled survival horror.

name: Foxy Jumper 2
summary: Foxy Jumper 2 is the second game in the series and has the same objective as the first game Foxy Jumper.

name: Foxy Jumper 2: Winter Adventures
summary: Foxy Jumper 2: Winter Adventures is a Christmas themed version of the 2D platform game Foxy Jumper 2

name: Fold & Cut
summary:
Make folds like real paper and cut when you’re ready to match to the target shape.
Challenge part is to make less cuts, ideally only one.
It might sound easy but, as the game progresses it definitely becomes more challenging and levels will become much harder to solve.
Be ready for more than 400 levels of fun!

name: Fox Run
summary: Improve your reflexes and gain more experience in your skills to avoid obstacles in your way

name: Forgotten
summary: Welcome to an epic adventure in a CYOF (Choose Your Own Fantasy), DnD-inspired (Dungeons and Dragons) RPG (Role-Playing Game) on your mobile device! In this immersive game, you play as a half-elf, navigating through a classic RPG world filled with danger, mystery, and excitement.

name: Forteresse
summary:
Sharpen your chicken's beak, and challenge your opponent in this 1v1 strategy game in simultaneous turns.
Kick the ass of your adversary king... Without an army.
Be smart... Be treacherous... And take risks!
An epic and merciless fight awaits you, take out your wooden swords and get ready to throw stones!

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Couch Co-op Edition
summary:
Jump into your food truck and business will bump up!
Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck!

Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

Be careful not to burn the food!

name: Fortnite: Captain Hypatia's Level Up Quest Pack
Forsaken Overlook
summary:
This map is one of the many parts of the Secret Santa Imitation Project, led by Brian "Snakes" Knox. It was meant to imitate the style of Chris "lupinx-Kassman" Kassap, and is designed for Single Player, Co-op, and Deathmatch play.

A lonely medieval outpost overlooking a large sea sits on the edge of the world. In it lies a magical sword of power, waiting to be taken by a brave adventurer. But be warned - rumor has it that the sword was sealed away in order to keep an alleged curse placed on it at bay...

name: Forever Indy
summary: A mod for WWF No Mercy about mainly 00s and early 10s american independent wrestling

name: Fortnite: Season 1
summary: Season 1 was the first iteration of player progression in Battle Royale. Players could buy 4 Items in the Item Shop after earning enough XP. It started on October 26th 2017 and concluded on December 13th 2017.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Summer Party
summary: It's summertime in Mexico and you don't wanna miss this party! The Summer Party update brings longer night cycles, the new Icons of Speed story and new summer props to bring the chill over to EventLab.

name: Football: The Beautiful Game
summary: A beautiful game of skill, beauty, and broken dreams. No compelling story, gorgeous hand-drawn artwork or advertisments to get in the way.

name: For Elise
summary:
There's something I wanted to make for that one person.
I wanted to make something for Elise...

A Yume Nikki fangame developed for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Forest Swords
summary: Forest Swords is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards.

name: Fog
summary: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Followars
summary: Fight casual battles against other Twitterers! Win the match by defeating your opponent's party. You can report the results directly to Twitter.

name: Folcroft Monastery
summary: You've been hired by an outfit known as SMS Group to retrieve an artifact lost somewhere inside the abandoned Folcroft Monastery. Locals say the place is haunted by restless spirits, but the pay was too good to pass up. You asked little questions. Find the artifact requested and get out alive.

name: Forehead Chip
summary: FOREHEAD CHIP is a cyberpunk narrative platformer where you play as Chip, a recruit in the IMPLANT CORPS. Capture as many HOLDOUTS as you can to get on the scoreboard, explore a divided city, uncover secret twists, and most importantly, win the FOREHEAD CHIP!

name: Formula Retro Racing: World Tour - Special Edition
summary:
Formula Retro Racing: World Tour - Special Edition includes:
- Base Game
- 2 Free Stickers
- 6 New Unique Tracks
- Reversed Track Variants
- Bonus Gameplay & UI Features

name: Forest Frenzy
summary: Shoot to survive, shoot em' up, score attack! A wave based shooter where you must buy weapons and upgrades to survive! Get local high scores or compete on steam leaderboards!

name: FourthMotion
summary: Fourthmotion: A biped controller enabled game where you collide with vehicles, jungle animals, and use physics to balance. Fast-paced and thrilling!

name: For Enigma
summary: Expanda, negocie, destrua inimigos, forje um império sobre o espaço!

name: Forgotten Waters
summary: Forgotten Waters is a single-player farming and resource management game. Farm, explore, and befriend underwater citizens. Manage resources, engage in combat, and protect your underwater town from hostile sea creatures and lurking enemies.

name: Football, Tactics & Glory: World
summary: XCOM meets Football Manager. Embark on the career of an unknown coach: tactically outsmart opponents in turn-based matches, earn money and experience, search for talented players, manage a club, build your reputation to get invited to lead the national team, and win the World Championship!

name: Foviki Empieria
summary: Race against a relentless monster in this heart-pounding multiplayer horror. Play as one of four survivors trapped in an asylum, working together to solve puzzles and search for keys. You can't fight back - only escape. Will you outwit the monster and find freedom, or succumb to the darkness?

name: Folktale Misfits
summary: Folktale Misfits the card game roguelike where you play as outcasts looking for answers in a whimsical world. Develop strategies and help the misfit heroes unlock their true potential.

name: Formation
summary: Join the elite ranks of the 7th Flight Demonstration Squadron AKA the 'Bullsharks'. In wartime, the '7th' invoked fear in the hearts of the enemy. In peacetime, they thrill the citizens of the floating city of Ocea with daring formation routines. Hold your nerve and stay in formation!

name: Foot Fashion Simulator
summary: Be a foot fashion stylist!

name: Football Streaker Simulator
summary: We all thought about it, and now you can give it a try. Run onto the football field, take a selfie with your favorite player, escape from a huge crowd of stewards, and disrupt the game for the entire stadium. What could be better?

name: For Honor: Ocelotl Hero
summary:
Stalk opponents, and when the time is right, strike them with overwhelming ferocity.

The Ocelotl Hero offer includes:

One New Hero: Ocelotl
One Ornament
One Elite Outfit
Seven-Day Champion Status (Extra XP, Extra Loot, and More)
Three Scavenger Crates with Random Gear

name: Folklore: Shadows of the Shackled
summary: Folklore: Shadows of the Shackled is an upcoming first-person horror game based on Brazilian folklore.

name: Fortress Saga
summary:
Get ready to join Fortress Saga and hop on the adventure of Cor and Louis - the seed filled with the power of life and the descendant of an honored hero!
As you gather allies, you’ll customize your fortress to your own taste and explore dungeons in vast worlds. Defeat your enemies and grow stronger even faster! Plus, the chemistry between heroes and eye-catching graphics will keep you engaged and wanting more.
So what are you waiting for? In Fortress Saga, anything is possible, so come and let your imagination run wild!

name: Football Star Life 23/24
summary: Become a football player and lead the career of your dreams. Be precise, score as many goals as possible, make the right choices during the transfer window, win numerous prestigious trophies, and become a legend!

name: Forlorn Outcast
summary: Confront fate in Forlorn Outcast, an immersive souls-like RPG. Stand your ground against the Drothar hordes, channel powerful spells, and discover the dark fantasy realm of Tilsa as you ascend from outcast to legend.

name: Food Truck Time Machine
summary: Imagine if you were in a food truck that could travel through time! Your journey will span over 2 millennium with 5 different time periods each with its own set of customers and food. You are the time travelling food chef but can you cook your way home!

name: Forgenator
summary: "Forgenator" is an item crafting game where players take on the role of a forge apprentice. With the guidance of a powerful wizard, players take on exciting challenges to craft powerful weapons, armor, and items.

name: Forgotten Lectures: Fall of a Dynasty - The Beginning
summary: Humanity went out to the stars and conquered a significant portion of the known galaxy. While technology advanced society did not necessarily. Greed, the struggle for power and influence is stronger than ever before and while besieged from outside forces there’s no lack of internal strife.

name: Forbidden Tapes
summary: Forbidden Tapes is a game consisting of three different horror stories. In the first episode, discover Jeremy Winterroad's recording, an urban exploration enthusiast searching for abandoned places full of stories. He won't be disappointed when he explores the old McNale house.

name: Football City
summary: Manage your team in this voxel based football (soccer) management simulator. Make active decisions directly influencing the events in the match. Can you win the league?

name: For Whom The Bell Tolls
summary: map01 has a metal-tech and a bit industrial style map02 (smaller) mostly outdoor-cave style and a bit tech style; see also the informations story: find your friends on a base on mars

name: Forget Your Chains
summary:
Forget Your Chains is a visual psychological horror novel about the horrors of forgetting anti psychotics.

Play as Nonnie, a strange girl with schizoaffective disorder and try to make the right decisions for her survival. Explore her world, an empty home, through her eyes and mind. Interact with strange & surreal characters as you try to search for medication or try to create safety.

name: Fortress 1024
summary: FORTRESS 1024 is a gothic like map set inside a fortress. The playing area is mostly built within a 1024x1024 scale and the majority of the level is set outdoors. I've tried my hardest to make the gameplay good and challenging. Plenty of teleporting surprises so watch your back. The exit is located in the middle of the map around a nukage moat, you must raise a bridge to get out of this level.

name: Football Maestro
summary:
A simple, highly tactical football manager game to rival the best phone games currently on the market. Create your own club and play against real users from across the world, in live, real time matches to see who can achieve the glory!
Play in up to 4 different competitions against real users in seasons which last a week.
As well as a world ranking game mode to see who's the weekly Creme de la Creme of Football Maestro.

name: Fort Solis: Limited Edition
summary: The limited edition physical version contains a special 3D cover and an exclusive metallic effect postcard.

name: Forest of Strays
summary: Forest of Strays is a hardcore platformer with many dangers scattered across the stages. Try and retry to complete every level while collecting every leaf along the way, fighting enemies, evading traps and getting trough very precise jumps! Will the lost girl find her cat and return back home?

name: Forest Spirit
summary: Tired of office life, you go to live in nature. In this new life, you have to build, craft, farm, fight and interact with the locals.

name: Formilion
summary: Kill till you get through. Formilion is a top-down arcade blood shooter about a searching a person.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Italian Exotics Car Pack
summary: Collect 7 Italian new-to-Forza cars: 2023 Lamborghini Huracán Tecnica, 2022 Ferrari 296 GTB, 2020 Ferrari Roma, 2020 Lamborghini Essenza SCV12, 2020 Lamborghini SC20, 2019 Italdesign DaVinci Concept and 2018 Lamborghini #63 Huracán Evo.

name: Football Stars Legend 24
summary: Step onto the football field with Football Stars Legend 24, full of exciting football matches, realistic graphics and gripping tactics! Choose your favourite team, feel the fans' enthusiasm and start the match to embrace the victory.

name: Football Hero
summary:
This game is a brand new football game.
Become The player quarterback, Become The runningback!

name: Fort Solis: Terra Edition
summary:
Fort Solis is a riveting story-driven thriller on the Red Planet.

The Terra Edition includes:
- Fort Solis the game
- Fort Solis Extras (Artbook & OST)

name: Forbidden Quake OST Liner Notes
summary: Break into a secret, mysterious Zenimax storage facility and retrieve American McGee's and John Carmack's memories of the Quake soundtrack! They might be corporate property, but Doomguy finds a way... ﻿

name: Food Fighter Clicker Games
summary: Food Fighter Clicker is a clicker game to become the best food fighter in the world by eating fast food and improving your skills. Tap Tap and be the fastest clicker in the world!

name: Forest Adventure
summary: The little girl's favorite handkerchief was taken away by a wolf. In order to get her handkerchief back, the girl who has no fighting ability decided to follow the wolf to the mountain.

name: Forgotten Roads
summary: Forgotten Roads - a game, where you can immerse yourself in an off-road road adventure. Drive through beautiful locations, muddy roads, and other obstacles that will stand in your way! Transport the cargo with extreme caution otherwise you will have to start all over again!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 4: Last Resort
summary:
A season of Fortnite: Chapter 4

The fate of the Island's at stake in Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 4 Season 4, and thievery's the last resort. Are you in?

name: Fold
summary:
Run. Jump. Bend gravity to your will.

Dizzying heights and insurmountable slopes are no problem with the Gravitational Manifold Anomaly Device.

This is the full, super-fun-happy version of the game formerly known as Manifold.

name: Fomography
summary: Fomography is a story-driven adventure photography game. Play as a boy exploring his entire lifetime to rediscover and chronicle his memories. What has been forgotten that only the photos can show? What hidden memories do even the photos refuse to share?

name: Follow the Leader
summary: You live in a world where men called barons have all the power, and you were raised as a servant for one until earning enough to buy your freedom, but that freedom is jeopardized when witnessing the baron's abuse of his lab-grown harem of perfect women because they refuse to sleep with him.

name: Football 2002
summary: The game designers initially wanted to make a Mario Football game, but Nintendo settled on a realistic simulator with the NFL license due to Retro's purpose of creating mature games. The game was canceled in February 2001.

name: Forza Horizion 5: Barbie The Movie Car Pack
summary: This Barbie is a gamer! Together with Warner Bros. Pictures and Mattel, Xbox is excited to invite fans on a fun, fashionable, and inspirational ride this summer to celebrate the much-anticipated release of the new movie “Barbie,” premiering in theaters on July 21. Bringing Barbie’s signature flair to our gaming platform, we’re honoring all that there is to love about this iconic role model: her persevering optimism, wide-ranging career journey and never-ending capacity for self-discovery. Audiences of “Barbie” will follow the heroine to the furthest reaches of Barbie Land and beyond, and now fans can follow in her high-heeled footsteps with exclusive Forza Horizon 5 in-game content

name: For a Reason
summary:
For A Reason is a sapphic visual novel set in a witch's academy setting featuring two playable characters and one route for each character. Talk to your crush, solve a mystery, and... drink some juice?

Play as Jane Laguerre, a member of arts and performance club who doesn't have the guts to even walk on the stage, and help navigate her way to confess to her idol. Or play as Lora Wiley and have a cute totally-not-date with her 'friend' who is better than her in every way!

name: Forge & Fortune
summary: Craft weapons, tools, and armor pieces in stunning detail as you fulfill orders from a variety of NPCs. Use VR to hammer, chisel, and mold materials into exquisite creations. Expand your shop, hire assistants, and unlock new techniques with your earnings.

name: Forest Football
summary: Car football game with multiplayer.

name: FolcDark: Part I
summary: FolcDark: Part I is the sequel to the prologue of a third-person dark fantasy action-adventure game, with a story and characters focused on Brazilian folklore.

name: Fossil Diggers VR
summary: Explore, solve puzzles, uncover fossils, build dinosaurs, and watch them come alive before your eyes.

name: Foreverhood
summary: The premise of Foreverhood is abstract. You are one of the Nuu, a childhood race of creatures that spend their time daydreaming on a small planet of woods and mountains. The player awakes one day to find themselves under an overcast sky with everyone distraught over the change that is in the air. You navigate the space under the watch of the Sequas or parents of the world to uncover what is beyond the clouds and what lies in store for the world of your kind.

name: Forest Crash Party
summary:
Two people rather than playing alone
more than playing together

name: Foxes Need to Eat
summary: Control an adorable fox in scenarios full of traps and obstacles.

summary: Progress never stops when you’re pursuing footballing greatness. Gameplay upgrades empower you to develop a blueprint for success on and off the pitch.

name: Forbidden Story

name: Foggy Rainfall Escapade
summary: Foggy Rainfall Escapade is a 2D indie platformer, invites you into an enchanting adventure. Follow a young adventurer's journey through mesmerizing visuals and soothing melodies. In a world of serene beauty and calm foggy rain, he embarks on a quest to find his way back home.

name: Folder Dungeon
summary: Dungeon crawler roguelike inside computer folder!

summary: One could certainly say that the Club does "slay" in their formal attire. Serve looks with The High Stakes Club pack. Includes 3 Outfits, 3 Back Blings, 3 Pickaxes and 3 Wraps.

summary: Expand your Forza Motorsport garage with 30 extra cars at one low price!

name: Forza Motorsport: Race Day Car Pack

name: Fort Boyard
summary: Fort Boyard the TV show is now on Nintendo DS and Wii! Will you be able to challenge the 19 games to win the famous Boyard coins? The game features an adaptable level of difficulty and high-score saving for replayability.

name: Forebloomed: Evergreen Edition
summary: An action rogue-like about garden plants fighting back against the hungry pests that threaten their home. Spend the day blasting through hedges to find loot, but take care to make it back before dark! Gather synergistic items, confront formidable bosses, and play as several unique characters!

summary:
Step into the shoes of a doctor and podiatrist as you indulge in the foot clinic experience. Scrub, scrape, pluck, and pull all kinds of feet.

Perform foot treatments for conditions like calluses, corns and ingrown toenails. Each patient presents a new problem, so you'll never get bored of your work!

name: Footie
summary: An unlicensed football game for the 3DO.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: GOTY Edition
summary:
Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck!

Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

Be careful not to burn the food!

name: For a Vast Future: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Experience a dystopian future and bring down the government, evil cults, and even more villains standing in your way.
Sink into a classic RPG, and wait for your turn to stop Doomsday from happening!

The people of Seralia experienced a devastating war. While most of them fight over scraps, the corrupted government schemes to take revenge using a secret weapon – secret and deadly. Join a group of heroic outlaws and stop this madness.

- Fish tank tool

name: Forest Life

name: Forgotten Hill The Third Axis
summary: Enter the twisted world of Forgotten Hill in a new third dimension

name: Foundations
summary: In (Foundations), catch a glimpse of two lives on the lam: A pair of fugitives, raiding an abandoned factory to survive. Piece together their pasts, and watch over their fragile partnership as it grows - or crumbles - around the shackles that serve as their only unquestionable bond.

name: Foosball League Cup: Arcade Table Football Simulator
summary: A dynamic kicker simulator where you have to get hold of the ball and kick it into the opponent's goal!

name: Football Manager Handheld 2007
summary: Football Manager Handheld 2007, the most complete sport's simulation, is fully updatedfor the 2006-07 season with the most accurate and in-depth soccer database in the world. Take full control and manage any team from 50 countries with every decision up to you. Challenge yourself and start thinking like a manager when dealing with team tactics, playerinteraction, and finances. The players, team, and your reputation are in your hands in Football Manager Handheld 2007.

name: Football Manager Handheld 2008
summary: The world's most complete and in-depth soccer management game, Worldwide Soccer Manager 2008, is fully updated for the 2007-08 season. Challenge yourself by taking full control of any of over 5,000 manageable teams from around the world including clubs from leagues such as Major League Soccer, English Premier League, and the Mexico Premier Division. With club and international teams from 50 countries available, experience the realism in making every management decision and the intense pressure to win.

name: Football Manager Handheld 2012
summary: Football Manager portable 2012 is the eighth annual entry in the football (soccer) management simulation series. Improvements over the 2011 version include more options for contracting and transferring players, realistic scouting reports, new cameras in 3D matches, a tone option to determine the way things are communicated, a new interface, and the option to add or remove playable nations in a saved game. There is also a revamped tutorial aimed at new players. The game database includes 40,000 teams, 50 playable nations, 2,600 competitions and about 40,000 profiles between players, managers, referees and staff members.

name: Forbidden Valley
summary: Archeologist Adam follows his father’s footsteps, hoping to find the mysterious Valley. On the long road to the cherished dream, various adventures and dangers, acquaintances and conflicts, secrets and puzzles await him.

name: Football Academy: Build and Prove Your Football Knowledge
summary: Learn football strategies and techniques through different interactive mini-games.

name: Football Life 2024
summary: Football Life 2024 game is an attempt to continue the offline modes of the retired PES series, football life is a standalone football game based on PES 21, built for offline career modes only. SP Football Life is how we like to play a football game.

name: Foxhaven

name: Forwards

summary: Based on Tronyn's Runezig map, this level represent a sort of Metagyptian environment. Medium to large Egyptian temple.

Make every lap count across 20 living environments with fan-favorite locations and multiple track layouts to master, each featuring live on-track scoring, fully dynamic time-of-day with weather and unique driving conditions that ensure no two laps ever look or play the same.

Three independent levels connected by a start map.
Voidscape: Very small rocky island floating in space.
Brownie: Small medieval fortress with an atrium and tower areas.
For The Love Of Evil: Large Metal/runic map with majestic halls and various traps. (On hard difficulty, the map exceeds the max_edicts limit, so it requires a source port with increased limits).

name: Fowl Damage

Unleash spectacular speckys to leave your opponents in awe and land devastating hits to thrill your fans. With dynamic gameplay and a classic look, Footy Bash is an electrifying footy spectacle.

That means Shopping Carts, ATKs, the Assault Rifle, Pump Shotgun, and more in both Battle Royale and Zero Build!

name: Forgotten Runiverse
summary:
Forgotten Runiverse is a grand fantasy MMORPG full of magic and wonder based on the lore of Magic Machine's Forgotten Runes Wizard’s Cult NFT Collection. The game is developed and published by Bisonic, Inc.

The Runiverse is open to anyone – begin your adventure, play, create, own land, and earn your place in the pantheon of legends while owning the things you create.

Forgotten Runiverse allows players to adventure across a massive world to discover hidden secrets and quests and hunt a wide array of monsters and creatures for rare treasures and experience on your way to level 50. The rewards from these quests will allow players to craft and forge spells, weapons, armor, houses, decorations and more, each with unique qualities determined by both materials and your mastery of crafting.

Forgotten Runiverse includes on-chain content but does not require a wallet or engaging with the blockchain to play. Early releases of the game will allow users to mint certain cosmetic items to the Arbitrum blockchain to display, trade, or resell. The full release will also include in-game land plots that allow players to help shape the world for everyone by building traveling stations, material gathering stations, housing, or service buildings including forges and mage workshops.

name: FolcDark
summary: FolcDark is a prologue of a third-person dark fantasy action-adventure game, with a story and characters focused on Brazilian folklore.

name: For a Vast Future: Extended Edition
Forgery Craft

summary: You play as Charley trying to eat an ice cream cone. But first you must avoid the chefs that are out to get you: Angelo, Zorba, Oscar, and Jacques. Avoid the food thrown at you by the chefs to get the cone. You can also throw your own food at the chefs to slow them down.

Restore iconic cars from paint to body parts to create the ultimate car. Forza Customs is available now for iOS and Android.

summary: Oh no! The world's brattiest girl wants to adopt Bloo and rename him "Tiffany"! Keep Bloo safely in the arms of his friends until Mac arrives. Use the mouse to aim and toss Bloo with of three throwing options: short, medium and far.

summary: Get the Forza Motorsport Premium Edition and Forza Horizon 5 Premium Edition in one unmissable bundle. Includes Race Day Car Pack, Forza Horizon 5 Rally Adventure and Forza Horizon 5: Hot Wheels, as well as Car Pass, VIP Membership, and Welcome Pack for both games.

summary: Fog of War is a romance, story focused adult visual novel. You play as an Ex-Delta Force operator attending medical school upon retirement. You make choices that shape the story and potential romances.
