summary: Forza Motorsport 2018 Mercedes-AMG GT3

name: For a Vast Future: Special Edition
Fortnite: Chapter 5 - Underground
summary:
Catch the train, customize your weapon, and claim your revenge in Chapter 5 - Underground:

Fortnite Battle Royale takes on a striking new appearance in Underground. Discover an entirely new Island with POI's that feature the factions of The Society versus the Underground. Seek your revenge for the kidnapping of poor Peely with an entirely fresh arsenal of weapons and items. And of course with a new season, you’ll find the Big Bang Battle Pass with pages of new cosmetics. Check out the line up of Outfits geared up and ready for action from daybreak until dawn.

name: Fox Game
summary: Embark on a magical journey as a young fox in Harmony in the Wild, an enchanting open-world adventure where nature's balance is in your paws. Explore vibrant forests, navigate icy terrains and unravel the secrets of dying nature through various quests to restore harmony back to your new home.

name: Forest of Soul
summary: ”Forest of Soul“ is a role-playing game that allows you to enter your own spiritual world and discover wonderful scenes. Follow a young girl looking for herself and direction, solve various meaningful mysteries, and experience a touching story. Let’s start this relaxing and comfortable journey!

name: FoxFire Mine
summary: Embark on 'Foxfire Mine,' a 2D roguelike digging quest. Unearth valuable gems, manage resources, and navigate strategic upgrades for survival. Every descent challenges your tactics and adaptability in a dynamic underground world.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Fast X Car Pack
summary: This blockbuster DLC includes iconic vehicles like the 1970 Dodge Charger, 1966 Chevrolet Impala Super Sport, 1973 Datsun 240Z, 2022 Dodge Charger SRT Hellcat Redeye Widebody, and the 2022 Flip Car 2.0 to drive and race in the Horizon Festival.

name: Fox Hunt Arena
summary:
It’s a dystopian future. The year is 2112 and you find yourself on FOXHUNT, the world’s most popular game show.

But Foxhunt is not like any other game show. Of course there is prize money, Up to a million dollars, but in order to win, you must survive 7 rounds and 50 unique fields in the arena!

It will not be easy. There are three Hunters trying to kill you. You must fight through each round and collect the 2 codes that will set off the explosive charge placed in each Hunter’s neck.

There are objects stored in stations scattered around the arena that can help you. If you find yourself in a tight situation, use the Crossbow that you found. But watch out, someone dropped an XG-7 Laser-rifle into the Arena. Find it first!

Run fast, collect the cash, find every station, and fend off the Hunters before they find you….

Don’t let the audience down. give ‘em a good show!

name: Fortnite Festival
summary: Play in a band with friends or perform solo on stage with hit music by your favorite artists in Fortnite Festival! On the Main Stage, play a featured rotation of Jam Tracks. Compete against friends for the best performance or team up to climb the leaderboards. The festival is just beginning with more Jam Tracks, Music Icons, concerts, and stages coming soon. Take your stage in Fortnite Festival!

name: Forward Brave
summary: 《Forward Brave》has no turning back. Choose your hero, explore the program-generated card dungeon, collect resources, kill enemies, combine and match active skills with various special-effect artifacts, make rational use of various props and buffs, move to the next floor, and finally win the victory!

name: .Forty-Five
summary: A perfect mix of card game, rogue-lite, and pure wild west mayhem. Explore an ever-changing map, collect cards, and battle enemies. Cards are Bullets and are loaded into the revolver to gun down enemies. Experience .Forty-Five's innovative gameplay for 100% free and open source.

name: Forced Sacrifice: Lost Soul
summary: Nothing can stop the inevitable. Everything will play out, just as it has been planned. Forced Sacrifice: Lost Souls is a bullet-hell game with a storyline reaching for metaphysical and theological topics. Gather the power, get rid of demons and retake The Soul from the traitors.

name: For Honor: Highlander Hero Skin - Oathbreaker Maddox

summary: Forza Motorsport 2018 Chevrolet #23 Ruman Racing TA Corvette

name: Foreign Fortress

name: Forlorn
summary:
Forlorn was an unreleased 2D platformer developed by RobTop Games in 2012. The game was meant to release for mobile devices, however was scrapped before completion.

Various prototype builds of the game leaked in 2023 as a part of the TestFlight teraleaks.

name: Forge
summary: Forge is a deeply strategic map-based card game, fusing the real-time strategy, collectible card game, and deckbuilder genres. Coordinate your units and spells to take control of the map and outsmart your opponents. Discover the cards and find your strategy!

name: Fourville
summary:
On the day of the Great War, the residents of Salem made their way to the shelter of Vault 4. Only those registered in the vault programme were granted entrance. Some refugees reasoned that if they could wait out the twenty-year closure period, which Vault-Tec had advertised, then they would be able to find shelter when the vault opened.

More than two-hundred years later the town had changed a lot. A town grew up inside the cave outside the vault, its houses made from reclaimed Vault-Tec equipment and built into the walls of the cave which have been dug out as generations of residents tried to get inside the vault.

When the Sole Survivor arrives at Fourville the town is in the middle of an election where the vault has become a major point of contention. The town's incumbent mayor believes the vault will open one day, and has made this the focal point of his campaign. His challenger believes the vault is holding the town back and attempts to get inside should be abandoned. The Sole Survivor's involvement can shift the scale and change the face of the community forever.

name: For The Entity
summary:
Your designs have caught the attention of an unknown organization. They require you to print 120,000$ for their "client" by midnight. The time is 23:45.

You've printed a lot of cash for a lot of people, but this... What is this?

Altered text files, swapped backgrounds, and music files will all be included in the files you need to replace to play the game.

name: Forgotten Hope 2
summary:
An award-winning World War II mod for Battlefield 2, covering all aspects of land, air and sea combat, with a focus on realism and historic accuracy.

It is the sequel to Forgotten Hope, one of the most popular mods for Battlefield 1942.

As player, you can take control over an expansive number of authentic WWII equipment; from tanks such as the mighty German King Tiger, to famed aircraft like the British Spitfire, or hit the road with the Willys MB Jeep. Lay your hands on infantry weapons, such as the powerful German Panzerfaust or the fearsome American M1 Garand rifle. Fight your way through the North African deserts, the landing grounds of Normandy, the freezing Ardenne forests, and alongside your comrades in mother Russia!

It’s the night of the royal ball! A night of excitement, festivities, and romance—as well as gruesome death for everyone in the castle, unless the irresponsible fairy godparent Ivy can change their fates.

Explore the castle, eavesdrop on its many inhabitants, and solve elaborate puzzles through careful (or not-so-careful) magical meddling. Everything in the castle is interconnected in ways that may not be obvious at first glance: turning candy into bananas might result in a broken statue, and revising a painting could lead to accidental arson.

Texturing is all done from the IWAD with an excellent custom palette by Dir, and some sound replacements from Doom 64 and Doom 3.

Formula V20 '85 is a racing computer game for the 24k expanded Commodore Vic-20. It has been crafted in the style of the classic Commodore 64 games Pitstop II and Pole position.

Pick from seven different racing teams and four different circuits. Join a single race or compete in the world championship.

There's a process before you move where you get to choose where you end up, spend 3 days getting to know your perspective new neighborhoods (and maybe a little more) before you settle into the afterlife.

Navigate a dark sci-fi adventure, learn more with every loop, solve challenging problems, and uncover the dark secret of the Forgotten.

summary: "Some stories are best told to none," she whispered. Long ago, the stars disappeared. Then, a man returned them. Few would believe such a thing; fewer still can recall how he bent heaven's ear. However, you won't find the tale in books or archives—only in the hearts of those who were there.

summary: Welcome to FIFpro's officially authorized operating card football game. A console game experience using 3D original engine and next-generation modeling. Collect the world's top star lineup and instantly compete with your friends in a global game.

summary: Foxy J.A.B.S (Just Another Bubble Shooter) is a simple and relaxing "Match 3 game" for everyone.

summary: This is a chilling horror escape game that thrusts players into a world of darkness and dread. With shifting environments, secrets hidden within the shadowy depths. Beware of deceptive illusions and hidden traps as you struggle to survive and escape the clutches of the unknown.

summary: Formula Funtico is a competitive multiplayer racing game that will take you on a thrilling ride across a multiverse of vibrant environments. Inspired by arcade classics, Formula Funtico is all about high-speed action, strategic power-ups, and intense competition.

name: Fontemon
summary: Fontemon is a Pokémon parody, made with a game engine inside a font. This means the game runs wherever you can install and choose a font. The game is structured akin to a "choose your own adventure".

summary: The great world football event is being held. What no one counted on was that the world would suffer the alien invasion and the machine revolution at that time. Only the most skilled footballers will be able to stop this. Destroy any alien bug that crosses your path with balls. 1 or 2 players.

name: Force of Numbers
summary: Live streaming game "Force of Numbers" Live stream Force of Numbers and play with your viewers!*This game is a viewer-participation game for video streamers.

summary: An action puzzle game in which you have to pile up footprints to make them bigger. Aim for a high score so that you don't fall off the platform.

summary: Forgetting Emily is a fully immersive, live action, interactive game where you can date beautiful women while avoiding the pitfalls of ... well, dating beautiful women!

name: Forgotten Bunker 1939
summary: step into the boots of Private Jacob, an American soldier caught in the fury of a World War II bombing raid. Desperately seeking refuge, Jacob stumbles upon a terrifying mysterious bunker, which turns out to be a demonic time portal.

name: For Hell's Sake
summary: For Hell's Sake is a fast-paced 2D platform game where you play as a demon on a mission to break an old contract. Constantly hunted by a superior entity, you will have to move forward. Avoid the traps scattered around the world. Don't get caught. Don't die.

name: Fox Quest: The Elemental Keys
summary: Fox Quest is a puzzle game in which you can move between a real and an alternate world. Using this ability you can change the game environment in one of the worlds causing surprising results in the other!

summary: Trapped in the heart of Fort Boyard, you will have to try to escape by solving many puzzles and avoiding the traps of Arok and his evil creatures. The game uses the fort from the famous TV show of the same name in a platform/horror style.

name: Foxo's Fun Schoolhouse
summary: Foxo's Fun Schoolhouse is an educational fun game where you have to find comics for a friend! Foxo, the main teacher will help you with your adventure. It won't be an easy though!

name: Forestrike
summary: Forestrike is a tactical kung-fu fighting game with a supernatural twist. Use your 'foresight' ability to visualize fights before they happen and hone your skills then rumble in reality, where defeat means starting over from scratch.

name: Formula Racing Manager
summary: FRM offers a unique sandbox experience you have not seen in any other modern Sports Management game. The game is focused on bringing the management aspect of the motorsport world to life by offering a challenging simulation, where you steer a racing team in a dynamically changing racing world.

name: Fortress Forge
summary: As a mighty commander, you'll oversee the defense of your base and use weaponry to repel the oncoming hordes. Harness the unique properties of various soldiers and weapons to land devastating blows to the enemy!

name: For the Glory of Gods TCG
summary: Alternative online turn-based trading card game, that allows you unlimited deck-building options. Three different game modes, including Solo, Gauntlet, and Multiplayer to choose from! Earn cards, packs, and coins, and try to stay on top of the leaderboards For the Glory of Gods.

name: Footsy
summary: Footsy is a chaotic multiplayer soccer party game set inside grandma's house! Smash furniture, shatter bottles, and tumble TVs as you compete in wild, goal-scoring action. Customize your characters, challenge your friends, and embrace the crazy destruction in every room!

name: Forest Walk
summary: Forest Walk is a game about influencing characters met through dialogue, actions, or items obtained. With branching dialogue paths and outcomes, you can choose to help or ruin those around you as you climb to the top of the mountain.

name: Forgotten Red Fog
summary: Forgotten Red Fog is a turn based JRPG with the pinch of the perfect timing for certain battle skills. The game's focus is the linear story, the characters and the cruel, racist world.

Now you can experience the best-selling, highest-rated racing series on Xbox One for one low price.

From the world’s greatest tracks to the freedom of the open road, Forza games combine unprecedented visuals with the industry’s leading simulation engine, giving everyone the opportunity to truly feel what it’s like to own, race and customize the cars of their dreams.

name: Fore! Track
summary: It's golf… in a tank!

name: Forest Heroes

name: FootCareer Ult
summary: FootCareer ULT, the new way of Football SimulationFootCareer ULT is the latest and most simplistic Football Career simulation game there is. Want to becomethe greatest (or the worst)? Then try FootCareer ULT today!

name: Forces of Ether
summary: Blast your way through an Isometric Open World Galaxy. Fly seamlessly to space. Lead your chosen faction in ground and space battles. Stop the imminent Collapse of civilization... Or let it all fall into ruin.

name: Forever World Cup Simulator
summary: The simulator lets you select 50+ tournaments at the same time, including EURO, World Cup, Nations Leagues, and AFCON. Its unique "forever" feature allows simulations to run indefinitely, with 220+ national teams' attributes evolving dynamically. You can create new teams with a powerful editor.

name: Format
summary: Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the top scorer in this pixel battle?

name: Forgotten Fears

name: Forknite
summary:
Minnie's been served up a plate of vile veg and she needs your help to eat them and defeat them!

So do you reckon you're up to the challenge? If the answer's yes, then what are you waiting for? Oh, you probably want to know how to play!

Well, don't worry, it's easy - just use Minnie's fork to clear the tray by using your finger (or mouse!) to connect groups of 3 veg or more before the timer runs out!

So if you fancy helping Minnie by munching some villainous veg, get ready, get set and get crunching!

name: Forest God

name: Fortnite: Chapter 5 - Season 4: Absolute Doom
summary:
Suit up for Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 5 Season 4: Absolute Doom and become a Marvel legend -

Become the heroes first on the scene to defend against Marvel’s Doctor Doom and his forces or take up the mantle of villainy and join the reign of Doom. Luckily, there's some brand new heavy munitions to take on a worthy adversary. Go head-to-head with new items like Dual Micro SMGs, Captain America’s Shield, or War Machine’s Arsenal.

Our Protagonist, Starla McCormick has found herself at the "Snock Advanced Gay Expo" and out of pure boredom, goes through the eerie catacombs of Gravestone Grease and the cold streets of Freezy Freeze Fields! summary: Live the life of a food delivery driver. Deliver orders, earn money, upgrade your vehicle, explore a vast city, and make way to your success. Dive into a realistic daily adventure and level up to become the best delivery driver.

name: Fostiator
summary:
Fostiator is one of several sample games that demonstrate the capabilities of DIV Games Studio development environment. It is a simple versus fighting game with four characters and three stages, using high-resolution pre-rendered sprites for characters and scenery objects. It is possible to play against the AI with three difficulty levels, against another player on a single keyboard, or watch two AI opponents fight each other.

There is no plot but the DIV Games Studio user manual gives short (and rather silly) descriptions of each character: Alien, an animated skeleton of an extraterrestrial warrior with sharp claws; Bishop, a bionic fighter; Ripley, the Earth's best gymnast; and Nostromo, an immortal warrior armed with an axe. The character's names are obvious references to the 1979 film Alien and its sequel Aliens, but the game has otherwise no relation to this franchise.

Fostiator was available as a free download from the official DIV Games Studio website. The entire source code of the game was also included with a copy of the DIV Games Studio suite.

name: Forsan El Majd
summary: Forsan El Majd ( Knights of Glory ) is a strategy game played on the Internet browser and mobile devices. The game tells the story of the Islamic conquests in Persia, Africa, and Europe.

name: Forgotten Hill: Fall
summary:
Solve puzzles and riddles to escape the house in this thrilling escape game.
Your car has broken down and you find yourself searching for help alone in the woods, on a cold November night, near Forgotten Hill village. Maybe you can find some help in that house up on the hill. Or maybe you might just find yourself trying to escape from the horrors that lurk within.

summary: A narrative-driven game of suspense, crime, and dark humor. Amid exquisitely crafted art and a gripping story, the Wushan Great Buddha's demise unfolds.

summary: Foxlore follows the adventure of Filo, a cunning fox who stumbles upon a mysterious map leading to an ancient relic of untold power. As Filo unravels the secrets of the relic, he uncovers hidden truths that could change the fate of his world forever.

summary: The game offers many hours of classic RPG gameplay, exciting story, tons of diversified locations, monsters and quests. Get lost in arid deserts, endless forests, dark dungeons and explore snowy wastelands. Gather a party of adventurers and fight against knights, archers, trolls, orcs, barbarians, dragons, skeletons and many other enemies. Explore a vast heroic fantasy world. Become a legend yourself. Travel the world of Forgotten Tales to meet new friends, find treasure, and encounter monsters! Use a variety of weapons to take out enemies in this real time RPG. Gain experience and levels. Solve quests, find hidden treasures and improve your equipment and skills. Use several types of weapons and magic spells. If you like role playing games, you will enjoy this game with it's top-down perspective. Hack and slash, action and classic RPG fuse in one ultimate game: Forgotten Tales. This role playing game is completely free. Try the best open world free RPG for Android!

summary: Dive into Foosball Runner, a thrilling twist on table football where you are the ball! Navigate futuristic tables in a spaceship, dodge spinning figures, collect keys, and unlock gates to score under a minute. Use power-ups to stop figures or boost your speed.

summary: A racing game where you ride dinosaurs who skate with car-shoes.

name: Football Manager 25 Mobile
summary: After a record-breaking debut campaign, FM25 Mobile is returning exclusively to Netflix.

name: Fortnite: Sun & Scales Pack
summary: Starter bundle offering cosmetic gear, a LEGO-themed version of the main outfit, and in-game currency. Launched mid‑season in Chapter 5 Season 4 and available only via real-money purchase for a limited period.

name: Fortnite: Lockjaw Starter Quest Pack
summary: The tracks are heating up on Inferno Island. Includes a Vehicle Body, 4 Vehicle Decals, an Outfit (with LEGO Style) and Quests to earn additional rewards!

name: Formula 1: Vircon32 Version
summary: A Small Fictive Formula 1 Game & Watch style game with high score keeping.

name: Football Manager Quiz
summary: Although it's based on the planet's best football management game on PC, console and PSP, Football Manager Quiz takes a different spin on the genre. Instead of taking your team to the top of the Premier League with cunning tactics and wheeler-dealer transfer skills, success is based entirely on your footie-trivia knowledge.

name: Formula Karts
summary: Formula Karts is a semi-realistic racing title that attempts to capture the spirit of kart racing with it's low slung feeling of speed, and corner after corner of impressive handling (and inevitable sliding). The title supports both simulation and arcade modes, and features some effective race AI for non-player vehicles. Two player split screen is supported albeit with some slowdown.

name: Fortress
summary: Fortress is an exploration game with different enemy and weapon types, puzzles, secrets, unique dialogue, and more. There are 57 different rooms in the game for you to explore. Your character starts with no weapons or items and you progress through the game by finding items, solving puzzles, and interacting with NPCs. The game uses the D-pad the vast majority of the time as you navigate a large fortress filled with monsters, people, stories, and traps. The game utilizes the crank for one of the puzzles. You receive scores at the end of the game based on how many treasures you collect, how many gems you find, and how many times you die in the game. The main objective of the game is to escape the fortress! There is no save functionality, but you can lock your Playdate and start where you left off later on. An average playthrough takes about 30 minutes. It takes most players more than one playthrough to achieve the top rank in each category.

name: Fork-U
summary: Fork-U is a physics based forklift simulator. Drive and operate a forklift in 1st or 3rd person. Try your hand at loading and unloading pallets in a warehouse, delivering building materials in a construction site, keeping shelves stocked in a grocery store, and more!

name: Football League Cup: Arcade Soccer Simulator
summary: Exciting football simulator - take on the role of a coach, assemble your own football team and fight your way to the top of the tournament table!

name: Formula Racing: Grand Prix League
summary: Every turn defines a champion!

name: Fortress of Zorlac
summary:
Fortress of Zorlac is a shoot 'em up with some similarities to Yars' Revenge. The player's objective is to rid the galaxy of a dreaded alien called Zorlac. Zorlac is positioned on the right side of the screen and is protected by a fortress consisting of three rotating walls as well as four indestructible stationary guns. The player starts out at the left edge of the screen but can move around in all directions. To be able to hit the alien the player first has to blast a hole through the three walls. It is made harder by the constant movements of both the rotating walls and the alien. At the same time the player has to avoid being hit by the defense guns which automatically lock in on the player ship. As the game goes on the fortress slowly moves toward the player who gets less space to dodge the enemy fire.

Once the player has been able to hit Zorloc, he gets enraged and the game moves on to the next level that's played at a higher speed. The player scores points by destroying the walls of the fortress and for hitting the alien. Points are awarded based on the skill level chosen before a game and the player's distance from the edge of the screen. Hitting the alien is worth fifty times more than destroying a block in the fortress. The player has access to five ships and once they have all been destroyed the game ends.

name: Forgotten Memories: Remastered Edition
summary:
A new Forgotten Memories: Remastered Edition is coming! Tons of new stuff and improvements!

Take a deep breath and get ready for the horror of Forgotten Memories.

In Forgotten Memories, you take on the role of Rose Hawkins, a determined police detective who finds herself caught in a web of enigmatic events while investigating a strange case. As Rose wakes up in an eerie, unfamiliar place, she encounters Noah, a mysterious and striking woman who offers her a deal. This precarious alliance promises to aid Rose in her investigation but at what cost?

name: Forgotten Hope
summary:
Forgotten Hope is a modification for Battlefield 1942 that concentrates on adding both a more realistic and more enjoyable playing experience than the original BF1942 and includes many new specially designed custom maps to play in. The mod includes over 250 new pieces of authentic equipment.

It is the prequel to Forgotten Hope 2, one of the most popular mods for Battlefield 2.

name: Food Courier: Bike Adventure
summary: Race the clock and become the ultimate food courier!

name: Formless Mother
summary: Formless Mother is set of 5 MBF21 maps set in a dark, very red, atmosphere heavily inspired by the work of Suguru Tanaka.

name: Fox and Shadow
summary: Fox and Shadow is a scifi dual deckbuilding roguelike. Scavenge for resources in a broken city to maintain your crumbling bunker. Create a deck that contains your Pilot's emotions with your Drone's logic to destroy defective robots for parts. The world is in ruins, salvage yourself.

name: Forgotten Fables
summary: In "Fábulas Porteñas," the subway leaves you at an unknown station, and you must venture in to find a way to get back home. You will solve puzzles and explore while a creature lurks in the shadows.

name: Foot Step
summary: Foot Step is a game in which you need to control a little man and dodge kicks. When it comes into contact with cells, the foot will destroy them underneath it, but if the foot collides with a round object, the foot will not be able to break through it and will stop on this line, turning the round object into a regular cell. The goal of the game is to advance gradually without getting kicked or falling onto the spikes below.

name: Folletti
summary: In Folletti, step into the shoes of Yezac Folletti, who awakens to the horror of his wife being kidnapped by the sinister Degenite Church in the eerie land of Krycek. Embark on a quest across this bizarre realm, uncovering clues, forging alliances with quirky friends and peculiar creatures, and taking on odd quests. Unearth hidden conspiracies, brave terrifying territories, and perhaps find camaraderie in unexpected places.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 2 Remix
summary: The Island you knew is back, remixed and reimagined, with weekly location and loot drops inspired by the best of early Chapter 2 OG gameplay and some of the greatest music icons in history. In this time rewind, Snoop D-O-double-G heads up the Agency, the rap god Eminem sets up shop in the Grotto, hip hop princess Ice Spice lays claim to Shark Island, and the remix hits the finale with a celebration and tribute to the legend and icon, Juice WRLD. Push play, turn up the volume, and open up the vault in Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 2 Remix!

name: For The Win
summary: Welcome to FTW, the fast-paced Multiplayer Battle Royale Hero Shooter! Dive into non-stop action, claim rewards in tournaments every week, and play with friends in quick, exciting multiplayer matches.

name: Forsaken
summary: Forsaken is a 10-level minimod reimagining the "Lost Episodes" for Spear of Destiny, celebrating its 30th anniversary in 2024. Imagine if the original creators of Return to Danger had gone all out, transforming the EXE, palette, music, and sounds into a fully immersive experience. Now you can find out! The Nazis have hidden the Spear of Destiny in a remote Moravian castle high in the mountains, and it's up to the fearless B.J. Blazkowicz to infiltrate the fortress and reclaim it. It's in SDL

name: Forecursed
summary:
Survive:
You and a bunch of other inmates must go purge your death sentence on Earth, a cursed and abandoned planet. Teleport to a chosen location and be the last one standing to clear your sentence. Keep an eye on your oxygen meter and use the tools at your disposal, but most of all, stay away from the curse.

Curse:
If you receive the curse, your goal is to get rid of it before it consumes your soul. You are now the hunter and must catch one of your fellow prisoners. Lie and confuse others to approach them, or go for the chase and outrun your victim. The curse has given you otherworldly abilities that let you leap far in the air, see others through walls and hear their heartbeats. Use those to your advantage and don't stay cursed for too long.

Ghouls:
Death isn't the end. The curse has now consumed your soul and you can now take on the forms of different ghouls to torment the remaining prisoners. Crawl, fly or run, different ghouls will give you different ways to traverse the environment and attack the prisoners. Figure out each ghoul's best strategies and work with the cursed prisoner to spread as much chaos as possible.

name: Fonzi Fuddy: Ace Defective
summary: Fonzi Fuddy: Ace Defective is a game where a detective must explore around, rewind people's testimonies, and find clues to pin their own crime onto someone else.

name: Forbidden Love
summary: Guide two souls in an impossible love story. Your decisions will lead them to happiness or tragedy. Their fate is in your hands!

name: Forsaken
summary: A medium / large Runic themed classic-style map with some pretty big encounters. The author's first release.

name: FourFeather
summary: Large mixed theme map set in a partly technological, party runic and partly medieval complex. Features plenty of new custom content, including a large variety of new monsters.

name: Former Dawn
summary:
After a failed terraforming mission on an exoplanet light years from Earth, humanity dies out but leaves behind a child species(called the “Formers”) that forgets its own origin. You play a common hunter who rediscovers the truth and struggles against the faceless Organization which will stop at nothing to defeat you. Along the way, you recruit a motley crew of brave Formers who are willing to risk everything for Justice.

Former Dawn is, in a nutshell, a story of discovery, resistance to evil, and exploration of the human condition. The world is rich, the plot complex, and the characters dynamic and multi-dimensional.

name: Former Dawn
summary: An upcoming port of Former Dawn for the PC

name: Forbidden Fantasy
summary: Forbidden Fantasy is a choice-driven adult visual novel where you're the chosen one. Become the hero of prophecy, romance elven women, and save the world from the Demon Queen. Your quest will be filled with adventure, drama, and lots of sex.

name: Forsaken
summary: A short, psychological narrative experience, where you play as Ben. The events in the game are not linear, which means that you have to piece together some events, that will occur during the gameplay. Set on an island and involves fishing elements.

name: Follow The Banner
summary:
Follow the Banner is a multiplayer strategic medieval warfare game.
Two armies composed of players (or bots) fight in turn-based battles on hexagon maps.

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 6
summary: It’s the Snoop D-O-Double G! With more than 35 million album sales worldwide, Snoop Dogg is one of the biggest rap and hip-hop icons in the world, and now he’s the Icon for Fortnite Festival Season 6.

name: Forestygian
summary: Roguelike Deckbuilder inspired by Action RPGs. Build a powerful deck to support abilities of your hero. Use abilities to puzzle through hordes of enemies.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 6 - Season 1: Demon Hunters
summary: Traverse a brand new chapter like never before. New weapons to master, mystical energy to control, powerful demons to slay. Become a Ronin in Chapter 6!

name: Forgotten Memories
summary:
Forgotten Memories is a third person Survival Horror game combining exploration, reflection, puzzles, action and survival where gameplay is centered around fear mechanics.

A spiritual successor to the greatest horror games of the ‘90s, Forgotten Memories is a true classic survival horror game redefined for modern audiences.

Forgotten Memories combines deep psychological narratives, beautifully rendered environments, and smooth gameplay action into a fantastic horror experience you will never forget.
Enjoy incredible voice acting with Guy Cihi and David Schaufele (as James Sunderland and Eddie Dombrowski in Silent Hill 2) among others.

name: Fortnite OG
summary:
FORTNITE OG is BACK and here to stay. Drop into Chapter 1 and explore the OG map, collect OG loot, and relive OG gameplay.

THE OG OG RETURNS Solos or Squads, drop into battle with Fortnite OG: Chapter 1. Build your way to pure victory in Battle Royale or dominate the Island in a new way with Zero Build. Each Fortnite OG season runs approximately two months, bringing back the legendary loot and features from back in the day.

CLASSIC COOL IN THE OG PASS The Fortnite OG Pass features 45 tiers of retro rewards with a modern twist on items and Outfits. A new OG Pass will be available every OG season for 950 V-Bucks or in Fortnite Crew including the OG Pass, new Battle Royale, Music and LEGO Passes in Fortnite Crew for 1,400 V-Bucks. Getting this add-on is not necessary to access this content.

name: Fortnite Reload
summary: Fortnite Reload is a 40-player fast-paced Battle Royale game that is all about carrying the squad to Victory. Reboot as long as one teammate is still in the action! Loot up after rebooting to get back into fighting shape! Eliminate opponents to reboot teammates faster! Near the end of the match, reboots will stop. Lock in with your squad to secure the Victory Royale!

name: Football Bros
summary: The latest in our line of Bros games, Football Bros has really taken off and we couldn’t be more proud! We’ve even added a new Franchise mode so you can take your team on the road across America and lead them to victory!

name: Fool's Pub
summary:
Welcome to Fool’s Pub - The Online Multiplayer Card Game.

This isn’t just a card game – it’s an online multiplayer battle where up to four players compete in a high-stakes game of skill, luck, and survival. Outplay your friends or strangers from around the world and prove you’ve got what it takes to be the last one standing.

- First-Person Fun: Experience the game through the eyes of your character, bringing you closer to the action with every draw, bluff, and shot fired.
- Play Your Way: Jump online to challenge others or enjoy offline mode with clever AI opponents when you’re flying solo.
- Cute and Dangerous: Meet adorable characters packing serious heat – their charm hides a fierce determination to win at any cost.
- Rough Rules, Wild Rounds: With Russian roulette-style mechanics, every turn could spell glory or disaster. Will you take the risk or play it safe?
- Only One Wins: In this pub, there’s no second place. Outwit, outplay, and outlast everyone else to claim the ultimate victory.

Get ready for the perfect mix of strategy, adrenaline, and chaos.
Fool’s Pub is calling – are you brave enough to answer?

name: Fortnite Ballistic
summary:
FORTNITE BALLISTIC is a first-person, 5v5 tactical FPS in Early Access. Prove your talents, precision and teamwork to overcome your opponents.

Each round, use your skills and gadgets to Attack and Defend your side. Avoid elimination and outplay your opponents to secure victory for your team.

TACTICAL CHOICES MATTER.
Choose your gadget and lock in! Fortnite Ballistic provides unique, Flex gadgets that can alter the outcome of a round. Once you’ve locked in your gadget, add it to your arsenal during the Buy phase of each round and go ballistic.

FIRST PERSON, FULL IMPACT
Fortnite Ballistic is the first Fortnite mode built using the First Person Camera Mode Device in UEFN. Experience Fortnite in an all new way, challenging your skills and testing your tactics.

Getting this experience is not necessary to access this content. When you launch Fortnite using this through your Library, the experience will be pre-selected for your convenience.

name: Fogpiercer
summary: Build your train to build your deck. Fight off bandits in a post apocalyptic world. Progress and unlock new train combinations with synergies. Get drivers to their final destinations.

name: Football Life 2025
summary: Football Life 2025 game is an attempt to continue the offline modes of the retired PES series, football life is a standalone football game based on PES 21, built for offline career modes only. SP Football Life is how we like to play a football game.

name: Force Of Guardians
summary: Force of Guardians is an online action game that combines elements of a MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) with pixel art graphics. In this game, players participate in 3-on-3 battles that are designed to be short and engaging, typically lasting around five to six minutes

name: Fortnite: Agency Renegades Pack
summary: When you need the best, call the best. For all your covert needs, request the Agency Renegades. Includes 3 Outfits (with LEGO Style), 3 Back Blings & 3 Pickaxes.

name: Food Fight: Culinary Combat
summary: Get ready to splat, splash, and spill as you mess it up with friends in this family-friendly shooter! Customize your character, chat it up with iconic Atari characters, and blast your way to claim the cone in this reimagined classic!

name: Foxes' Festival
summary: Travel around town completing mini-games to help the villagers get ready for the fall festival in the evening.

name: Forgotten Memories
summary: Forgotten Memories is an adult visual novel where your choices lead to intimate relationships and multiple outcomes. Uncover your lost memories, forge connections with three unique women, and experience both emotional and erotic storylines.

name: Forklift Simulator
summary: Control various vehicles, such as forklifts, trucks, pickup trucks and take over the business. Purchase and upgrade 24 different factories, produce and sell 24 different products, even purchase the other 99 companies to rule the world!

name: Football Life Simulator
summary: Live the life of a professional footballer both on and off the field. Train, play matches, manage your social life, climb the career ladder, and spend your earned money. Decorate your life with luxury while managing your relationships and finances.

name: Forest Simulator 2025
summary: Have you ever wanted to be part of a forest of trees? Now you can be! Stand very still! Look at the beautiful (low poly) scenery! MMOF (Massive Multiplayer Online Forest)! BECOME a tree (in a simulation)!

name: Football Pitch Simulator
summary: Build your own football pitch business. Make repairs, expand your facilities, and attract the interest of football fans.

name: Football League 2025
summary: Viva World Football! Football League 2025 is here to shake up the pitch and bring your game to life like never before! Experience vibrant stadiums, lifelike player animations, smarter NPC AI, and breathtaking matchday atmospheres. Enjoy full 3D player action, improved interface UI, immersive multi-language commentary, and upgraded database. Customize your squad and build your dream team from over 40,000 players, then lead them to victory on the global stage!

name: Forge
summary: Forge is a Magic The: Gathering simulator with multiplayer, singleplayer and adventure modes. It runs on java and is available for Windows and Android.

name: Forma
summary: Hunt or be hunted in Forma, an immersive sandbox RPG set in a land overrun by living emotions, where every choice shapes a dynamic living world

name: Fossilpunk
summary: Lead space dino settlers to rebuild your civilization and rise again! Start cities, expand borders, grow your economy, and master tactical battles. Unleash epic dino combos in this turn-based strategy game with 4X and Roguelite elements. Rawr!

name: Formaggio 2
summary: The sequel to the Scratch project Formaggio 1.

name: Forsaken 64
summary: An N64 port of Forsaken.

name: Ford Street Racing: XR Edition
summary:
The Australian release of Ford Bold Moves Street Racing (EU: Ford Street Racing). The PS2 version replaces some existing cars with Aussie originals, while the PSP version adds these cars in new slots.

It is completely identical to the original version, but contains 4 additional cars synonymous with the history of Ford in Australia: the 1970 Ford XY GT Falcon, the 1970 Ford XY GTHO Falcon (Phase III), the 2003 Falcon XR8 Ute and the Australian Falcon XR8.

name: Ford Bold Moves Street Racing
summary:
PSP port of "Ford Bold Moves Street Racing", (released in Europe as "Ford Street Racing: L.A. Duel")

Ford Bold Moves Street Racing is the third Razorworks-developed title in the licensed Ford Racing series since they took over development in Ford Racing 2. Unlike its predecessors, this version has an urban atmosphere. The road races, off-road challenges and circuit tracks have been removed and the action has been taken entirely to the streets of Los Angeles, with 24 tracks available. As in the previous version, the 18 available cars are all Fords, ranging from the 1968 Mustang GT to the 2007 Shelby GT 500.

name: Forklift Certified
summary: Welcome to Forklift Certified, a unique single-player 3D top-down puzzle experience where you can kick back, unwind, and enjoy clever challenges at your own pace. Take control of a forklift to navigate intricate puzzles, activate mechanisms, and conquer challenges in handcrafted levels

name: Forgotten Spirit
summary: Forgotten spirit is a first-person hardcore action game set in a fantasy world. Become a disturbed ghost and get ready to fight your enemies, parkour and explore.

name: Forest Reigns
summary: Forest Reigns is an emergent FPS set in post-apocalyptic Paris overrun by an evolving forest and its deadly creatures. Adapt to use the ever-changing environment in your favor. Modify your guns, bond with factions and explore the world freely. Your choices will shape the story.

name: For Sale
summary: For Sale is a PSX-esque first-person horror adventure game with a strong emphasis on atmosphere and exploration. Interact with objects, take pictures using your digital camera, and discover unnerving secrets all while exploring a seemingly ordinary house.

name: Football Stars: Head Ball Soccer Co-op Battle
summary:
Team up with friends for epic co-op battles.
Jump, kick, and unleash special moves.
Score big and become the ultimate champion!

name: Formula Racing Pro 2025
summary: Feel the Speed, Own the Track!

name: Fox McCloud's Blazing Blueberry Blast Off
Foxtale
summary: Embark on a thrilling fantasy sci-fi adventure as a courageous little fox! Team up with your animal and alien allies to battle relentless robot foes, discover inspiring stories, and journey across incredible vistas to save your planet from an intergalactic invasion.

name: Forsaken Facilities
summary: Find your fate in the Forsaken Facilities. Explore vast dungeons to gather a valuable resource for your mysterious kidnappers. Each day you enter a facility the only way to return is if you find the required resource. Test your luck to see how long you can survive through a variety of facilities.

name: Fox Legend
summary: The gamescore is achieved separately, that is, for each version you will earn an exclusive gamescore.

name: Forbidden Solitaire
summary: Forbidden Solitaire is a card-slashing horror game about unearthing the contents of a cryptic 1995 CD-ROM that should have never existed. From the creators of Ancient Enemy and Home Safety Hotline.

name: Following Spandaramet
summary: A side-scroller with combined 2D and 3D graphics, where you play as an armenian girl, searching for her little sister with the help of goddess Spandaramet.

name: Foss Park
summary: Foss Park is a psychological horror VN that takes you deep into the fractured mind of a nameless patient in an unsettling mental hospital. You awaken with no memory of how you arrived, haunted by fleeting images of a life destroyed—a house fire, a lost family, and echoes of a forgotten tragedy.

name: Forest Runner
summary: The game is a platform runner. The game is also suitable for offline play. The game is designed to just take a break from the action games and just walk around. You can just walk around the map, you can try to embed your files for yourself. The main task is to try to find way to get out from there.

name: Foliage vs. Undead
summary: A game created with the proposal of being a 3D version of Plants vs. Zombies.

name: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 2
summary: Grab your Glider and jump off the Battle Bus as Fortnite OG enters Chapter 1 Season 2, bringing back beloved POIs like Tilted Towers and Shifty Shafts! The days of the Fort Knights are upon us again, so rise to the challenge and fight valiantly with upcoming loot like the Boogie Bomb and Minigun.

name: Four in a Row
summary: Each player drops tokens into a grid, attempting to connect four tokens in a row. Whoever can connect four tokens in a row first is the winner!

name: Fortnite: Darkest Grumblings Pack
summary:
This "good boy" has a darker side and he is willing to share. Get ready to play fetch with the Darkest Grumblings Pack. Includes:

- 600 V-Bucks
- Dark Doggo Outfit (with LEGO Style)
- Bone Brief Back Bling
- The Up-Chucker Pickaxe

name: Forgotten Psychedelics
summary: Doomer Boards Project #70 is a set of 12 brand new Doom 2 levels for limit removing source ports. The host of the project was @JadingTsunami. The theme was 'the groovy vibes of 70s: brutalism, trippy art, wood paneling, shag carpets, and soft glowing computer lights'.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 6 - Season 2: Lawless
summary: Ransack Fletcher Kane’s banks, pull off a train heist and make an explosive getaway in Battle Royale Chapter 6 Season 2: LAWLESS.

name: Foddia
summary:
Foddia is a 2D-Platformer inspired by Getting Over It. There are difficult challenges to overcome and mysteries to uncover at every turn. Swing on ropes, make long jumps across chasms, and climb your way to the top of the Foddian Mountain.

You came here for a reason.
Was it to climb this mountain that won't stop towering over you?
Was it to search for secrets in the depths unknown?
Was it to become the fastest hiker the world has ever seen?

The only certainty is that if you leave now...
You may never know why you came in the first place.

name: Fogrest: The Whisper of Harbingers
summary: Fogrest is a 2D pixel adventure game. A fog has descended on the land, monstrous creatures are waiting to attack. Make your way through dark forests and deserted towns to find answers.

name: Forgekeepers
summary: As a Forgekeeper, upgrade your weapons, unlock powerful abilities, and battle relentless waves of alien invaders. Defend key locations, and help other comrades in this fast-paced roguelike action game. Adapt, strategize, and survive—can you withstand the onslaught?

name: Foepower
summary: Roguelite single character auto-battler - level up, gear up, and chill with the semi-idle gameplay

name: Fortnite: Darkest Grumblings Pack
summary:
This "good boy" has a darker side and he is willing to share. Get ready to play fetch with the Darkest Grumblings Pack. Includes:

600 V-Bucks
Dark Doggo Outfit (with LEGO Style)
Bone Brief Back Bling
The Up-Chucker Pickaxe

name: Formula Rush
summary: Formula Rush is a thrilling F1-inspired racing game! Race on real-world circuits, compete for the best lap times on global leaderboards, or challenge your friends in fun multiplayer races. With stunning graphics and regular updates, it's the ultimate racing experience on Steam!

name: Forklift Driving Simulator VR
summary: Forklift Driving Simulator VR offers a realistic, immersive forklift experience in an open warehouse environment. Master loading, unloading, and warehouse navigation with advanced physics. Hone your skills and enjoy the ultimate forklift operation simulation.

name: Fortitude Tower Defense
summary: A classic Tower Defense game with minor offensive tactics.

name: Food Park Manager
summary: Build and manage your own Food Park! Customize food stalls, hire staff, and cater to hungry customers as you find the perfect recipes. Decorate your park to attract and satisfy more customers.

name: Folk Tales: Ala Geyik
summary: Folk Tales: Ala Geyik is an action-horror game. It follows a hunter who, after experiencing a nightmare, is chased by a deer he has repeatedly killed. As supernatural events unfold, he must face the Ala Geyik in a night filled with haunting nightmares and his struggle for survival.

name: Forsaken Island
summary: Awaken as Captain Elias Blackbone, a cursed pirate turned undead skeleton, stranded on a haunted island. Scavenge, craft, and fight to survive as you rebuild your body, uncover dark secrets, and decide your ultimate fate.

name: Fomon
summary: A very minimalistic TCG card battler featuring creatures called Fomons. Grow your collection and discover a new unique Fomon every hour NOT DURING DEMO PLAY! Each Fomon comes with a tier and has its own attributes. Compete with others climbing the leaderboard.

name: Food Wagon
summary: "Awaken the Forbidden Flavors of the Gods!" Join Lanya, the adorable and charming chef-hero, on a forbidden culinary adventure in another world! Hunt, gather, and cook to grow stronger and challenge the authority of the gods. Cooking is freedom! A roguelike action RPG to satisfy everyone's tastes!

name: Food Fight Fiesta: Multi-Use Cards
summary: Multi-Use Cards: Eat Food to Heal, Throw them to Attack. No more dead hands! Start with 8 cards and battle through 13 challenging levels. Collect and combine over 200 unique cards to create thousands of powerful builds.

name: Fortnite: Cuddle Buns Pack
summary: Pawline will always rise to the occasion. Have a "bunderful' day with the Cuddle Buns Pack

name: Fortnite: Raptor Royale Pack
summary: From the skies to the streets, Recon Raptor has it all covered with the Raptor Royale Pack

name: Forsworn
summary: Step into a realm torn by divine conflict where every defeat is just another beginning in this rogue lite, turn-based tactics adventure where no hero fights alone. Build powerful synergies to overcome unforgiving battles and defy fate in a world controlled by the gods.

name: Forest Ranger Life Simulator
summary: Step into nature’s shoes – a ranger’s journey begins!

name: Forefront
summary: Forefront is an intense VR shooter featuring 32-player large-scale battles, land, sea, and air vehicles, and immersive, tactical combat. You are the tip of the spear in the war between a global energy giant and resistance forces. Which side will you take?

name: Fogreaver
summary: Fogreaver is an intense survival-action game set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. As a lone survivor, you must fight through relentless hordes, clearing each area to unlock new battlegrounds. Armed with powerful weapons, you’ll face increasingly difficult challenges.

name: Forget-Me-Not of the Tetragon
summary: Will you take the first step to reclaim your memories? Even if it means involving everyone...

name: Football Striker 2025
summary:
From the creative minds behind Jumping Food Games comes the sequel to the most exciting soccer puzzle game of the year: Football Striker 2025!
Dive into the world of soccer with this sequel and experience 20 new football-related levels that will challenge your gray matter.

Over 20 tricky levels are waiting for you!

Get Football Striker 2025 now and become a legend on the virtual pitch!

name: Foldy's OS Quest
summary: Foldy’s OS Quest invites players into a colorful computerized world for an action-packed 3D platforming adventure like no other! Run, jump, zip, surf and stomp your way through the magical world of personal computing, and take down the virus before it can break through the Firewall!

name: Forgotten Paths
summary: Awaken in a ruined world with no memory. A second chance to redeem yourself, but survival is a daily challenge. Aid survivors, manage madness with a black cat's help, and uncover your true purpose.

name: For All the People I Love
summary: Follow the expression of Prince Mont Grand's scattered feelings through different sceneries.

name: Foul Repercussion
summary: Challenged by his friends, this young boy stayed overnight at school and successfully overcame evil entities... or so he said. Little did he know, everything he told his friends was coming to reality. Will he manage to survive just like what he said in his lies?

name: Forest Smasher
summary: "Forest Smasher" is an exploration and looter-based TPS Rougelike game that focuses on "shooting & explosion". In randomly generated maze, you can destroy all obstacles and enemies you can see, with fast-paced battles, easy-to-use operations, and a amazing system of weapons and items.

name: For Her
summary: For Her is a single-player, story-driven psychological horror game that delves into the depths of morality, sacrifice, and the human psyche. You play as David Hill, a dedicated police officer in Dismas City. A loving husband and father, David always puts his family first, no matter the cost.

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 8
summary: The 8th season of Fortnite Festival, featuring modern pop icon Sabrina Carpenter

name: Foxxel Quest
summary: Foxxel Quest is a cute and challenging pixel art puzzle game! Help Foxxel find a warm hood while solving 80 unique puzzle levels. Each setting brings a new challenge that builds upon each other throughout the game. With 30 achievements and optional autoplay, it's fun for all ages!

name: Focus Simulator
summary: Practice Pulling focus On 11 Total different Lenses and a Multitude of scenarios!

name: Foot Lovers
summary: FOOT LOVERS - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Forbidden Z
summary: Forbidden Z is a VR horror shooter made for LBE VR in early 2017. Shoot down all the skulls, don't let them hurt you! This LBE VR game now got back online for server testing till April 9th.Please note: No English support No in-game voice chat support

name: Forest Asylum
summary: A short Psychological Horror Experience for one night that takes you through the dark corridors of a mental asylum. For best experience a dark room and headphones recommended.

name: Forest Friends Match
summary: Enter the enchanting world of Forest Friends Match, where you join adorable forest animals on a thrilling puzzle adventure! In this delightful match-3 game, you'll need to match exactly three cute forest animals to eliminate them and progress through challenging levels.

name: Forest Ranger Services: Episode 1
summary: Horror game series about the investigation of missing hikers in the U.S. National Parks. Follow the story of a wannabe reporter who got a job as a ranger to investigate the disappearances - several episodes that tell one story! Based on true events.

name: Forgotten Dreams
summary: The best dreams are to be forgotten, for they will destroy if not. A strange and abstract first person game that explores the forgotten. Navigate through maps and environments while completing objectives critical for survival.

name: Forgotten Hill: The Wardrobe
summary:
it is a point-and-click horror game where the player explores a haunted house and solves puzzles to cure a sick brother. The game revolves around a mysterious wardrobe with a dark secret that connects to the creatures tormenting the brother. The player must uncover the secrets of the wardrobe and the house to save their brother and understand the origins of the horror.
The game is part of the larger "Forgotten Hill" series, which features a variety of horror-themed point-and-click and first-person games. "Forgotten Hill: The Wardrobe" is notable for its focus on a central, enigmatic wardrobe and the dark secrets it holds.

name: Forgotten Lands: Online
summary: A free online multiplayer RPG that tells the tale of a realm whose history was lost to time! Battle through hoards of monsters, join up with other players you meet along the journey, and compete in enjoyable mini-games to rank in the leaderboards!

name: Fortune Cookie
summary: Look, there are fortune cookies! Fortune cookie is a click game which won't make you fat. Here you click the fortune cookie and see the words in it.

name: Fortune Cookie: More Cookies
summary: Wow, there are new fortune cookies here! More fortune cookies!

name: Four Mini Kingdoms War
summary: Dig gold, chop trees, raise sheep, use these resources to recruit soldiers and build defenses.Wage war with the remaining three kingdoms, or play against friends in a LAN multiplayer game!

name: FoxRun
summary: FoxRun is the result of a novice trying to make a game in a limited amount of time and now released on Steam for the pleasure of everyone. In FoxRun you are a fox that runs. Collect the coins for score or eat the burgers to regain life. Look out for the birds because they will kill you

name: Forgot to Poo
summary: A dog that forgot to poo trying to poo at it's favorite poo place.

name: Fossil Island
summary: It's the summer holidays and this year you're going to visit Fossil Island. Dig up fossils, explore the island, and stay away from the abandoned mine! This will be a summer to remember, for better or worse...

name: Four Seasons Around the World: Autumn in France
Forgetmenots
summary: Forgetmenots is a short story-driven puzzle game. Set on a theatre stage you control a knit doll trying to recreate lost memories. The game was made by Forgetful Studios a group of 10 students from Sweden.

name: Formula Legends
summary: From the golden age to the modern era, race through time in Formula Legends. Master reimagined circuits, command legendary cars, and chase glory across decades of motorsport history. A love letter to Formula racing, where speed, skill, and strategy define the champion.

name: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 3
summary: Relive the era of… hold up, what’s that in the sky? Fortnite OG is crashing into Chapter 1 Season 3, complete with the return of Lucky Landing and a meteor that’s on a seriously worrying collision course! Also from the OG days, the 50v50 LTM returns as OG 50v50.

name: Football Heroes League
summary: Football Heroes League is a high-octane multiplayer soccer game where superhuman abilities meet precise controls.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 6 - Mini Season 1: Galactic Battle
summary:
A galactic reckoning is coming…

Imperial Star Destroyers exit hyperspace in formation around the Death Star, which looms with its superlaser array fixed on the BR map. Heroes from across eras are ready to strike back against the assault led by Emperor Palpatine from the shadows, and the Island’s fate hangs in the balance. Draw your lightsaber and ready your blaster in Fortnite: GALACTIC BATTLE!

name: Forever Time
summary: I wish this moment could be forever. Yuto Habu, the hero with nothing to show for it, met the camera-toting heroine He meets the heroine, Nazuna Fukamachi, who has a camera, on a bridge with a beautiful view by chance.

name: For the Greater Good
summary: For the Greater Good is a violent, story-driven action game where unique characters fight a blood cult hell-bent on world domination.

name: Foodomina
summary: In the Galaxy Foodomina... Play as two cute Food Girls! And fight... MOLD?! In space! Explore Foodian Planets & make friends to save the universe from Mold Infection! But the Mold People... use to be Food People! Maybe there's another way... and maybe that way is... Food Puns?

name: Foreman Frenzy!
summary: Arcade Styled 2D Platformer, RUN, CLIMB, DODGE, and BOUNCE your way through 9 challenging and tense rounds, fetch your crew's 5 fallen lunches before time runs out, and whatever you do, STEER CLEAR of the mutant food dudes lurking around every corner!

name: Football Career
summary: Create unique football player careers with 200 national teams, 19 leagues, 345 teams, and 12 different positions. Bundesliga, Premier League, Serie A, Ligue 1, La Liga, Primeira Liga, Eredivisie, Süper Lig, Jupiler Pro League, Scottish Premiership, Campeonato Brasileiro, Liga MX, Superliga Argentina, Swiss Super League, Ekstraklasa, Major League Soccer, Saudi Professional League, Austrian Bundesliga. Champions League, Europa League, Europa Conference League, World Cup, Copa América, AFC Asian Cup, Africa Cup of Nations, CONCACAF Gold Cup, UEFA European Championship, Ballon d'Or, Golden Shoe.

name: Food Truck Business Simulator
summary: Cook, drive, and compete—build your food truck business from the ground up.

name: ForestVille
summary: ForestVille is a magical forest where players can build, decorate and play with a cast of colorful animal characters. Travel through the forest and create an enchanted community of businesses, homes and amazing landmarks.

name: Foto Boy: Flashstar
summary: Join Kin, during his side job in this hilarious journey!

name: Formless Star
summary:
The Formless Star, a mysterious planet whose surface constantly changes...
You're Anemo, a field researcher for the Space Archives!
Your assignment is to travel to the Formless Star and gather data on the animals that live there.
Each time you step out of your spaceship, the land will change. A new world just for you!
Discover 60 different alien creatures, all with with unique behaviours and descriptions.

name: Forklift: Simulator
summary: Deliver the cargo across industrial area in realistic forklift simulator!

name: Foodie Yama
summary: Foodie has a good appetite. Feed him in the new old-school arcade game Foodie Yama!

name: Fortune: Hoshi no Furi Sosogu Oka
Forklift Certified: Stacked and Loaded
summary: Chaos meets co-op in this fast-paced forklift frenzy! Team up with up to 4 players to stack, crash, and (barely) survive the warehouse floor. Master the forks, dodge disaster, and deliver perfection—kinda. You're not just licensed... you're Forklift Certified!

name: Fourmiworld
summary: Carve your own path through Fourmiworld - an "open-world-ant-farm-metroidvania". Play as an interdimensional urban explorer girl, collect gamut to unlock new abilities, and discover the sights, plights, & soundbites of a surreal alien dimension.

name: Foodslingers
summary: Cook, run, jump, and throw— all in the name of FoodCorp. This chaotic, physics-based spin on the classic cooking formula demands speed, strategy, and just the right amount of panic! Play with up to 4 friends and try to run the restaurant smoothly... or let it all go up in flames.

name: Formula 2025: Grand Prix Legends
summary: Live the speed. Write your legend.

name: Food Delivery Simulator 2025
summary: Build your own food delivery business! Deliver orders, earn money, upgrade your vehicle, explore a vast city, manage your office, hire drivers, and furnish your home.

name: For Honor: Warmonger Hero Skin
summary:
Become the doom of a stolen empire with the Hero Skin of Conquistador Vela, a full body customization of the Warmonger. Sent across the sea to explore the New World, Conquistador Vela has returned to Heathmoor with the stolen riches of a fallen civilization. A brutal explorer and a plunderer, Vela crowns herself a conquering hero. With the gold she has brought home, Horkos will triumph.

The Hero Skin of Conquistador Vela offer includes:
- One Warmonger Hero Skin.
- Seven-Day Champion Status.
- Three Scavenger Crates.

name: Formation Z
summary:
The Famicom port of Formation Z. The player competes in a marathon continuous scrolling horizontal shoot-em-up game across land, sea, air and outer space. You can hold down the fire button for a burst of Charged fire, which is especially essential to defeat the bosses.

The player can hold down the Jump button to transform back and forth between a Mobile Robot or an Aero Fighter. Some sections have confrontations on both ground and air; others insist on aerial battling. Your time in the Aero Fighter is limited by its fuel requirement.

name: Food Cart Simulator
summary: Cook, hustle, and rise in Food Cart Simulator! Start with a humble food cart, serve up delicious meals, and upgrade your gear to expand. Manage loans, buy supplies, and survive the streets — but be careful who you borrow from! Can you build your street food empire?

name: Foglit
summary: Brave the cursed lands of Cirilis, in Foglit, a top-down action roguelite. Hack and slash through monsters, and collect powerful runes to customize your build. Unravel a dark story with impactful choices and multiple endings. Can you break the cycle?

name: Football Career Mode 26
summary: Football Career Mode 26 is a straightforward football manager game. Choose a club, choose a sponsor and start your football manager career! Lead your club to the top through transfers, scouting, infrastructure updates and much more and win as many titles as possible!

name: Forbidden Offering
summary: Forbidden Offering is an isometric roguelite survivor game. Stop the dark ritual, carve your path through hordes of monsters, and save the girl. Can you survive the ordeal?

name: Forest
summary: Forest is a multiplayer first-person shooter with an emphasis on realism. This game has a minimum of casual aspects, you won't see the usual crosshair in the center of the screen, health and ammo counter. Everything is done so that the immersion is maximum

name: Followers of Krow
summary: Possess yourself an adventurer in this roguelike autobattler! Train their bodies, teach them powerful abilities, explore the world of fantasy to find them powerful equipment, ancient runes and relics. Seek out your enemies and... whether they die is up to Krow.

name: Forest Construction VR
summary: In Forest Construction VR you will have the opportunity to experience all the joy of free construction with realistic physics, while being in a pleasant forest environment. A sandbox where the only limit is your imagination. Create a simple shelter or a piece of art? It's up to you!

name: Forsaker: DingDing&Blade
summary: A visual novel/roguelike hybrid where a simple mission spirals into a cannibalistic odyssey. You'll struggle as a fragile human, blood-soaked knight, or flesh-devouring Forsaker. Devour or be devoured—yet your fate dangles by unseen strings. Choose: cling to this broken world... or forsake it.

name: Forest Fables
summary: Relax in the fairytale oasis of talking pixel animals, makeover your dream cozy home, explore the adorable town of Wildleaf Forest in this healing life sim! Prepare delicious coffee and croissants in the adorable café game, harvest juicy crops in the farming village and earn idle money to live your dream forest life sims. Play this cute adventure game with money education through life simulation now, and experience cozy forest life!

name: Football Mini Stars
summary: Take the title of the best football player in a cute cartoon world.

name: Fortune's Favor
summary: Left for dead on Mutiny Island by a traitorous first mate, you must survive and reclaim your lost ship, the Red Dawn. In this 3D open‑world pirate adventure.

name: Four Directions
summary: Four Directions is a turn-based strategy game that incorporates mechanical tasks and card skills based on the war chess game. Players will control 15 heroes, with different professions, use a variety of card skills, open mechanical devices on the chessboard map and confront the enemy head-on.

name: Forest Warden
summary: Forest Warden is a horror game set in a dark, corrupted forest. A relentless creature lurks in the shadows, twisting the world into eternal night, looking for you. Light is your only defense as you explore, scavenge and craft to survive the hunt.

name: Fofumia
summary: Welcome to Fofumia! Clean up the mess left by the adorable Fofunos - playful, hyperactive one-eyed kittens who love scattering toys and objects everywhere. It's up to you to set everything straight...

name: Fortnite: Chapter 6 - Season 3: Super
summary: While Mask Maker Daigo siphons energy from beneath the Island’s bedrock, the next generation of heroes rise up at Supernova Academy. Brimming with unbridled power, these brave recruits must master their abilities to deny Daigo’s drain. So, lock in! Train. Give it everything you’ve got. Reach your prime. It’s time for a superhero crash course in Fortnite BR Chapter 6 Season 3: Super!

name: For Blood and Glory
summary: Step into the ever-changing arena as you go head to head with your friends locally or online in a brutally hilarious mix of physics and skill based combat.

name: Forza Horizon 6
summary: Discover the breathtaking landscapes of Japan and become a racing Legend at the Horizon Festival. Add Forza Horizon 6 to your Wishlist today!

name: Forgotten Signal: Portal
summary: Grandfather contacted aliens, a portal opened, and he was taken! Solve puzzles, go through the portal to space, and save him. Survive with 3 skills: see enemies, turn invisible, stop time to freeze foes. Fight aliens, defeat the giant boss!

name: For the Forge
summary: Build the ultimate PvP slot machine and battle rival dwarves for control of the last great dwarven forge!

name: Fold the World
summary:
Fold the World is a puzzle game based on the physics of paper.

Guide Yolo through beautifully crafted puzzles, uncover hidden paths and outsmart the evil Lord of Darkness. Fold the World is a stunning exploration of Paper Kingdom, a puzzling storybook world, where exciting plot twists await you behind every fold.

name: Forsaken Valley
summary: A narrative RPG where your emotions are not stats. They are your story. Explore, create things, communicate with tribes and solve all the mysteries of this strange place. Thousands of enemies stand in your way, whether you can crush them is up to you.

name: Food Truck Monopoly
summary: Food Truck Monopoly is a simulation game where you step into the shoes of a food truck worker on a mission to manage a business. Navigate bustling city streets, take orders from demanding customers, cook up delicious meals under pressure, and keep your food truck rolling.

name: Forged Into History: Speedway Odyssey
summary: Welcome to the world of speedway racing. Speedway Odyssey offers you a chance to compete in the battle for championship at the top tier of a speedway competition. Can you earn the title of champion? And if you do, can you defend it?

name: Food Cart, Inc.
summary: Food Cart, Inc. is a fast food simulation game where you run a mobile food cart, focused on real-time cooking and quick service. Move your cart across different city zones, prepare orders, pay rent, and try to keep your customers happy.

name: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 4
summary:
OG Chapter 1: Season 4 is the fourth season of Fortnite OG. It started on June 7th 2025 and will end on August 8th 2025.

The season has the slogan Prepare for Launch.

name: Fox XII
summary: Switch between top-down and third-person while engaging in intense dungeon combat packed with deadly foes and loot. Return to base camp to craft new upgrades and progress the storyline. Each run delivers unpredictable challenges and endless roguelike excitement.

name: Formula Suzuki Hayabusa Time Attack
summary:
Formula Suzuki Hayabusa Time Attack is a Playstation 2 racing advergame from Suzuki.
It's made to advertise the Formula Suzuki Hayabusa events.

The best laps are to be submitted to a leaderboard in the Suzuki website (in 2002) that is currently down.

name: Forza Horizon 3: Car Pass
summary: The Car Pass brings you six monthly car packs (7 cars each) beginning in October 2016, ending March 2017. That’s 42 amazing new cars total, all waiting to be collected, customized, and raced, for one low price.

name: Forza Horizon 3: VIP
summary: Forza Horizon 3 VIP members receive five exclusive VIP cars, the 2016 Lamborghini Aventador LP750-4 SV, 2016 Koenigsegg Regera, 2015 Ferrari F12tdf, 2015 Ultima Evolution Coupe 1020, and 2015 Ford Falcon GT F 351. VIPs will receive additional benefits, including double Wheelspin earnings, access to exclusive online events, community gifts, and more.

name: Forza Motorsport 7: Hoonigan Car Pack
summary: This add-on pack features 7 new cars for you to collect, race, and customize, including the 1965 Ford "Hoonicorn" Mustang, 1955 Hoonigan Chevrolet Belair, 1972 Hoonigan Chevrolet Napalm Nova, 1978 Hoonigan Ford Escort RS1800, 1992 Hoonigan Mazda RX-7 Twerkstallion, 2003 Holden Commodore Ute, and the 1991 Rauh-Welt Begriff Porsche 911 Turbo.

name: Forsaken Manor
summary: Forsaken Manor is an exhilarating 3D horror game where you must explore an abandoned and grim house filled with secrets and dangers. Your task is to find all the key items hidden in the dark corners of this sinister place to unveil its dark secrets and survive.

name: Forgotten Journey
summary: "Forgotten Journey" is a card collection game of beautiful girls from another world. In the game, players will become the master, travel through thousands of time and space, and adventure with several familiar phantom heroes.

name: Fortress-Life
summary: Ever wonder what it would be like if Gordon Freeman join the Team Fortress 2 mercenaries? Well, wonder no more! Fortress-Life brings this idea to life adding Gordon Freeman as a fully fledged 10th class!

name: Fork Frog
summary: Fork Frog is a Puzzle Game about moving boxes with a Fork Lift, as a Frog.

name: Foundlings
summary: Guide two troubled mages through a civil war-torn 12th-century England in this real-time spellcasting RPG. Forge spells by combining conduits, perfectly time your inputs, level up your Liberal Arts learning and keep your Humours in check as you help them find their purpose.

name: Food Truck Shop Simulator
summary: Build your dream food truck from scratch in this Early Access game! Master street food, navigate traffic, serve customers, and upgrade your business. Join festivals and help shape the future of the game as you rise to become a street food legend!

name: Forza Horizon 5: JDM Jewels Car Pack
summary: Four cars of different styles, sizes, and uses arrive at the Horizon Festival from Japan! Modify, drive, and collect four emblems of the Japanese Market with the JDM Jewels Car Pack.

name: Fortnite 2: Love on the Battlefield
summary: A new romantic twist on the game of the century, take control of one of the greatest Battle Royalers of all time on their quest to find the sweet, succulent true love.

name: Forestless
summary: Forestless is an atmospheric psychological adventure where you'll journey through a world of fears armed only with a magical arrow of hope. Explore biomes that embody human nightmares - from misty wastelands of loneliness to scorched deserts of loss.

name: Folklorests
summary: In the bowels of the Amazon forest, ancient treasures and terrors await you. Face vengeful spirits and folkloric creatures in Folklorests, a hack ‘n slash that mixes classic action with strategic exploration in a dark and vibrant world.

name: Forest Ranger Services: Episode 2
summary: Horror game series about the investigation of missing hikers in the U.S. National Parks. Follow the story of a wannabe reporter who got a job as a ranger to investigate the disappearances - several episodes that tell one story! Based on true events.

name: Forest Ranger Services
summary: Horror game series about the investigation of missing hikers in the U.S. National Parks. Follow the story of a wannabe reporter who got a job as a ranger to investigate the disappearances - several episodes that tell one story! Based on true events

name: Four Divine Abidings
summary: Complete the Path to Liberation in the mindfulness-themed idle/incremental game inspired by Buddhist philosophy. Enjoy a calm, atmospheric hand-painted Journey with strategic depth and multiple layers of progression.

name: Forest Asylum 2
summary: Forest Asylum 2 - An Indie Psychological Horror Game and the sequel to the well-received first part. Embark on a Therapy that will change your life!

name: ForbiddenEgg
summary:
My name is Toshio.
My dream is to find a girlfriend.
Please!
Make me handsome, please.

name: Fowl Legacy
summary: What the cluck?! Ricardo was sent to Hell! It's time for revenge. Explore different landscapes, jump, run and dash past deadly obstacles, search every corner... and defeat the ultimate evil keeping you from returning to your world!

name: Fool King
summary: The eternal Fool King has ruled tyranically over Everdawn for centuries. You must raise a rebellion and wage war across the land to eventually overthrow them at the Black Citadel and restore 'peace' to the land

name: Forgotten Realms: Demon Stone
summary: This adventure is set in the lands of the Forgotten Realms, where perilous evil and great heroes are enveloped by magic, prophecy and mystery. You control a party of three - Fighter, Sorcerer and Rogue - on a quest to right a great wrong and change the path of the future.

name: Forced Entry
summary: A masked serial killer has Forced Entry into your home knocking you out and locking you into the basement, You must now try to escape before its to late. Can you escape or will you become another victim of this relentless butcher.

name: Foos
summary: Score 15 points to win against a series of opponents with unique abilities in this foosball inspired arcade game! Play with or against your friends, and hone your skills by beating your high scores in the Challenge Modes!

name: Formula Racing GP: Apex Overtaking
summary: You don’t chase victory — you overtake it.

name: Fortune
summary: An RPG science fiction game. Collect clues and evidence to break a murder case. Options for the task will lead to different story-lines and endings. Searching mysterious debris to unlock the history of the world and discover their relationship with human race.

name: Food Fight
summary: The ultimate Card Battler with a delicious twist! Food Fight features 15+ Hero Decks & 500+ cards. Engage in deep strategic duels, enjoy chaotic Mini-Games, conquer classic Card Games & grow Flavor Town with idle rewards.

name: Fold & Fly
summary: Fold & Fly is a relaxing yet fast-paced flying game where you guide a paper plane through whimsical worlds. Collect stars to raise your score, catch origami dragonflies to open portals, explore infinite, procedurally generated dreamscapes and use seeds to create new maps and save your favorites.

name: Four Divine Abidings: Supporter
summary: This DLC provides a way to support the game development. It includes additional 7 Seedlings as a token of appreciation. Seedlings can be planted to slightly boost all Divine Abidings, Encounter rewards and visual look.

name: Foodie's Furniture
summary: A mod introducing only the highest quality placeable foods and food accessories!

name: Forever Delicious Bundle
summary: Four incredible games, one delicious bundle!

name: Forest Doesn’t Care
