summary: Forest Doesn't Care is a mushroom-picking simulator set in a realistic forest environment. Players explore the woodland area to forage for mushrooms while encountering secrets and unusual findings. The game features atmospheric elements and emphasizes the indifferent nature of the forest setting during gameplay.

name: Forest Factory
summary: Build, automate, and thrive in Forest Factory! Chop trees, craft wooden goods, and sell them to grow your factory. Manage your depot, fulfill orders, and balance nature with machinery in a serene forest setting. Experience automation in the wild!

name: Forester: First Step
summary: An old cabin in the woods holds secrets. Explore the environment, search for objects and find a way out in a first-person horror.

name: Forgotten Beginnings: A New Afterlife
summary: An RPG Maker MZ game done in the style of a 1980s NES RPG, with a NES-styled (but not NES authentic) soundtrack.

name: For What Will Come: Reimagined
summary: A narrative-driven psychological mystery where time twists and secrets wait to be uncovered. Return home, explore the past, and shape your future in this hauntingly emotional adventure.

name: Forsaken Ones
summary: A soulslike action game focused on boss battles. Push your limits, learn from death, and overcome obstacles in a hostile world.

name: Fortnite: Luminary Hypatia Starter Pack
summary: Deck out your own quarters with the Luminary Hypatia Starter Pack. Includes on Outfit (with LEGO style) and Decor Bundle (with 12 Decor Items for use in LEGO Fortnite).

name: Fortnite: Yellowjacket Pack
summary:
Watch out for her sting.
The Yellowjacket Pack includes the Yellowjacket Outfit, Venom Blade Pickaxe and 600 V-Bucks! Available in the Item Shop now.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 6 - Season 4: Shock 'N Awesome
summary: The orders are in, so charge headfirst into the hive! The bugs out there? Vicious, relentless, swarming. The vermin are dug in deep, and drawing out the queen won’t be easy. Neutralize the infestation with the latest and greatest high-tech tools in Fortnite BR Chapter 6 Season 4: Shock ‘N Awesome!

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 9
summary: Sabrina’s leaving the door open for the next Fortnite Festival Icon… Bruno Mars! This GRAMMY-winning megastar is expanding his record-breaking world tour with a stop in Fortnite.

name: Forest Rites
summary: Defeat the forest's masters in this exciting trick-taking card battler!

name: Folk Tales: Alageyik
summary: Folk Tales: Ala Geyik is an action-horror game. It follows a hunter who, after experiencing a nightmare, is chased by a deer he has repeatedly killed. As supernatural events unfold, he must face the Ala Geyik in a night filled with haunting nightmares and his struggle for survival.

name: For Honor: The Crucible Lord – Centurion Hero Skin
summary:
The Crucible Lord is a Hero Skin for the Centurion, inspired by Destiny 2. The skin features gear provided by a machine entity known as Ghost. The Centurion is depicted as a Guardian selected to combat the threat of Dark Ether and the undead Scorn it creates.

The design incorporates elements associated with the Light, framing the Crucible Lord as a combatant in an ongoing conflict involving interdimensional forces.

This Hero Skin offer includes:
1 Centurion Hero Skin
7-Day Champion Status
3 Scavenger Crates

name: For Honor: The Violet King - Lawbringer Hero Skin
summary:
The Violet King is a Hero Skin for the Lawbringer, inspired by Destiny 2. The design features spiked armor associated with a machine entity referred to as Ghost. The character is equipped to confront the effects of Dark Ether and the undead Scorn forces it influences.

The Violet King is positioned as a figure aligned with the power of Light, resisting external threats originating beyond Heathmoor.

This Hero Skin offer includes:

1 Lawbringer Hero Skin
7-Day Champion Status
3 Scavenger Crates

name: Fortune Seller
summary: A gothic roguelike shopkeeping game where you sell antiques, read the tarot, and manage your inventory to survive crushing rent increases. Match strange customers with the relics they crave, unlock powerful cards, and gamble your way out of debt, one deal at a time.

name: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 5
summary: The sky is cracked and weird things are falling out! Rumors of a viking village and fancy golf resort (golf karts included) run amok, and some even say a floating cube is on its way. Grapple with all of this and more in Fortnite OG Chapter 1 Season 5, available from August 7 to October 3, 2025 Eastern Time!

name: Fox Flare Night
summary: Shape-shifting Kitsune Mio battles the mischievous Tanuki army in this fast-paced, comedic side-scrolling shooter! Unleash powerful yōjutsu and transformations to dodge bullet barrages. Packed with modes for both casual and hardcore players, offering plenty of content to master!

name: For the Wheat
summary: A high score arena shooter. Run. Cull. Die. Repeat. Unlock advantages and beat your survival time. How long will you last?

name: Forge the Fates
summary: This roguelike deckbuilder transforms your classic hand of cards into a grid of runes. Play a rune and the ones behind it shift forward, so every move shapes what’s next. Build a unique deck, trigger match-3 combos, and outplay your enemies.

name: Forza Motorsport: Racing Heroes Car Pack
summary:
Unleash your adrenaline with the Forza Motorsport: Racing Heroes Car Pack. Includes 5 exhilarating cars for you to collect, race, and drift.

Get behind the wheel of the new-to-Motorsport 2024 Ford Mustang GT3, 2001 Formula Drift #215 Nissan Silvia Spec-R, 1997 Toyota Mark II Tourer V JZX100, and 1984 De Tomaso Pantera GT5. Plus, experience the fan favorite and super-rare 2008 Mazda Furai!

name: Forza Horizon 5 Nissan Heritage Car Pack
summary: Explore Nissan's automotive heritage with the Forza Horizon 5 Nissan Retro Rides Car Pack featuring 4 classic vehicles from the iconic Japanese brand.

name: Forza Motorsport: 2024 Ford Mustang Dark Horse
summary: Forza Motorsport 2024 Ford Mustang Dark Horse

name: Forza Horizon 5 Universal Icons Car Pack
Foreverthorn
summary: Explore the dungeons of Rose Chapel, blast enemies with your shotgun, avoid deadly traps and collect roses for your wife's grave.

name: Fourth Dimension
summary: Fourth Dimension is a single-player psychological thriller where reality and fear collide. Navigate dark dimensions with parkour mechanics, test your reflexes, and face the terror that awaits.

name: Four Hundred Feral Dogs In The Backrooms
summary: a wise master once asked his student "whats your name" the student replied with Geremy.

name: Forest Game
summary:
Forest Game is a horror game about a mysterious forest that has a bunch of myths and rumors surrounding it.

You play as Abby, a young naive teen trying to see if those rumors of monsters and death are true. They decide one day to head on to the forest in the middle of the night to prove that they're mature.

name: Foolish Earthlings!
summary: A side scrolling side-on shooter from the depths of a long-lost arcade cabinet where you take the role of a UFO on the hunt for human prey! Capture them alive with your tractor beam and pull them into your saucer while unleashing your heat ray upon tanks, planes, and all manner of military might!

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 10
summary:
Gorillaz — the biggest virtual band in the world — has crossed over and crash-landed into a whole new universe! With their colorful backstory and ground-breaking musical ways, they’re ready to put on a show.

Band members Noodle, 2D, Russel Hobbs, and Murdoc Niccals are the Icons of Fortnite Festival Season 10. Watch out for this dream line-up making their Festival debut on August 26!

name: Fortnite: Hexed and Haunted Pack
summary: Greta keeps an eye on the underworld while Ivor keeps an eye on her. Keep watch together with the Hexed & Haunted Pack. Includes an Outfit (w/ LEGO Style), Back Bling, Pickaxe and access to "Save the World" PvE Campaign.

name: Fortnite: Bee Positive Pack
summary:
Flutter through the battlefield, handing out sweet defeat with the Bee Positive Pack. Includes:
600 V-Bucks
Polly Outfit (with LEGO Style)
Sun Flower Back Bling
Honey Scepter Pickaxe

name: Focus and Find Stereogram Training
summary:
Stare closely and a hidden image will pop out!
Train your eyes and brain with mysterious stereograms

name: Forbidden Ground: Lair of Aooni
summary: It is a forbidden place that must never be entered. Strange events encountered in the decadent school building. And a Japanese doll that begins to speak. There is something here. ......This is a Japanese horror game that reveals the abominable history hidden in an abandoned school.

name: Forkraith
summary: You are trapped in the middle of urban labyrinth, and you have to exit ASAP! Examine the surrounding and find out if there are any anomalies or not. Can you choose the correct route and escape?

name: Folie Fatale: Kousaku Fanaticism
summary: A DLC for Folie Fatale, telling past stories of the love interests, as well events that take place after the main story.

name: Football Manager 26
summary: Step into the dugout and experience the future of football management.

name: Food Hell
summary: Food is your salvation and your downfall. Jump across platforms as you feast on the rain of food. Eat 100 to pass, and 150 to show off. Beware, too many or too few calories will kill you, and the rising tide, born of what you let fall, will swallow you whole.

name: Forza Horizon 4: Car Pass
summary: Get 49 extra cars at one low price! All cars included in the Car Pass grant you a one-time only, free addition of each car to your Forza Horizon 4 garage, with no additional in-game credit cost. The Forza Horizon 4 Car Pass is included with Forza Horizon 4 Deluxe and Ultimate Editions, and the Ultimate Add-Ons Bundle.

name: Forza Horizon 4: Welcome Pack
summary:
The Forza Horizon 4 Welcome Pack comes with 8 stunning, pre-tuned cars and a quintessential British House. Included with this pack are specially pre-tuned Welcome Pack editions of the 1996 Ferrari F50 GT, 2017 Ford GT, 1960 Porsche 718 RS 60, 2016 Hoonigan Gymkhana 9 Ford Focus RS RX, 1993 Toyota #1 T100 Baja Truck, 2012 Lamborghini Aventador LP700-4, 2016 Subaru #199 WRX STI VT15R Rally Car, and the 1976 Jeep CJ5 Renegade. The Welcome Pack grants you a one-time only, free addition of each car to your Forza Horizon 4 garage, with no additional in-game credit cost.

Also included are the Sunflower Meadows Player House and Horizon Promo Feature Unlock.

name: Four Circles
summary: A simple logical game where your goal is to correctly place four circles in their designated positions.

name: Football Legacy Manager 26
summary: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional American football team!

name: Football Legacy Manager 25
summary: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional American football team!

name: For The King: Lost Civilization
summary:
- Explore the lost Jungle Falls Realm
A lush jungle forest beckons adventurers to explore its dense wood, but what dangers lurk under its thick mysterious canopy?

- Two New Playable Characters
Go on the offensive with the glory-seeking Gladiator or harness dark energy from the heavens with the wise Astronomer!

- Spectacular Arena Battles
For Glory! Defeat waves of enemies before a cheering crowd in the new gladiator arenas.

- New Weapons
Throw caution to the wind with devastating dual wield weapons or gamble on the destructive power of the versatile wands.

- New Enemies and Loot
More than 90 new items closely guarded by over 50 new enemies. From giant snakes to petrifying golems, the rewards are great but the stakes are even higher.

name: Force Restart
summary:
A darkness creeps into a man's life, twisting his reality.

In FORCE RESTART, a first-person psychological survival horror game, explore mind-bending worlds and experience haunting storytelling as you struggle to escape the VOID.

name: For Honor: Khatun - Hero
summary:
Enact bloody wrath with your Turco-Mongol sabers and instill fear in your enemies.

The Khatun Hero offer includes:
1 New Hero: Khatun
1 Ornament
1 Elite Outfit
7-Day Champion Status (Extra XP, Extra Loot, and More)
3 Scavenger Crates with Random Gear

name: For Honor: Gudmundr the Great - Warlord Hero Skin
summary:
Unleash the indomitable shield of Svengård and the legendary sword of Gudmundr the Great with the brand-new Hero Skin for the Warlord. Gudmundr the Great is the esteemed Viking Jarl who valiantly defended Svengård during the fierce assault by the Blackstone Legion. Revered as a legend among his people, Gudmundr the Great has led his warriors to countless victories through his unmatched skill and strategic genius. His fierce passion for battle is equaled only by his unwavering dedication and loyalty to his Viking brothers and sisters. Embrace the strength and spirit of Gudmundr the Great and lead your warriors to triumph.

The Hero Skin of Gudmundr the Great offer includes:
1 Warlord Hero Skin
7-Day Champion Status
3 Scavenger Crates

name: For Honor: The Unsung Knight - Warden Hero Skin
summary:
The Unsung Knight’s identity is a mystery. When she was a child, a noble Knight took her on as a squire. He trained her to become a Warden, a paragon of hope and strength, entrusting her with Valor’s Edge, an ancient sword dating back to the days long before the Cataclysm. With the sword in her grasp, The Unsung Knight now travels the wastelands, helping those in need. Dedicated to the protection of the weak, she will not hesitate to fight any and all invaders who would take valuable resources from her people.

The Unsung Knight Warden Hero Skin offer includes:
- One Warden Hero Skin
- Seven-Day Champion Status
- Three Scavenger Crates

name: For Honor: Sohei - Hero
summary:
Sohei are warrior monks who wield seven weapons. Under the tutelage of Oniwaka and Master Katashi, Sohei attain spiritual and martial mastery deep in a Myre monastery. To earn the name Sohei, they must train with a single weapon for years before being allowed to move on to the next.

Often arrogant, the Sohei deeply respect the rare worthy opponent. To have your weapon chosen by a Sohei is the highest honor, for they believe the blade contains the soul of the Samurai. Warriors’ souls thus live on in battle. These collections make the Sohei, quite literally, armies of one.

The Sohei Hero offer includes:
One New Hero: Sohei

One Ornament

One Elite Outfit

Seven-Day Champion Status (Extra XP, Extra Loot, and More)

Three Scavenger Crates with Random Gear

name: For Honor: Violet King & Crucible Lord - Hero Skin Bundle
summary:
Give your homeworld its best chance of survival as The Crucible Lord and The Violet King, new Hero Skins for the Centurion and Lawbringer inspired by Destiny 2. These two heroes have been chosen by a mysterious machine known as Ghost, which has clad them in otherwordly gear.

Fighting side by side, these two Guardians of Heathmoor wield their new gifts to take on the monstrous Scorn – and the dread Scorn Baron that brings the minions back from the dead. Transmat into battle and strike back against Dark Ether.

The For Honor x Destiny 2 Hero Skin Bundle includes:
1 Centurion Hero Skin
1 Lawbringer Hero Skin
14-Day Champion Status
6 Scavenger Crates

name: For Honor: General Zhi - Zhanhu Hero Skin
summary:
With the new Zhanhu Hero Skin, embody the Wu Lin's most tactical and treacherous sword arm. General Zhi is the wielder of the Starfall Sword, a ceremonial blade said to be forged from a comet and gifted to enemies as a token of peace. Zhi now gifts it to Astrea to forge an alliance. But few can say whether he offers his sword in peace or in blood. Scheming and deadly, General Zhi is always ten steps ahead in a game his enemies do not even know they're playing.

The Hero Skin of General Zhi offer includes:
1 Zhanhu Hero Skin
7-Day Champion Status
3 Scavenger Crates

name: For Honor: The Warrior Prince - Aramusha Hero Skin
summary:
Wind back time and embrace your destiny as The Warrior Prince, a new hero skin for the Aramusha, inspired by Prince of Persia: Warrior Within. The legendary Sands of Time reshape Heathmoor as the wandering Prince returns, armed with deadly blades and an unyielding will. Carve your legend before time runs out!

Step into battle with the fierce elegance of a warrior forged by the trials of time. With steel in hand and destiny in his grasp, he carves his own legend, defying the chains of fate. Will you embrace the path of the tormented Prince, or be lost to the flow of time?

The Warrior Prince Aramusha Hero Skin offer includes:
1 Aramusha Hero Skin
7-Day Champion Status
3 Scavenger Crates with random gear

name: For Honor: Queen Kalliopi Gladiator Hero Skin
summary:
Kalliopi’s past remains shrouded in mystery. What is known is that her tribe fell to the relentless conquest of Guljin, leaving her a prisoner of the Khatun. But Kalliopi’s story didn’t end in chains—it began anew. Faced with impossible odds, Kalliopi rose to the challenge. Her unmatched skill, unyielding determination, and magnetic presence have made her the star of Guljin’s bloody spectacles. To Kalliopi, the arena is no longer a cage; it is her kingdom. She has embraced her role fully, wielding her growing fame as both armor and purpose in a life reshaped by the Khatun’s victory.

The Hero Skin of Queen Kalliopi offer includes:

1 Gladiator Hero Skin

7-Day Champion Status

3 Scavenger Crates

name: For Honor: Lady Saori – Nobushi Hero Skin
summary:
When the lord of Castle Chiyo is away, his enemies strike in the dead of night. The protection of the people then falls to his wife, Lady Saori, who takes up arms to defend the castle. Outnumbered and desperate, she faces unimaginable loss, the death of her people, and the destruction of her family home – her legacy. Broken, furious, and ridden with guilt, the weight of her failure takes hold of her, a darkness emerging from the inside. She loses herself. And she will become something more. Something terrifying.

Unlock the Lady Saori skin now and fight with the fury of a lone guardian.

The Hero Skin of Lady Saori offer includes:

1 Nobushi Hero Skin
7-Day Champion Status
3 Scavenger Crates

name: For Honor: Virtuosa - Hero
summary:
Pursue perfection with our new Outlander hero, Virtuosa, and master the art of the blade. Outsmart foes with flawless fencing technique and evade attacks with a smile!

The Virtuosa Hero offer includes:
1 New Hero: Virtuosa
1 Ornament
1 Elite Outfit
7-Day Champion Status (extra XP, extra loot, and more)
3 Scavenger Crates with random gear

name: Fokkland
summary: Fokkland is a cozy exploration game. Play as Mara, princess of a tiny realm: ride your horse, invite animals to follow, beware traps, goblins and trolls. Choose kindness or a darker path. Beta, evolving with community feedback.

name: Football Manager 26 Console
summary:
New foundations set the stage for you to shape your football destiny. Built on the Unity engine, FM26 Console places you at the heart of the beautiful game. This is the legacy, redefined.

Delivering effortless, instinctive console control, a redesigned user interface combines with the most immersive matchday experience in series history to bring you closer to every match-defining moment.

Build your superstar squad with new transfer tools and bring your footballing vision to life through innovations that deliver enhanced tactical realism.

name: Football Manager 26 Touch
summary: Football Manager 26 Touch launches digitally on December 4th.

name: Football Manager 26 Mobile
summary: Football Manager 26 Mobile will launch November 4 exclusively for Netflix members for iOS and Android devices.

name: Food Rush
summary: It's time for the Food Rush! Customize your very own restaurant to your liking, provide fast service and get high streaks of customers served for some extra cash! Hire staff to keep your franchise running and manage your ever-increasing upkeep and other financial matters. Oh.. and rush that food!

name: F.O.R.S
summary: This intense shooter combines combat with trivia, answering questions correctly keeps you safe, while wrong answers drain your health and reveal your location. To recover, you must reach risky map zones, but enemies will hunt you. Only the smartest and most skilled will survive.

name: Forklift 2025 Simulator
summary: Step into the driver’s seat of a powerful forklift and experience the true-to-life challenges of cargo handling. From carefully lifting pallets to stacking heavy loads at different heights, this simulator will test your precision, patience, and skill. Each mission brings new obstacles, requiring focus, balance, and accuracy to succeed.

name: Forgotten Eras
summary: Explore a Slavic folklore-inspired 2.5D Metroidvania. Guide Ivan and the Grey Wolf through a mythic kingdom, wield runes, solve puzzles, and face legends such as Domovoy and Baba Yaga reborn in a stylized, atmospheric world.

name: For Zekyll
summary: Every step forward rewrites your past. Dive into a cinematic fusion of first-person horror and novel. Featuring branching choices, and emotional storytelling.

name: Forsaken Lands
summary: Brave heroes unite to challenge the gods themselves and decide the fate of the world! Dive into an epic roguelite deckbuilder adventure. Gather your friends and take on divine foes together in thrilling online co-op battles!

name: Fork of the Crimson Soul
summary: Fork of the Crimson Soul is a stylish character action game featuring food characters in absurd and badass life or death battles. You take control of Furter, a hot-headed fork wielding hotdog who slashes his way through heaps of enemies he's fairly quick and has a wide range of moves.

name: Fortnite: Rogue Scout Pack
summary: Stay focused and get the job done. Always come out on top with the Rogue Scout Pack. Includes access to "Save the World" PvE Campaign.

name: Food Chain
summary: Full Physics Massive Multiplayer.

name: Fortune Crafter
summary: Fortune Crafter is a roguelike(rogueLite*) game that focuses on crazy synergies. You can play this game in local coop with as many friends as you wish. Or you can play several pvp modes. This game will be perfect for minmax enjoyers, since it has lots of deep mechanics and interractions.

name: Forest Of Terenu
summary:
Enter the Forest of Terenu, a mysterious, otherworldly realm steeped in sorrow, memory, and the remnants of lost souls. In this gripping visual novel, you become Ellis, a 17-year-old girl searching for her missing brother, guided only by a flickering flame and the distant echoes of the past.

After falling asleep one night and awakening in a dreamlike yet menacing forest, Ellis finds herself trapped in a realm where light has faded and grief has taken root. The only constant is a strange glowing orb—her only source of light, and perhaps, her only ally.

As Ellis ventures deeper into the shadows of Terenu, she meets peculiar spirits and lost wanderers, each bearing pieces of a much larger puzzle: a tragedy buried in time and a curse that binds them all. Some want to help, others deceive. But all are haunted.
And Ellis is no exception.

Will you uncover the truth hidden beneath the trees—or be consumed by the darkness yourself?

name: Fortnite: Gilded Elites Pack
summary:
They've got one thing in common and it happens to be the one thing they all adore. Includes 3 Outfits (with LEGO Styles), 3 Back Blings and 3 Pickaxes.

They've got one thing in common and it happens to be the one thing they all adore. Show off with the Gilded Elites Pack.

Includes:
Lustrous Luxe Outfit
Hollowpoint Wings Back Bling
Ideal Cutter Pickaxe
Gunslinger Calamity Outfit
Eternal Longhorn Back Bling
Gunswinger Pickaxe
The Goldfish Outfit
Submariner's Safe Back Bling
Speargun Slasher Pickaxe
Outfits include LEGO Styles.

name: Forgedale
summary: Farm, fish, and craft your way to greatness in a living RPG world. Grow crops, reel in rare catches, and forge powerful gear from gathered resources. Brave perilous dungeons, battle mighty bosses, and take on epic quests in a land full of danger, adventure, and endless opportunity!

name: Fog Racing Circuit
summary: Get ready to push your limits in the most challenging racing championship yet!

name: Football Agent
summary:
Calling all Soccer fanatics! Dive into the world of Soccer Agent, where you'll experience the thrill of managing your own Soccer empire. As a master negotiator and agent, your mission is to guide your players to stardom and lead them to the pinnacle of success.

Unleash your inner strategist and navigate the labyrinthine world of Soccer. Manage a roster of talented players, each with unique skills and potential. Negotiate lucrative contracts, scout for hidden gems, and build a formidable team that will dominate the pitch.

With an unparalleled level of depth, Soccer Agent offers an immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Manage club finances, invest in infrastructure, and make strategic decisions that will shape the destiny of your team.

name: Food Inc: Home of the Supply
summary: Dive into a farm co-op game where you can build, plant crops, care for animals and much more. In this game you can ride and drive while doing missions and expanding the farm. Inspired by real world elements like seasons and animal lifespan, food inc aim to deliver a fun and simple arcade gameplay.

name: FodFru
summary:
FodFru is a 3D platformer video game developed by Néo Foderé de Frutos under the brand NSTUDIOS GAMES, a division of FODSOFT.

In this game, you step into the shoes of the fodfrus, a spherical-shaped alien species that can change color at will. This species is building an amusement park inspired by planet Earth. The problem is that several parts are missing from the main attraction’s mechanism, so your fodfru is one of the chosen ones tasked with finding the remaining pieces to complete the final ride and open the park.

name: For a Few Minutes
summary: For a Few Minutes is an emotional visual novel that explores love, grief, and the fragile hope of moving forward.

name: Forest Mansion Incident
summary: An ordinary evening after routine cleaning turns into a nightmare... Will you be able to get out of the mansion, unravel all its secrets and defeat the voracious entity that lives in this unfortunate place without losing the remnants of humanity?

name: Forever-Happy-Town
summary: A PvE multiplayer shooter where a prophecy of eight endless nights is rapidly approaching, are you good enough to keep the town forever happy? You'd better be, else a herd of lovely rabbits will require rapid relocation.

name: Forest: The Call For Help
summary: After breaking down and calling for a pickup, you hear a call for help in the forest feet away. You decide to investigate the irregular forest while waiting for your friend to arrive.

name: Football Manager Touch 2016
summary: Football Manager Touch 2016 is a streamlined football management simulation designed for faster play on tablets and computers. It features over 130 real leagues, cross-save compatibility between devices, and the series’ 3D match engine. New additions include Create-a-Club mode, Prozone match analysis, expanded tactical options, and various unlockables, offering a more accessible alternative to the full Football Manager experience.

name: Fortress Fury
summary:
Fortress Fury is a multiplayer tower defense game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.

The monsters are here, and there's no place to run or hide.

Defeat the enemies!

All you can do is survive as long as you can until other towers are fallen.

Gather gold to buy upgrades and win other players.

Key Features

Dynamic Builds: With over 16 different weapons to choose from throughout a run, no two attempts will ever be the same

Rank System: Compete your skills with other players in session and overall

Diverse Cast & Tower Arsenal: Experiment with builds across a wide cast of unlockable towers and upgradable weapons

Pick Up And Play: Approachable 10-20 minute runs built with quick play sessions in mind

name: Forgive for Ever
summary: In this war-torn age, people can only place their hopes in the gods. As a divine messenger, you must help the believers fulfill their wishes! For loved ones, for freedom, for faith—how far can human willpower go?

name: Forgotten Anne
summary:
Imagine a place where all that is lost and forgotten goes; old toys, letters, socks. The Forgotten Lands is a magical world inhabited by Forgotlings; living mislaid objects longing to be remembered.

Forgotton Anne is a seamless cinematic adventure with meaningful storytelling and light puzzle platforming. You are Anne, the enforcer who keeps order in the Forgotten Lands, as she sets out to squash a rebellion that might prevent her master, Bonku, and herself from returning to the human world...

name: Forsen's Vacation
summary: You are a popular Swedish streamer "Forsen". You went on vacation, but something gone wrong and you wake up on the island. Your paddles are stolen so you have to find them to escape the island. Fight chatters from your twitch chat in order to find them and escape the island.

name: Foxo
summary: Foxo is a cozy online hangout: play minigames, go fishing, decorate/ expand your room and express yourself with tons of customization options, all with one crucial twist... everyone is a fox!

name: Formula Auto Sport Racing
summary: From Pitstop to Podium – Dominate the Circuit.

name: Forsaken Struggle
summary: Stranded on a broken spaceship, you and your crew must scavenge resources, build and repair your ship, and fend off constant robotic alien assault. With oxygen and food running low, every decision could mean survival—or death. How long can you hold out?

name: Formido
summary: Wander through hauntingly beautiful environments with two unlikely companions.

name: Fox's Zen House
summary: Sleep tight, and don't let the bed bugs bite! Fox's Zen House is a game where you must help a sleepy little fox to get through the night, while alarm clocks, telephones and jackhammers try to sabotage it! Upgrade your dream portal defenses, and eliminate the inconveniences!

name: FOF: Fear Of Failure
summary: FOF (Fear of Failure) is a physics-based precision platformer where every shot counts. Use the powerful recoil of your shotgun to propel yourself through challenging environments, overcoming obstacles with skill and strategy. one wrong move, and you’ll experience spectacular failure.

name: Football Academy Manager
summary: Run your own football academy. Scout and discover young talents, evaluate their potential, manage their development through training, and negotiate transfers with clubs to grow your prestige and influence.

name: Fortified Space
summary: Seize control of enemy planets in this nostalgic space sim and tower defense game made in the style of classic Flash games. Start by dominating orbital space in starship combat with railguns, defense turrets, and shields. Once clear, land on the surface to build a base and destroy waves of enemies.

name: Forgotten: Whispers From Ashes
summary: A curse lurks in the fog in this psychological and investigative horror game. Use a strange lantern to uncover the truth and solve the mystery of Centreville and its ghostly inhabitants. Will you break the curse… before it drives you insane?

name: Food and Wood
summary: Gather food and wood to get stronger, to explore further. Uncover all that lies in the cover of darkness.

name: Food Truck Kingdom
summary: Are you ready to cook your way through time and prove your culinary mastery?

name: Forest Time
summary: Forest Time is a tactical game with a cozy experience. Enjoy various puzzles in a charming, vibrant world with peaceful yet challenging tasks.

name: For God's Sake, Help Him!
summary: FOR GOD'S SAKE, HELP HIM! is a tiny, surreal first-person art "game" about what it's like. your goal is singular and simple: try to help him, however you can... if you can. that's a tall order considering you're both in a blank void and he's being crushed over and over.

name: ForgeRun
summary: ForgeRun is a co-op arena survival roguelike where you battle endless hordes, collect anvils, and forge random upgrades mid-fight to become the ultimate blacksmith hero.

name: Foxy Trouble
summary: An uninvited fox spirit girl suddenly appears, determined to absorb the purest life essence—by having a romance that's both sultry and thrilling! And so begins a heart-pounding, sweat-inducing cohabitation life! This is a short romance visual novel guaranteed to make you smile!

name: Fool's Cup
summary: Fool’s Cup is an online multiplayer party game set in a medieval world. Compete in colorful, chaotic mini-games to prove your skills and outwit rivals. Fun, rivalry, and laughter collide—but only one can claim the crown as the kingdom’s ultimate jester!

name: Fourth Time Around
summary: Henry is an elderly man with regrets. Over the course of his life, he has killed three times. He is about to kill again.

name: Food Processing Simulator
summary: Build and manage your own food processing factory. Automate production with machines, expand your facility, and keep inventory under control as you grow from a small workshop into a large-scale production empire.

name: Fortiori
summary: Fortiori is a high-stakes number multiplication roguelike where your only opponent is your own rising score. Survive rule-bending bosses and devastating curses by mastering your deck and harnessing powerful buffs.

name: Foes of Legacy: Survivors
summary: Spring arrives in Avalon. Fensy sets out to claim her inheritance, battling relentless foes in a fast-paced 2D top-down roguelike. Quick reflexes, powerful weapons, and survival are key—fight, grow stronger, and defend your legacy in Avalon's unique world!

name: For Honor: Yoshiro the Damned - Orochi Hero Skin
summary:
Embody Yoshiro the Damned, who had to turn himself into a disfigured monster to save his village from an evil spirit.

The Hero Skin of Yoshiro the Damned offer includes:
1 Orochi Hero Skin
7-Day Champion Status
3 Scavenger Crates

name: For Honor: Yokai Banishers - Hero Skin Bundle
summary:
Unlock two Hero Skins bound by fate across the centuries, facing the same mortal dilemma and demonic peril.

The Yokai Banishers Hero Skin Bundle offer includes:
1 Orochi Hero Skin
1 Kensei Hero Skin
14-Day Champion Status
6 Scavenger Crates

name: Forbidden Terror: Board Game
summary: A psychological horror game where you take the role of Jonah, an 18 year old trying out a new board game, The Ouija Board, with his friend Emily. Little did they know, it was far from a simple board game.

name: Folk Trails
summary: In this game, you are a child exploring and taking pictures of an abandoned trail, accidentally capturing the attention of a long forgotten being, the Krampus. Use your camera's flash find your way through the dark night and to scare the monster away before it catches you!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 6 - Mini Season 2: The Simpsons
summary: Drop from the Battle Bus into... Springfield? The 80-player Springfield Island features a fast-paced, back-to-basics Battle Royale experience straight from the minds behind The Simpsons. Giant donuts will fall from the sky and angry clones will roam the streets, but don’t worry, Homer Simpson is in charge.

name: Formula Uno Racing
summary: Race across a global lineup of high-speed circuits that evolve with the time of day. Tackle sharp turns under the morning sun, chase victory through glowing dusk, and dominate the track beneath dazzling night lights.

name: For Old Time's Sake
summary: For old times sake is a wholesome roleplaying game about a student historian investigating a forgery. scoot and jump to explore the big open world and speak with the locals to solve the mystery!

name: Forbidden Love
summary: Love for forbidden dreams

name: Formula 2.5
summary: A retro-style 2.5D arcade racing game inspired by the golden era of Formula 1. Drive through four decades of racing history, master cockpit-view controls, and battle changing weather conditions across iconic circuits like Monaco.

name: Follow Dalian
summary: Hack, Slash, and Loot! A pixel-art Action Roguelike built on two pillars: the visceral thrill of mowing down hordes and the endless addiction of grinding for gear. Meticulously craft your build with weapons, armor, gadgets, and skills, evolve it inside the run, then unleash satisfying carnage!

name: Forged Desires: A Bara JRPG
summary: Forged Desires is a JRPG with dating sim elements and two datable guys: Leonard, the royal soldier, and Galin, the wizard. It's also based on wearing clothes to learn different skills and using different Field Skills like becoming invisible, swinging, and pushing heavy objects.

name: For The Stars
summary: For the Stars invites you to explore and settle a vast universe of diverse planets, each with its own unique wonders and mysteries to uncover. Conquer the challenges of hostile biomes, forge alliances, and build a legacy that spans the galaxy.

name: Fogbound
summary: Explore a decaying city enshrouded by toxic fog. Discover its secrets, unravel its past, and fight to escape its fold before it consumes you too. Get her out of here. This is FOGBOUND: an atmospheric psychological horror experience.

name: Fourleaf Fields
summary: Welcome to the tiny world of Fourleaf Fields, a cozy farming life sim where you're no bigger than a carrot. Grow towering crops, care for tiny farm bugs, and uncover a web of secrets fueled by gossip - solo or online with friends!

name: Forsaken
summary: A horror-themed card battler where you build decks from over 500 sinister cards across 15 nightmare factions (like zombies, vampires, and cultists), engage in tactical turn-based duels, play twisted mini-games (from poker to space-invaders), and progress through a dark idle system that grows your power — even when you’re not actively playing.

name: Foggy Golf
summary: Daily Chess + Golf Based Hybrid Puzzle Game.

name: Football, Tactics & Glory: Treble Deluxe Edition
summary: Tactics meet passion – lead your squad to glory!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 7 - Season 1: Pacific Break
summary: Surf into a new sun-soaked island, brand-new ways to play, and a star-studded Battle Pass in Chapter Seven: Pacific Break! This season kicks off a new era for Fortnite Battle Royale’s story, where the greatest stories are told — and the cameras are always rolling.

name: For Humanity
summary: For Humanity is a cooperative extraction FPS. Explore a post-apocalyptic world invaded by zombies alone or up to 4 players. Raid and escape to your camp, craft and upgrade your equipment in order to help other survivors discover the origin of the pandemic.

name: Folklore Fishing
summary: Folklore Fishing is a story driven fishing game that is fully playable without visuals.

name: Folklore Reloaded
summary: Nothing beats a few brewskis on a temperate summer evening while camping in northern Ontario, however a rustle in the bushes reveals an onslaught of monsters who seek to separate your beer from your hand! Respond the natural way by taking up arms and defending yourself from this travesty!

name: Folktale Fury
summary: Folktale Fury is a 3D fighting game that challenges your reflexes, and promises exciting, competitive fun. Choose your fighter from a variety of folktale heroes and enter the ring against a friend. Discover the unique abilities of different characters and find your favorite.

name: Forge Master
summary:
Forge and equip weapons from different civilizations! Start by forging gear from the Stone Age. Then upgrade your anvil in order to forge gear from the Medieval Age. Work your way up to the Modern Age, Space Age and even up to the Quantum Age!

Are you ready for this adventure?

Forge, Upgrade, and Compete Across the Ages!

name: Football Manager Handheld 2015
summary:
Football Manager Handheld 2015 (FMH15) is the latest release in the best-selling, award-winning series of games on mobile and tablet devices which allows you to live out the dream of managing your favourite real-life football (soccer) club.

From your digital dugout you’ll manage the football club and make all of the big decisions. You buy the top players, you develop the stars and you pick the best eleven – to score you the goals that’ll win you the silverware. Do you have what it takes to become a legend in the high pressure, high emotion world of football management?

name: Fourteen Years of Flames
summary: Fourteen Years of Flames is a story-driven FPS that replays China’s struggle in the Second Sino-Japanese War (1931–1945). Players embody 7 key characters and battle through 16 real historical events, experiencing the hardships and sacrifices over 14 years of struggle. Land weeps in 14 years of war.

name: Forks & Daggers
summary: A Chaotic Medieval Social Deduction Party Game for 3–10 Players. Find the traitor or become a traitor. Use Manor as a weapon itself; throw, hit, arm trap. Convert to a Dagger to hide and eliminate.

name: Forgot
summary: You are trapped at home in an endless loop. Remember your surroundings and watch out for anomalies, if you ever want to leave.

name: Focus
summary: This game transports players into a wondrous world filled with challenges and adventures, starring a particularly charming bird wearing a hat.

name: Fool's Gold
summary: A pirate themed arcade survivor with rouge-lite elements. Shoot your way though the ever expanding sea as you defend yourself from sea snakes and ghost ships as you collect gold to upgrade your ship.

name: Forbidden Island
summary: Welcome to ForbiddenIsland — a wild and mysterious land where untamed nature, lost civilizations, and ancient evil await. Explore uncharted territories, build your shelter, and craft everything you need to survive against the unknown.

name: Forest Survival
summary: A 2D survival action game in which the player aims to survive by using a flashlight to illuminate the enemy.

name: Forever With You
summary: Finding love isn't always easy. Within a limited time, manage your life and find someone you truly love.

name: Forgotten Depths
summary: "Forgotten Depths" is a thrilling psychological horror survival game where you fight to survive deep within a dark, abandoned mine. Battle your fear, keep your flashlight alive, and escape terrifying supernatural threats that push you closer to the brink of madness.

name: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 6
summary: Relive Battle Royale from its beginnings in Chapter 1 Season 6. Drop back in and explore the OG map, collect OG loot, and relive OG seasons!

name: Forgotten Faiths
summary: The story of a merchant house in a world on the mend. Their leader sifts through the ashes of history for lost secrets. Embark on expeditions to support the house and search for lost artifacts. A mix of visual novel and RPG mechanics.

name: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 7
summary: OG takes it back to Chapter 1 Season 7! The Ice King has frozen the map, zoom around the frigid terrain on new ziplines, and take to the skies on the X-4 Stormwing.

name: Fortunato
summary: Draw a pair of aces, use them as poker hands or to eliminate your opponents? A poker roguelike battle card game. Build a deck of jokers, defeat bosses, modify cards, and conquer challenges across the ever-changing islands. At the table of four, win by chips or remaining health, your call...

name: Folia Felina
summary:
Gatosa is a distracted cat, raised in an apartment and easily lost on the street. When trouble arises, she always asks her best friend for help.

Her best friend, Miranja, is a more laid-back cat who likes to talk nonsense and was raised on the streets. She is fierce, there's no way around it!

This Carnival, the friends agreed to go to a street party together, but Miranja needs to send directions and routes via cell phone, since Gatosa has a long history of getting lost when she leaves home and, besides that, doesn't have a good internet plan.

name: Four Corners: Square Off
summary: In this sequel to the

name: Foghorns Drown
summary: Foghorns Drown is a psychological thriller where you play as a ferryman, bringing passengers across a foggy lake to a town drenched in mystery and folklore.

name: Forecast Death
summary: Survive the chaos of a bullet-heaven action game. Tear through enemy hordes, stack wild ability combos, and endure cataclysms that rewrite the rules mid-fight. The pace ramps up every minute - either you grow stronger, or you get wiped out.

name: Foillower
summary: Welcome to Davenburg. On a snowy night downtown, Mitch makes a simple stop on his way to his girlfriend Claire's house. Food. A gift. Then home.

name: Follow Us
summary: A co-op horror game for 2 players, where you risk your life outside to entertain a world that never leaves home. On Follow Us, contestants work in pairs: one explores, the other guides. Trust is your lifeline.

name: Forlorn Manor
summary: Three college students spend their vacation visiting an abandoned mansion one received as a inheritance. The mansion has a bad history of being haunted, but ghosts aren't real, right?

name: Follower
summary: On a snowy night downtown, Mitch makes a simple stop on his way to his girlfriend Claire's house. Food. A gift. Then home.

name: Forgive Me Father 2: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Deluxe Edition of Forgive Me Father 2 gives you access not only to the game, but lets you also feast your eyes on its Digital Artbook containing more than fifty pages of mind-bending artworks, as well as listen for hours to the 30 tracks of its original Soundtrack composed by Tim Fialka.

name: Footlord
summary: Discover the ultimate football management experience with FootLord, the mobile game that puts you in the shoes of a manager in the football world. Manage every aspect of your club, from market strategy and tactical details to financial management, earning a reputation through victories and trophies.

name: Forest Whiskers
summary: A cozy RPG where you move into a magical forest to rescue, raise, train, and breed cats. Together, you’ll help other animals, cleanse the forest from pollution, craft potions, uncover secrets, and build a powerful team to protect the wild.

name: Forest Keeper Lookout
summary: Take a temporary job as a forest ranger deep in the mountains. Complete daily tasks, maintain equipment, and enjoy the quiet, until strange things start to happen.

name: Forest Hustle
summary: You are dropped into a forest with one goal - making money and paying off your 100k debt. Collect resources, make deals, upgrade, build and hire workers to do the job for you.

name: Formula Racing Pro 2026
summary: Push Beyond Limits – The Future of Racing Starts Now!

name: Football Legends 2025
summary: Play. Score. Win. Become a Football Legend!

name: Formula Legendary Bundle 3 in 1
summary: Every turn is a battle. Every win is a story.

name: Food for Frog
summary: Food for Frog is a cozy cooking puzzle game about experimenting with ingredients to create dishes requested by a cast of froggy characters. Get to know your customers, learn new recipes, relax and enjoy the cute artwork.

name: Food Truck Together
summary: A food truck that never stops moving. A kitchen that never stays still. Food Truck Together is a high-speed co-op chaos game where every turn can ruin or save the order.

name: Forest of Death Masks
summary: Christian Tyler is ready to investigate a new case! Uncover the mystery of the tourist town of Alkelano in our new visual novel.

name: Forgotten at Fredbear's
summary: In the aftermath of a tragic incident, the notorious diner remains open against all odds. Henry Emily and William Afton persist in their relentless work, striving to keep the restaurant afloat. As you step into the shoes of John Hudson, a father recently laid off, your primary concern becomes providing for your family. Rumors circulate about a potential job opening at "Fredbear's Family Diner," urging you to seize the opportunity before it slips away. Little do you know the unforeseen consequences that await you as you unknowingly become entangled in a dark and twisted game orchestrated by two vengeful souls. The animatronics, once innocent and joyful, have been reprogrammed. Night after night, you must navigate the haunted halls, surviving and unraveling the enigmatic secrets concealed within the restaurant's walls...

name: FoxHaunt
summary: FoxHaunt is a choice-based RPG with turn-based battles. You are the Forgotten Fox. Find and fight the other fox spirits so that you will be remembered.

name: Foxy Dumplings
summary: In Foxy Dumplings, you’ll run your own food truck and make friends along the way. Cook dumplings from all over the world, take good care of your clients, and discover how a meal can mend more than just hunger in this cozy cooking sim. Rise to the top of Foxtagram, one heartfelt dish at a time.

name: Food Truck Chef - Full Course Edition
summary: In Food Truck Chef: Full Course Edition, you explore vibrant locations and unlock fresh levels, each introducing a brand-new lineup of special dishes to perfect. Packed with delicious recipes from around the world, this is a true culinary journey. From the lively sights of Oriental Street and the smoky goodness of BBQ Street to the sugary treats of Donut and Waffle Street, tackle every challenge and complete each cooking mission. Simple to pick up but tough to perfect, this high-speed cooking game features some mechanics that keep you on your toes.

name: Forza Horizon 6: Deluxe Edition
summary: Forza Horizon 6 Deluxe Edition includes the full game, Welcome Pack and Car Pass (30 cars delivered to your game, one per week).

name: Forza Horizon 6: Premium Edition
summary: Forza Horizon 6 Premium Edition includes the full game with Early Access - Play 4 days early starting May 15, and VIP Membership, Welcome Pack, Time Attack Car Pack, and Car Pass (30 cars delivered to your game, one per week), as well as the Italian Passion Car Pack and two Premium Expansions coming post-launch.

name: Forester Simulator 2026: Mushroom Hunting
summary: Harvest. Sell. Upgrade. Become the ultimate mushroom hunter.

name: Forge & Flame
summary: A chaotic co-op blacksmithing game where you and a friend forge weapons in the middle of a battlefield!

name: Fortune and Glory
summary: Fortune & Glory is a text-parser action RPG about leaving home to become a hero! Decide who you are as you explore an ailing world in a detailed retro-inspired style. Gain help from your personalities and their internal dialogue to solve puzzles and fight monsters in a realtime battle system.
